SENTENSE.VALUE: Ask about the Item Mix System
Ask About the Item Mix System
Want to make a basic item?
hehe, I can't tell you everything about it because there are a lot of possible combinations. All I can tell you right now is be smart and think before mixing items.
I can tell you how to make a fermentation potion though. Get a bread and purchase Liquid potion from me, from there you can mix it to form a fermentation potion.
Please take note that you need to put in the correct quantity of items for it to work.
This is the Archery Training Room. Please go back to your own place unless you have something important to ask.
Hmm?You seem to be very attentive.
Hmm, to confirm about a basic thing is a good attitude.
When using a bow, the most important thing is your concentration.
You must use your skills more often to learn how to instantly kill the enemy.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills.
What do you want to know?
Ask about the methods of training
Ask about the methods of combat

It is hard to use a bow. Every country has its own style of using a bow and you must start from learning the basic techniques.

Basically, attacking target in a long range is an advantage of the Archery Section.

In order to push the limit of concentration, don't spend too much attention on unused muscle.
Keeping a distance from the enemies is the best strategy. It is also a way of protecting yourself from your target's attacks.
During times of closed-ranged battles, make sure to keep enough distance from your targets for protection and accuracy.
Due to the weakness of your defense, it is much better if you form a group together with other players.
Students from the Archery Section need not to depend solely on strength. Do consider to upgrade your character's agility to increase the accuracy of hitting your targets.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character. If you concentrate on Dexterity, you will earn fast attack speed and become a Fast Attack Type. Distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Vitality, will allow your character to become Power Attack Type. Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Intelligence, will allow your character to become Skill Type.
Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.

The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient. But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

Now, there are hardly a few decent human beings around. Most of them are transformed into evil monsters. But this situation can be solved. Please remember this.
The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be.

There is something that you need to do before submitting your registration form. Just like what I said before, these aggressive mobs are causing destruction in our campus. Please go outside and prevent them from causing more destruction.
Whatever happens inside or outside of this building, carelessness will just completely change your destiny.
After submitting the Exit Approval Form, you are entering a world of danger. Please remember this!

Oh you saw.. the list of saint.. It is true that there is nothing wrong with list. You might be curious about the behind.. Right? Why are there many students that have a problem in their family ? Actually it is simple. There is not many parents that send their children to experimental school. Even if the school offers extraordinary features, it doesn't matter for the parents who think the tradition importantly.

Many people raise this question.. Whether It is forgiveness work or not. Hm.. By the way I have no right to teach you then! I have to force you about what I don't know well. You know there are arena in trading hole. Look for the teachers there.

Thousands of years... Buy yet I was not able to see my Love.
Thousand years ago, same with me and my love to go away, but he came back for a very long time.
Thousands of years... Buy yet I was not able to see my Love.
Thousand years ago, same with me and my love to go away, but he came back for a very long time.
I heard that someone took my chocolate away!!! I should make another one and give it for him tomorrow again¡¦
I gave chocolate to a man I love. Hope that he accepts my confession~~~!
He is just amazing~¢½ You will find him at a glance!^^
This Terminal controls both the entrance and the exit to the Science Center.
The Force Field Mechanism of the Terminal is running properly. To optimize the Force Field, you need Spiritual Spheres. You are required to gather 20 Spiritual Spheres to optimize this terminal.
The Force Field Optimization is completed. Please proceed to the next Terminal to complete the Force Field Authentication Process.
Inside the Science Center are some evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these spirits will bring unknown effects to the environment. Please try your best to eliminate these mobs.
Inside the School Sports Field are some evil spirits moving around. The Mobs possessed by these spirits bring unknown effects to the environment. Please try your best to eliminate these Mobs.
The required target amount for purification has been achieved and verified. Thank you for your efforts.
The top priority targets of this area are the Punks. Please help neutralize the violent situation by eliminating 30 Punk Targets.
The top priority targets of this area are the Crooks. Please eliminate 36 Crooks to neutralize the violence.
Gold Storage's security is normal. All connections to the different Lockers is also normal.
I am very worried about our friend. He hasn't fully recovered yet. That's why I can't leave here to meet Siu Er.
I'm here because my friend was injured. Me and my leader temporarily left the team and stayed here to take care of my friend.
I still believe that he will be able to fully recover from his injury.
I need your help in defeating those fishermen and its friends. Whenever I try to find my leader and other friend, they always attack me.
I need a favor from you.
I need you to ask more details from Warehouse Keeper here in Wharf Passage.
Erm. If those hunters have already become like that then I have nothing to worry about.
Nah.. Don't worry, I already know that they have people spying on us.
It's not a difficult task, just tell Siu Er what you know and ask her to make medicine for our friend.
Thank you for helping us. I don't have anything to worry about now that the medicine is here.
Please deliver this letter to Siu Er.
It is important that Siu Er gets this letter. Please take care of it.
Got it. I will pass this letter to my leader.
I know you already helped me with these monsters last time. But.. there are still a lot of them. I hope you can help me get rid of them.
Thank you. Please take this item as my token of appreciation for your help.
I am a diplomat from our motherland.
The civilization of our world is divided into two groups. The 1st group is peaceful while the other is chaotic.
There's a place in our world that is overrun by monsters. There's not a time that they wouldn't attack.
I want to go back to our world and stop the war.. Then I wanna marry my love and start a family with her.
Of course my friend. Why would I lie?
I would like to know Mr. No-Name's situation. I have met him before and he helped me a lot. Please pass this message to him.
Thank you very much. Please pass this letter to Siu Er.
Congratulations. I know you worked so hard and will reward you for it. I can help improve your ring.
This Terminal controls the entrance and exit to the Library.
The Force Field Mechanism of the Terminal is running properly. To optimize the Force Field function of this Terminal, you must gather 9 Spiritual Spheres.
The Force Field Optimization for the current terminal is completed! Please proceed to the next terminal to complete all the required Force Field Optimizations.
Inside the Library are some evil spirits moving around. The Mobs possessed by these spirits bring unknown effects to the environment. Please try your best to eliminate these Mobs.
The target amount for purification has been achieved and verified. Thank you for all your efforts.
The top priority targets in this area are the Street Junkies. Please eliminate 22 Street Junkie targets.
A Broom? Anyway, It is really inconvenient to perform tasks while carrying this broom around.
The weather is getting cold and gloomy. My body is starting to feel some sore pain.
Ask about the usage of the Lockers

Of Course! Just use these lockers whenever you want. However, please do not utilize all these locker spaces by yourself alright? Try to stick to one locker space for yourself. Just store items that you want to keep for future use inside your locker. In case you need more space for your locker, you need to spend a portion of your money for that arrangement.

Sigh. How do I answer that question? As you probably know, there are 3 Campuses in the area. However, There are rumors stating that there is another campus making it 4 campus all in all. There are several conversations between the teachers and the School Administration talking about the force.. Force Fie,,,, Ah yes! the Force Field! Although I am not one hundred percent sure, I believe that there is something very important about that Force Field. Of all the campuses here in the area, The Leonair Campus is the weirdest. I remember a time when I was listening to a conversation between teachers; the sky suddenly became strange looking, and something very peculiar and abnormal fell into the Leonair Campus, Since then, major chaos has started. What actually happened is something I'm dying to know more about. If you guys find important information about that event, please don’t forget to inform me alright?
Broom? Oh! That Broom! I really have no idea what's so special about these brooms. If you really need to take it, here it is. However, please do return them as soon as possible.

HELP!!! Some Monsters took my crescent moon pieces!! Can you please go and find the said pieces and return it back to me!!
250 Crescent Moon Pieces = Crescent Moon Random Box 1 300 Crescent Moon Pieces = Choose one of Crescent Moon Random Box 2 or 3 400 Crescent Moon Pieces = Crescent Moon Random Box 4 Please go find and get the pieces back for me!
Exchange 250 Crescent Moon Pieces to Crescent Moon Random Box 1.
Exchange 300 Crescent Moon Pieces to Crescent Moon Random Box 2.
Exchange 300 Crescent Moon Pieces to Crescent Moon Random Box 3.
Exchange 400 Crescent Moon Pieces to Crescent Moon Random Box 4.
Ask about the healing treatment situation

They started to appear not long ago. First, there was only one but then they rapidly multiplied across the Campus area. I believe they didn't appear to possess the ability to mastermind nor execute the chaos.

Just take a look at my appearance right now. Considering the condition I am in right now, I have no choice but to sell and take care of medicines here. My body has mutated just like the others. Fortunately, I was able to keep my sanity.
Since you are already here, I expect that you already learned the basics. However, let me teach you two things first.
Ask about the effects of Petrification
Ask about the effects of Confusion
I'm so sorry my memory still hasn't recovered yet. My medical capabilities is like a double-edged sword. I could either help or harm you! You understand?
The victim's body will become stiff as a stone. This prevents the victim from moving. Ironically, the victim's defense increases under this situation.

This condition is characterized by the victim getting very dizzy. The attack and accuracy rate of the victim is reduced by 50%. This makes the victim weak against the other enemies. The moment SP (Stamina Point) is consumed, the victim is exposed to danger.
All the medicine have just been used up, what shall I do? I was still treating someone just now. I really appreciate that you have come to help.
Thank you very much. These medicines can last for sometime. Luckily, the number of injured people has decreased.
The Medicine can be acquired from the Nurse located at the Sacred Gate Ring. Are you willing to get those medicines for me?
Although we could ask help from the hospital in the neighboring city, I heard that it's not possible to pass through the tunnel because of something blocking in the middle.
We are all locked in here and can't move around freely.
Ah! There's one more thing you should know. The things that are blocking the tunnel are believed to be unknown gases and creatures.
I heard that we would find it difficult to breathe inside that area. Wearing gas masks is useless.
A student named [Zhen] from the Combat Section claims he's got some alternative methods to pass through that place.
The Information Room Terminal is unable to function properly due to an error in the school's Main Terminal. Please resolve this problem.

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to browse the document.

After you finish reading and activating the Shockwave Skill Book, use the [K] button to open the Skill Window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Shockwave in the Qi option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Shockwave skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Shockwave Skill

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to stay and browse the document.
Now, there are no means to keep this Terminal to function properly.

After you finish reading and activating the Refresh Skill Book, use the [K] button to open the skill window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Refresh in the Support option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Refresh Skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Refresh Skill
The Shockwave skill is the art of using the Qi Energy to attack closer enemies. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

The Refresh skill is used to hasten health recovery against damages. However, this skill can only be used on your own character. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

I don't know what to say... It's not the top of the mountain , but ... The time is a condition which stops, therefore that kind of general showing is not suitable here even if occurred in a big way different has changed, the harm was not big That, did not know must say is lucky, or unfortunate... Please take a look around

It makes people feel fear-free when they are here. If time stops moving , age wouldn't increase... Stomachs will never fill hungry Injuries cannot heal, but.. Ah , is there anything you don't know? There is a part of stoppage time here.

During the time it happened , it didn't work. You will understand it better if you take a look yourself. The Main Hole has the Saint Financial Group main office , there are alot of interesting fascilities , there's a little sense of regret..
The air is fresh. Though I can never find the results... From the communication fascility here , it can be sent to the lab. I don't think that any clue can be found. We must investigate.

Ah , can you help figure it out from the Sacred Financial Group ? Not long ago , a very loud explosion sound was heard after a student went to the building of the head office. I am worried and want to have a look , but if I leave my place , I wouldn't be able to have communication Can you help me out please ?
I heard if you are lucky , you will get the results In addition to the discovery of some clues.

I feel that a more thorough investigation should be done. But there is no manpower nor facility. From what I feel... the air here isn't flowing smoothly and as we head nearer to the Main Hole , the feeling becomes more intense I am not sure whether it's because of the nearby fire , but it feels like it has always been this bad. I still suspect that ongoing fire.

Thank you. This fireworks need keep from dangerous. Already, you know that middle hole and Root hole occur many fire accident. I don't know that how many collect fireworks for depense accident.
But, this tasks will help to decrease accident.

Fires occur frequently to this zone. The reason is fireworks.
Please find and collect fireworks.
I want to make the sphere comparison, Bakulaw may have the special sphere. Please get the special sphere from Bakulaw.
This is the clone. We need to do further the investigation. Here is the sphere for you as the reward.

Hmm... Firstly there are ordinary items Then there are those with modifiable items which are rare items. One of them is called a unique item, which is specially made of good quality items, but it is hard to find. If you do find it please take good care of it. And... even though I have never seen it with my own eyes, I know of one more very rare item. Please look at Main Centre's item details to find out more. And then there's one more quest item which shouldn't be simply used, this item is one of which even I wouldn't want to handle . Please pay attention to it. You can only use it upon finishing the quest.

Yes, it is a franchise managed by the Main Centre. Hygiene, quality, price, variety are all examined, and circulated throughout the whole country's colleges by a good company. Staff training taught this, but it's certainly surprising that it's only being applied now. But now the Main Centre has already cut off all resources and supply, therefore there's not a single here that's looking good...so sorry about this..

If it is items.. it means objects. If you defeat an enemy, you may rob him of his items, but the stronger the enemy, the more powerful weapons may be robbed, please do keep that in mind . If you manage to obtain a good object and do not intend to use it, or if you need the money, do consider selling it to me. However you may also choose to trade it with your friend.

I heard that upon achieving a certain level, enlightenment will bestow upon you and you may be free from masculinity boundaries. Even though its just a rumour but there's a book called Maori's Magical Manual which in its broken condition is circulating around outside.

I heard that upon achieving a certain level, enlightenment will bestow upon you and the boundaries of femininity may be broken. Even though it's just a rumour but there is a book called Alloy's Magical Manual which in its broken condition is floating around somewhere outside. It isn't an ordinary ancient book isn't it?
May I know what are you looking for?
OMG!!!! You haven't registered ? Just hand in the Egresses Application Form to the Student Director and the registration process will be finished.

You haven't finished registering? Last time I thought that this kind of paper process were just a formality At this age where everything is done at a click of a button, don't you think this type of documenting process is a bit strange? But I am not sure whether I am allowed to just hand you the used paper like that Don't we need to go through some kind of procedures first?

We can't just bring the application form in right? Only the Student Director will help you handle it, if it's another person, you will definitely be required to redo the whole thing. Anyway this kind of unusual system isn't impossible No matter what just hand in the "Egresses Application Form" to the Student Director and the whole registration process will be over.

Are you in the process of registration? I apologize for having you come all the way yourself. Normally the person on duty will allocate everything but the current situation doesn't allow it. however bringing it there personally will definitely make it more delicious.

Ever since the mutation happened , we cannot simply go outdoors. The students here have special abilities that enable them to go outdoors, which is impossible for a person like me. I heard that the strange people outside are actually all dead. Strange isn't it? I didn't believe it at first but after listening carefully it definitely seems real. People with identical looks gathering together .... even if you talk to them it's as if they cannot hear you. Even though I did not see it for myself I still think it's rather strange. Come, the application form must be handed in to the Student Director.
Please take your test at the 1-1 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-2 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-3 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-4 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-5 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-6 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-7 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-8 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-9 classroom . Good luck!
Please take your test at the 1-10 classroom . Good luck!
What? Do you mean the healing scroll? The Health Care room only uses this type The Health Care room is very busy isn't it? Why would they call you over...

You are a new student? hmm .. it must be tough Of all the time ..it has to be now... From what I know, the college is built to prevent this kind of thing Your level is lagging behind the other students by alot, you need to work harder. Please do accept this piece of bread to help you in your endeavours.

In my own opinion , I think that the teachers of this college have no feelings. They even refuse to teach the new batch of students. You are not really considered a new student so there is a possibility but this is just outrageous Although I can't say I am taking over the teacher But I want to help you Please strive to reach level 5 I will give you rewards. Good luck!

I knew you could do it. Here are the rewards. Even though they are not really anything , but they will definitely be able to help you If you need any further assistance I will try my best to help you. Good luck!
I should still be able to help you. Can you try your best to reach the next level? I will give you rewards as usual. Good luck!

The 2004 Athens Olympic games results. Golds , 12 Silvers and 9 Bronzes. Altogether 30 plus 1. Tickets [30 pieces] : Gift exchange package Tickets [31 pieces] : Gift exchange package If you sell them to us you can get back reinbursements, If you do not like the gift you may sell it. Those who guess the correct number of 30 will be given the gift exchange package , which includes the haven't returned Gymnastic Gold. We will give the gift exchange package to a total of 31 people.

Is it a cake dropped by the strange rabbit? This is not edible because it isn't really food. But it looks very strange so I asked them to keep it. If you collect 10 of the cakes , we will exchange a box with an unknown item for them. I cannot just give it to you like that. It may be a cheap recovery potion or a rare weapon. Bottomline is it's a magical box. It looks like it's an item created especially for experiments.I am not sure. Do you want to exchange this?
Swap New Year Cake for Box

It's strange you suddenly ask some question regarding skills. In order to use skills you need to have some skill points. Or upon completing a task , however this is only available at the beginning , it is a special case.
Ask How to Familiarize with the Skill
Ask how to use the Skill

Upon entering the Main Centre , you will see diferrent department trainers , press the "M" key to help you determine your position. You may purchase skill scrolls there. Spheres obtained throught quests may be used to exchange for skill scrolls.

Click the right button of the mouse after selecting a skill scroll in order to learn the skill. Pressing the "K" key will let you see the skills you may be able to learn in the future, skills which are already available will be brightly litted , it will be easy for you to differentiate skills which are available for you to use from those that aren't . Choose the skills that are already available from the skills window and move it to the 1-10 numbers on the left of your screen. Select the skills from the numbers assigned to them and click on the right button of the mouse to use them according to the situation. However you must make sure you read carefully each skills function as every skill are different.

Go to the office. The Student Director directed me to inform the new students to go to the office, but it actually slipped my mind. The office is at the room beside this. It's easy to find. If you are still unsure, you may press the "M" key to have a view of the game map.

Welcome to the new student's registration. We have specially prepared gifts for the new batch of students. Upon leaving the Main Centre you will receive bread prepared by us . Please do accept them. If you do not know the entrance's location, press the "M" key to bring up the game map which will help you determine its position. Other hotkeys may be identified by pressing on the "H" key.

There are evil spirits moving around the depths of the News Center.
Inside the Library building are evil spirits moving around.
The Main Entrance is composed of evil Spirits moving around.
The required amount of targets required for purification has been achieved. Thank you very much!

These mobs possessed by these evil spirits bring undesirable effects to the environment. Please do your very best to neutralize them.
The primary target for this area are the Brawlers. Please eliminate 34 Brawlers. Good Luck!
The mobs possessed by the evil spirits bring undesirable effects to the surroundings. Please do your best to eliminate them.

May I help you with anything?

I have been investigating this area for a few days and I found out this place was hit by meteoric shower. Plus, I have an intel saying that there is a meteorite outputing powerful energy had fell here but could not be able to find it. I still need more clues.

I found confidential documents about Research Complex and Power Plant. According to the documents, Dr. TK has constructed power plant to source the power for research complex. It may be a obvious info but please do convey it to 'Student Director (Dispatched)

I found confidential documents about Research Complex and Power Plant. According to the documents, Dr. TK has constructed power plant to source the power for research complex. It may be a obvious info but please do convey it to 'Grocer'.

Creatures mutated by virus are getting out of hands. It would cause a catastrophe if they manage to get out from Power Plant. Please take care of them before they get out. It would make the research of teachers and students here whole lot easier.

Discovered very powerful human type creatures near Solar Power Facility. You must defeat them first in order to find a very important clue. I expect very strong resistance... I am worried because the student who went out to do this mission is not still back yet.

Long time ago, Dr. TK has forced an experiment on live bodies of the workers and people here soley for his ambition. Many people showed side effects but some had managed to escape and went back to their formal lives... Who is Nurse Trainee (Dispatched)??
Ask about the healing treatment situation

They started to appear not long ago. First, there was only one but then they rapidly multiplied across the Campus area. I believe they didn't seem to possess the ability to mastermind nor execute the chaos.
Just take a look at my appearance right now. Considering the condition I am in right now, I have no choice but to sell and take care of medicines here.

I am so sorry my memory hasn't fully recovered yet. If I take a risk of treating your injuries right now, your wounds might worsen. My medical skills can either help or worsen your current situation. Ya understand?

All the medicines I have has been used up. What shall I do now? I was still in the process of treating someone just now. I really appreciate that you are here to help.
Thank you very much! Luckily, the quantity of ill patients already decreased. These medicines can still last for some time.
The Medicine can be acquired from the Nurse located at the Sacred Gate Ring. Are you willing to get those medicines for me?
Although we could ask the help from the hospital in the neighboring city, I heard it would be impossible due to the blockage in the tunnel.
No wonder that we're all locked in here and can't move around freely.
Ah! There is one important thing you should also know. The things causing the blockage in the tunnel are composed of unknown gases and creatures.
I heard that it would be difficult to breathe in there; even when wearing a gas mask.
However, a Student from the Combat Section named ZHEN claims to know some alternative methods to pass through the tunnel.
Show the eight signs of divine
Want to finish the eight signs of divine.
You may have many questions, But you don't know much about it.
Sacred Cate Campus... Swordsmanship class, and Mesran of Ragia in Another World. Who were you? Not the one for now, The one before incarnation.

It is good not to remember what you were. If I could remember you were the hypocrite, it might be hunt. We are the one who ignore the people that never have a benefit of Light. And we consider them as the invaders. I still cannot believe I was one of them.

The war between Light and Dark. Title is nice.. But.. There were 'Daramai' race which had to live at Dark by some sort of strong enforcement. Someday the enforcement has been broken and they realize the power of Light. After that, they want to share the power of Light.

Then The Ragia race who believe the owner of Light consider them as the invader. And after war, Another World has been almost destroyed. So who am I? I am not a part of Light race. I want to fight against Light.
This place is like the face behind the mask.. Here.. They pretend like a justice savior, but they were developing the weapon secretly. Moreover...
I believe you already saw a lot .. They are just like the people who insists the owner of Light is them. And SFG won't care about the human living. That's why they do the experiments on living body.
You might be able to find something here. But you might regret the information you gather. Are you still willing to find out something here?
I was so proud of myself that I was training the traditional heritage sword skill.. Then After I met him, I felt that I was so stupid.
I was able to master the complex sword skill in a few days. And I lost my mind easily with an obvious provocative ...
And I was violent on the problem with Another World... then suddenly I was killed by him. Yes? I was really killed. One of my copy-spirit.. Yes. He completely owned me.
Ah this is the device to pass the dimension gate. But it is not assembled yet. Instruction? Oh well.. Could we find the list? Suddenly I remember that list... List of Saint..

You've heard.. I mean the list of inmate.. How can all the gifted people come here? Fate? Advertising? No ways!. Everything was planned by SFG. The sudden death of parents, the retirement of parents, the incendiary fire of house .. and so on.

There is no parents that send their children to new school without a reason. While they are talking about the indulgence for the world peace outside, they are actually doing the crime on people. Can't you believe me? You could ask directly about it. To any teacher.
Do you want completion the eight signs of divine?? It is not easy…… Ok. Let's do it?I will wait for your good news.
I feel something strange at the 3rd Power Generator Room, please help me examine the area.
A secret passage? Hmm.. I never knew anything about this, let me investigate. Thank you.
About the secret passage, I need to inform someone. Do you know anyone with the name of Siu Er? Please help pass this message to her.
Tell him what happened to Xi Xian.

Very scary¡¦
Everybody has become scary.
It wasn't like this before, but after that kid died¡¦
Everything changed all of a sudden.
I am very hungry hiding in here, can you spare me something to eat? It is very scary out there¡¦ Please spare me some food¡¦
Food? Food! Thank you very much ! With this I can hide in here for a longer time¡¦
Monisha.. Hmm.. Yes I remember her.
Monisha, she is my friend indeed. Please let her know that I am Okay.
Monisha sent you here? I'm starting to remember the past after we met last time. Its still blurry though.
I.. I was in danger once.. But a pretty young girl helped me.. That's why I am still here. I'm sorry, that's all I remember for now.
I'm not really sure what happened to her. We went our separate ways at the main entrance and she went to Trading Hole. I really want to know if she's alright. Can you help me?
Uncle wants more information from me. Hmm.. We'll need to find out what happened to..
A junior named Xi Xian followed me here in Leonine, I heard he went to LeonineCampusB3 and disappeared..
Please pass this letter to uncle.
Gather Info on Nuclear Power Facility
Gather Info on Solar Power Facility
Gather Info on Thermal Power Facility
Gather Info on Wind Power Facility

I used to be the manager who used to run this place. Back then, I was pitying myself too much did not do my job. I mean I did not want to devote my whole life here at this place. Why? Um.. My dream was not this. I was having hard time getting hold of myself and the high officials have gave me a few months vacation. When I cam back, this place had changed a lot as if time had went fast only in this place.. Something bad must had been done. It was only a few years..
A few years ago I used to run this place. Power equipment? I recently check the place in hope to find my precious CD. CD? It is not something used in the computers. I will be here until I find it.
The top priority is to understand current situation so in order to communicate better, would you please go tell the Student Director (Dispatched) about my being here.

Go down East, you will be able to find a big building. It used to be the place where hydropower plant was.. I think you will be able to find a clue if you investigate the building condition and the various information..
Check the Nuclear power Plant located at the end of Northeast from the Control Tower. It is the main power source of all the other power plants here.
There is a very high-tech Solar power Plant at Northwest. I have seen a very powerful mutant. It is almost impossible to get it.
Behind you, there is a thermal power plant very near. We just came from that side. I could not find anything particular but it looked less aged than other facilities.
There was a wind power plant on the way back. It did not work when I was still the manager here but it must be getting its energy from deep down underground.

While I still worked here, there was a Guard Robot built with newest technology. It was 100% robot and was not controlled by humans. I am shocked because it is now half human and half robot because of a virus. I am making a simple machine with Power Researcher P to get inside of a power plant and we need a part that is used to make Guard Robot. Please go defeat them and get me some useful parts.
It seems to be the right parts. It shall be well used. Thanks! I will inform you when I get close to the basement of a power plant.

Just like the guard robot, the canines which were guarding this place also got infected to virus. Please defeat the Guard Dog (Elite) which is stronger than the regular ones. It shall buy us some time here.
I was lost my love arrow. Can you help me?
Can I ask a favour of you?
I heard to birds.I was while a bit sleeps in a grove, cyclops steal my arrow of love Can I have my arrow of love please? If you help to me, I'll offer power of love to you.
Thank you, Kindly student. You can using power of love while 15days¡¦
This Terminal controls the access to the Student Center 2 Building.
The Force Field function of this Terminal is operating properly.
The Force Field Optimization is completed! Please proceed to the next terminal to complete the Optimization process.
You are required to gather 13 Spiritual Spheres to optimize the Force Field function of this terminal.

Sigh.. I don't even know where to begin. My situation is a bit complicated because I have to attend to the Health Advisor's request in searching for first-aid medicines. Sad to say, I lost the list of medicines. This is a serious problem.

This is the first time in my life that I've met a problem that doesn't make ant sense even one bit. I can't even go outside to know the actual situation. Where in hell did these mobs came from? Not so long ago, I nearly found myself dying in the hands of these creatures while I was rescuing a friend of mine. I barely escaped the jaws of death and I tell ya... It was horrible!
Ask about the situation on the streets.

Hmmmm?Let me see. Even though I had a tough time coming here, I don't think I have any other information to tell you. Wait! Hold on for a minute... There is this thing called the Abrasive Potion. You can utilize this item to produce better equipments.

Open the inventory window and choose the Abrasive Potion. Drag the Potion the item you want to transform by clicking the top right position of the item, and the transformation process will begin.

These mobs bring nothing but destruction to the environment.
Ask whether are there any useful information.
You mean the mail from the Headquarters of the Finance Department? Hmmm... I actually had this kind of documents before; but I'm not sure where I placed it.

Oh my God! I almost forgot... I didn’t think about it at the start. I was thinking of asking you to do something. I really didn't know it was chaotic outside. I was no aware that these weird mobs are perpetrating outrages in and out of the campus. This is the main reason why I cannot go outside.
Well... This is the note! Thanks for finding it! Still, the chaotic situation remains even though this note has been found. Sigh...
Please be kind enough to get these medicine supplies to the Health Advisor.

Oh! You have found all of them! Thank you very much Student! Please take these medicines to the Health Advisor now. Please take these medicines to the Health Advisor now. The people causing disorder in the campus prevents me from bringing these medicines to the Health Advisor personally.
Hmmm... Did the Health Advisor like it? Oh! He did?

Sorry for causing you too much trouble. I really appreciate all your efforts. Thank you for doing your part in aiding the eradication of these dangers in the campus. Your performance is indeed impressive. If ever I meet your teachers again, I would not forget to mention the good things you did for me.
In case that the transformation fails, all previous transformation results will be lost.
Ah! It’s over here. It looks like it's not that very important; but it was requested personally by the Student Director himself before.
Maybe he sets limits on how he puts his trust on students. What is important is that the document is still here.
Not so long ago, the Health Advisor's written note requested by the Blood Drinker was stolen.
I am sorry for bothering you; but may I know where did you find the stolen note?
The Health Advisor has ordered several times to recover that first-aid medicine as soon as possible.
Student! Please accept my request again.

There are fellas known as the Blood Drinkers. They rob people who posses the medicine. It is evident that these Blood Drinkers have the medicines. Please make sure that people will not be robbed again.
Those crazy street folk carrying ang waving their knives around are exceptional! Especially that group of mobsters known as the Gangsters!
Even though you see everyone carrying blood-stained knives around, you necessarily don't have to be afraid of these slashers.
Student, please do me a favor. Help me acquire those knives from the Gangsters. Although it is impossible to acquire all their knives; I think getting 10 knives from them shouldn't be a problem.
I heard there appear more capital item. You can get the rumor through campus's cross junction there~
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him.
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him.
Oh! Finally, students are able to access this area! How was your journey? Its dangerous to be in the streets at these times. I hope you are here to help.
Oh! Finally, students are able to access this area! How was your journey? Its dangerous to be in the streets at these times. I hope you are here to help.
Oh! Finally, students are able to access this area! How was your journey? Its dangerous to be in the streets at these times. I hope you are here to help.
Oh! Finally, students are able to access this area! How was your journey? Its dangerous to be in the streets at these times. I hope you are here to help.
See, Does your deity exist? Only one?
My dear student, please accept my request. I need you help on this.
Student! Please help me take care of the mobsters who looks exactly like me. By taking away whatever weapons you find from them, you can help eliminate the havoc they bring to the streets.

I am very sorry for causing you too much trouble. I just would like to make the image of the Police Department to be more respected. These mobsters dressed like us cause disgrace to the Police Department.
Thank you very much! I feel better now. Once again, the good image of the Police Department was restored.
These vile mobsters dressed like Police Department Officers cause havoc in the streets. People tend to think that the Police Department has become part of the evil Green Organization.
Am I confusing you? I am sorry, these stuff is a bit irrelevant to you interests. Anyway, I am very thankful that students like you are here to help.
I am a Guard destined to patrol the Sacred Financial Group facilities. My designation here still remains the same.
Originally I was doing some clerical work for the Leonair Campus Laboratory. Sadly, not long ago, a war broke out here. I came here to offer some support.

Hmmm... Let me recall. As soon as I arrived here, I saw this super strong light beam shooting out at me and then I fainted. I regained my consciousness a few days after that weird event. When I woke up, I saw my hand holding a knife which was stained with fresh blood!
I had no clue who the hell I killed. I cannot recall. After that, things got from bad to worse. Since then, I started saw these mobsters looking exactly like me!
I have heard from passers-by here that these bunch of clones patrol theSacred Gate Hole area.
Look at me! Do I look like a violent individual? I cannot do something like that. I believe something weird happed. Maybe I was possessed or something.
Sometimes I go into a sudden trance! I am worried that would go and kill another person again. I feel weird.
Are there any other students who came here to help?
Report the situation of the comrades
Report the main culprit of the violence
Pass the Trading Hole Police request
Inform the results of the investigation of Jail
Inform the results of the investigation of Jail facilities
Some Trails were discovered what is your opinion
Inform the results of the apprehension of Prisoners
Ask if he is in a trouble
Suddenly an explosion happened , and the people turned strange. Of course the criminals lawlessly used violence Even the Police and watchmen's power increased

There's no way to guard the prison , I feel like escaping towards the Trading Hole. Upon gathering my senses , I realised that I was the only one left. Furthermore my whole body was trembling , I did not want to even think about going inside.
The student is from the Sacred Financial Group college. Well , do you want to listen to my request?
Please help my friends... I do not know whether if we are too late.. Please... I remember that it's near the Main gate.
We are too late¡K. Do you still want to try? Hey , there's still something I need to ask a favour of , please listen My friends have been killed by those scumbags , please find the main culprit.
I can't understand it But it's just a simple psychology sickness , this thing should never have happened... Right? Sigh¡K I do not know whether it's a sure thing.

Even the police are starting to rebel. No matter who sees it , it's not normal I heard that the Trading Hole police are alright aren't they? Please report the matter to them I don't know what else is happening , I need to wait for my orders here.

I also have the same feeling about it. Though I have only done Police duty , but it's obvious that there's something extraordinary happening inside. I cannot confirm what is it , but it's definitely not a good thing.
Understood. I might be the only one who understands the design of the place. Please first check out the places that I told you.

The facilities nearby should be checked out. If the quake's source comes from beneath , obviously we have to enter the underground centre to find out more... After checking out the nearby places then we should know.

Now we should focus on investigating the underground facilities , we can start after preparing sufficient manpower and equipments. let's go and confirm again the facilities underground. Next we should investigate the Prison facility.

There is still no reliable clue. After some investigation , it seems that only the convicts might be able to escape from the prison There's no way to do it. Even if the information is little , we still have to report this to the Trading Hole Police.

I heard that the students are quite cautious Thank you for your help.. Normally this wouldn't have happened , is the death tally high? I will seek revenge for my friends even if I have to die. This is inevitable. See you...

That glove is made from asbestos . So are the shoes ? Those are made from heat-proof ingredients. Normally he isn't someone that you can rely one. Towel ... this smells poisonous What burnt smell is that? So....
The mystery is solved. The culprits are still inside. It's the guard!

There's no way to apprehend it? The thing that transformed into a monster wouldn't be captured so easily. But the will of the dead police can be resolved. It will be much easier now. I represent the police in giving thanks to the students. Thank you very much .. really thank you all so much .

Just returned. A criminal passed by just now, I caught him. I have on me some pieces of stuff.. Though we have to completely see it to find out... It is obvious that it has the same logo as the government's. Having this thing on , I do not know whether it has bigger implications. Can you help me find the other pieces?

Can you show me where? This¡K. Hmm... It's fake. When you first see it complete , you wouldn't be able to know whether it's fake or not Though you did well , but it's in such a broken condition , therefore you can single out its weakness.
Actually the certificate surface requires some stacked negatives. But it would be troublesome to reject them. Please report this to the Trading Hole Police.

A prison run by a Financial Group , isn't it strange? Even if it is recognized internationally , it's still hard to comprehend Though all my duties are assigned here , I would not simply come here. It's my first time seeing such a bad environment to escape. Before escaping I think I saw some strange creature. Ah , it's not the time. Please report the Prison's current state to the Trading Hole police.

Oh , you mean this box? This is the only thing that remains after escaping the prison. Though I have no idea it's like that... But it has been very helpful I think it has to do with something that is locked at the 2nd floor. As long as you find the key and CD , it can be opened , do you need any help?
As long as you have the key and CD it will be alright. Besides us , it's guarded by former guards of Citizens Company You can find it from them.
Thank you very much. I can help you shortly.
It's a mutated ore found nearby the prison. It's rarely seen. You can find the broken stone at the Ore Mine which is between the prison fences.
Thank you for your help in the investigation.There's still a small matter , there are a few important items that are needed, I hope you may be able to help me find them.
Thank you, thanks to you the investigation has been run smoothly.
Please get a weapons in there. I know the place that hide weapons.

I am worried that if the rioting prisoners might escape from the prison because of the chaos created by the Phenomenon. We must stop the riot before they escape but we have left all the weapons inside... I know it is not easy but would you please go find them inside the prison?
Good! It may not be possible to defeat all the prisoners but it will be possible to stop them from esacping from the prison.
Students cumulated a lot of experiences with regards to their training. Completing examinations and tests will determine the extent of their capabilities!
Ask about Root Hole old man
Students cumulated a lot of experiences with regards to their training. Completing examinations and tests will determine the extent of their capabilities!
Ask about Root Hole old man
Students cumulated a lot of experiences with regards to their training. Completing examinations and tests will determine the extent of their capabilities!
Ask about Root Hole old man
Students cumulated a lot of experiences with regards to their training. Completing examinations and tests will determine the extent of their capabilities!
Ask about Root Hole old man
Once a Student passed all the exams, it proves that the capabilities of the students is powerful.
Ask about Root Hole old man
Up to what extend can the Students' capabilities be tested? I am really curious about it!
Ask about Root Hole old man
Ask about Root Hole old man
Oh! Why are you late? Thanks! You came here just to bring the Mail to me?
Here! I advise that you take a rest first!

Firstly, I would like to make sure how far students are familiar with Geography. Have you encountered the Cordies, Freezing Halogens, WereWolves, and Shadow Crows? Do you remember where they are located? I will give you 20 Minutes to locate them and collect a specimen of their saliva and feathers.
Yes! You brought them all? Thanks! It seems that you collected sufficient experience on the locations of these creatures! You passsed my First Test! Congratulations!
OK, that's all! Would you like to take the Second Test?
Antony, Frankno, Salandu, Dalama, Aida, Panarol, Kalasanoya, Huianolu, Aima, Kanaauni! Do you know who they are?
Was it difficult for you to find these Pills? Thanks a lot! You passed the 2nd Test!
Here! Do you want to accept the Final Test?

This is the Final Test. Do you feel heavy about it? Am I making you nervous? This exam can reflects the capabilities of the students with regards to their Powers. You have 8 minutes to finish the test. You are tasked to eliminate 15 Hunk Baldies located at the Golf Field area.
This is great! Eventhough it is not complete, the quality is good.
I am sure that there are "Lights" around us. I do not know when would this "Lights" get appreciated.

Even my daughter does not believe me! Before the the abnormal phenomenon came, she didn't say a word. She seems to ignore the incident and refuse to believe my words. Reality shows us that the incident happening around us is not normal!
The students has started to panic during the times of the chaos! I believe that the vile events we have right now is just a beginning. Soon, I feel that the chaos will start to worsen.
I need to test the capabilities of students so that they will be prepared on the things that lies ahead. This is just a control measure.
This mail was acquired from the professor who established Sacred Financial Group.
My daughter is also the student of the Sacred Financial Group. Have you heard about her before? She is still at Level 1. So, she doesn't know that much.
We have to eliminate the evil Senior Student! He has caused too much trouble already.
That senior transformed like the others. He has become an evil monster! Maybe he is in another world now. It was horrible!
It looks like we will never have to understand the language from the other worlds.
In fact, there is another way of pronouncing these words. Am I confusing you? Sorry!

There are weird characters around the area of the Sacred Gate Campus and 3rd Floor of "Green" Underground Foothole Command Centre. Ah! Here is the problem. Aima, Sarandu, Aida, the existence of connecting these three words can be found in Trading Hole.
One of the stuffs they possess are thePainKillers. Please acquire 10 pieces of it within 15 minutes.
Second Exam completed! So, do you want to listen to more information? The professor had predicted this matter long time ago eversince the incident of LiuChengYou in year 1988.
Are you talking about the incident? A few years later, the Sacred Financial Group was recognized internationally then it became a huge organization.
I received essential information before. That is why I know what is happening right now. Recently, I thought that the prophecy was wrong.

The information I recieved before not only explained what happened at the time, but also indicated what will happened later. I have seen the prophecy coming true righnt now considering the activities of the students in this area!
The prophecy indicated a more chaotic situation. I feel we should prepare for what is coming.
Please remember that the spreading war and the abnormal phenomenon are related to the "Light". Students should have a heroic attitude in preparation for the future.
Someday, I will recover my memory of the order that was here before the abnormal situation occurred.
You must remember that we need unity in order to combat the chaos around us!
Please consider that this is the awakening. Before we move to the other dimension, we should have trained very well and have proven ourselves to be worthy.
Have you seen the sun in the Leonair Campus? There is no Light anymore in that area!
Have you seen the sun in the Leonair Campus? There is no Light anymore in that place. The location of Leonair Campus changed all of a sudden.
We should always be aware of the surrounding events around us. This is the time that we should start to be vigilant!
LiuChingYou's incident will serve as a reminder for us to be more vigilant! His previous life was delightful.
Our lives in the next dimension will reflect the lives we have right now. You should remember that!
Please train yourself until you have the power and qualification. This is in preparation of the after-life!
At that time, I will tell you about the door connecting to the other world.
Once you enter the next dimension, you might see individuals like you. You may also encounter more stronger mosters! Keep this in mind.
Where is him last time? That is better i check and confirm again.
That is already standardize. Ok, confirm. Please bring this to him, he will help you.
It's not a good situation here. Can you help us?
Ask for the final attack command
Are you the student the Technical Teacher sent? Ah..wait for seconds.

It all came true. They've been moving upon the directive of their boss. Hm, everybody reports to the Chaser, then the Chaser must be the leader of Searcher Unit. OK, then she is the one you have to eliminate first! There's no time to hesitate! Go!

Hm.. I need to report current situation of Lost City to Saint Foundation for more students to fight. One of agents from Saint Foundation dispatched would be around here and have a way to communicate with Saint Foundation, but I lost him. Please find him and tell him about this situation instead.

I found within the directives on search that the main force has been delivering the directive of search. Before they send them all, we can interrupt the enemy with snatching the directives. Can you do that?
Great works! Please keep collecting the directive of search as much as possible!

Scientist Teacher sent us details. The boss of the enemies is positioned at the deep inside Chaos Island. The thing is that you will confront many monsters in front. Eliminate them all and secure the entry! Go!
Thank you so much! Now that we can approach to the boss without a hitch, please report this situation to Student Director and ask the final attack. I'll wait here.
I feel strange here. I assume that the enemy decides to advance to attack. It may damage the students in rear. Can you gain time?
Thank you! The burden of the rearguard students is now lightened.
Citizen need your help from suspicious men. I can't help her,, if you have power, help her please.
I'm sorry. But, I think you can't help her. You need more training. When you have enough power, help us please.
Before, I said that citizen need your help from suspicious men... I believe you.... Please help her.
Thank you. There is many suspicious men. If you're not expecting it, you will run into danger. Please take care...
Really? I was worried .... but, it's disappear to see you.
Ah.. Thanks~ If the officer just tells me where I should look for, I might find it by myself.. That's why I couldn't do anything..
I could endure the attacks from those kids. But it is hurting~ And the school uniform is too thin...
Oh.. What is this clothe? Maybe I can bear some hits.. I wonder I could counter a single hit... Anyway thanks.. It will be handy~

The weird thing is... the school campus is very nice.. like the style and statue. But the classroom equipment is so poor... There is no air condition, even no electric fan. And in winter, it is so cold.. So I thought. maybe.. this school is not for teaching the student.
One told me that he find document for me. So, I'm waiting him, now. But, he still doesn't come here. Could you help me for find document?
They hate me by I'm late. So, I need to study more than they. Could you find me for learn quickly ?
Thank you. If they come back here, they will find me. So, I'll wait them untill they back here.
I'll study here by myself. Thank you
This section is exclusive to Sword Section Students. You could stay for a while if you want to.
Is there anything I can help you with?
Hmm ... Sword Section ... one word- POWER! Yes! That means your character possesses the power. Just remember to train a lot and use it for the right reasons.
Although brandishing your sword non-stop could comprehend the method. I would still repeat the basics so listen carefully.
Stand in front of your party. Protecting them is your primary job. This is how Swordsman exhibit their power.
Initially, your character's Skill Points is set to 0. You earn 1 additional skill point every time your character levels up. You can use these points to learn new skills.
What do you want to know?
Ask about the methods of training
Ask about the methods of combat
I’ve found out that the quests before are not that difficult. But now... it’s too hard for me to accomplish them.
Hmmm?The registration process is almost done. The next procedure is to request for an Exit Approval.

There are two things that you can do if you have the strength. Either you attack your enemies or protect your friends.
You know which is correct without me telling right? Remember, hurting other people will only be forgiven if you do so to protect other persons.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
If you distribute the points to Strength, Stamina and Dexterity, your character will grow into a Swordsman exhibiting very fast attacks.
If you concentrate on Strength. Your character will grow into a Swordsman inflicting high damages to targets.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Take note that the Sword Section consumes a relatively large amount of SP.
If your SP is consumed completely, your accuracy and attack rate will diminish. This will expose your character to a dangerous situation.
Therefore, be careful when you cast a skill.
All kind of skills, when leveled up causes conflict with each skill points.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

Even though it's just my observation, but all the teachers and students from the school came out fine. Please remember that the evil can’t control everyone! Now, there are hardly a few decent human beings around. Most of them are transformed into evil monsters. But this situation can be solved. The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be. Please remember that.

There is something that you must do before submitting your registration form. Just like what I said before, these aggressive mobs are causing destruction in our campus. Please go outside and prevent them from causing more destruction.
Whatever happens inside or outside of this building, carelessness will just completely change your destiny.
After submitting the Exit Approval Form, you are entering a world of danger. Please remember this!

Oh you saw.. the list of saint.. It is true that there is nothing wrong with list. You might be curious about the behind.. Right? Why are there many students that have a problem in their family ? Actually it is simple. There is not many parents that send their children to experimental school. Even if the school offers extraordinary features, it doesn't matter for the parents who think the tradition importantly.

Many people raise this question.. Whether It is forgiveness work or not. Hm.. By the way I have no right to teach you then! I have to force you about what I don't know well. You know there are arena in trading hole. Look for the teachers there.

The internet connection isn't working properly , therefore we cannot obtain any information.

Welcome We have prepared some gifts for the new batch of students. When you enter the Main Centre , you will see alot of bread , please do take some If you do not know the entrance's whereabouts , press the "M" key to bring up the game map to assist you. Besides that , the "H" key will help you in other areas , please check it out.
Ha ha! Yes you can commute using the school bus, its better than travelling on foot!
Oops! I'm sorry! I didn't know you are there! I've been very busy trying to find out what the hell is wrong with this piece of wreck!

Oh! This bus is non-operational. I cannot even get this thing to work. I really need to fix this Bus so that students can travel safely. It is dangerous walking around considering the chaos in the outskirts. Too bad! There are no spare parts available to fix this thing.
Ask the driver more about the bus.

Based on my assessment of this piece of wreckage, I can say that repairing this bus is not a major problem. However, the spare parts required to repair this vehicle need to be acquired as soon as possible. I cannot repair this bus unless I can get all the necessary spare parts.
Thank you for bringing the spare parts required. Finally, I can start repairing this wreck. The students can now use the bus to conveniently move from one area to another.
Please visit the Construction Supervisor located near the crossroads of the Sacred Gate Campus. I heard he has a favor to ask from me; but due to this bus problem, I cannot go to him personally.
This bus problem started a few days ago. It has worsened since then. Now, the bus cannot even move at all. It seems that other buses in the area is having similar problems.
Excuse me. Can you be kind enough to help me acquire some spare parts from the Technical Teacher located near the college Crossroads so that I can get this bus moving again?

"Have you ever been to SG Hole? If so then you must have met those inferior Green Mask (Uncle Potato). Because of their threats I am afraid to drive the bus. If you can please defeat them and scare them away."
Thanks! Now I will be able to drive this bus around.

You want to know more about the Bus? Hahaha! Obviously, the Bus is used by students in order to move from one area to another. It is a more convenient means of transportation compared to walking or running around by foot.
Oops! I'm sorry! I didn't know you are there... I've been very busy trying to find out what the hell is wrong with this piece of wreck!
Ask him about what he is doing.

Oh! This bus is non-operational. I cannot even get this thing to work. I really need to fix this Bus so that students can travel safely. It is dangerous walking around considering the chaos in the outskirts. Too bad! There are no spare parts available to fix this thing.

Based on my assessment of this piece of wreckage, I can say that repairing this bus is not a major problem. However, the spare parts required to repair this vehicle need to be acquired as soon as possible. I cannot repair this bus unless I can get all the necessary spare parts.

Thank you for bringing the spare parts required to fix the bus. Finally, I can start repairing this wreck. Once I am done fixing this bus, the students can use the bus to conveniently move from one area to another.
Please visit the Construction Supervisor located near the Crossroads of the Mystic Peak Campus. I heard he has a favor to ask from me. However, due to this bus problem, I cannot go to him personally.
This bus problem started a few days ago. It has worsened since then. Now, the bus cannot even move at all. It seems that other busses in the area has the same problem too.
Excuse me. Can you be kind enough to help me acquire some spare parts from the Technical Teacher located near the College Crossroads so that I can get this bus moving again?

Welcome! Would you like to try our delicious Ice Cream?
Ask about the Ice Cream Stall

Oh yes! Actually, I am a part-timer. I am quite ashamed to say that I don't really know much. However, I am pretty confident when it comes to the food business like cofee and deserts. I can really make good coffee! If everything goes along fine, I want to run a coffee shop of my own. It is sad to see that the situation in the city is chaotic. Part of our contribution to help eliminate the disorder are recycling works. It is really difficult that why we need people in the community to help. Student, would you be willing to collect recyclable rubbish in exchange for Ice-Cream? Do you want to try?

I will let you have some of our Ice Cream if you help us collect recycled trash. Would that be fine with you?
Accept Request to Collect Recycled Trash

This is what you should do. Please collect the bottles from the folks who are carrying light poles accompanied by vile hounds. They just make these bottles useless. We need these bottles for our recycling tasks. Could you help me bring back those bottles?
Oh! Are you done collecting the bottles? Difficult isn't it? Here, please have this Ice-Cream! If you would like to try one more time, please don't hesitate to inform me.
So... you want to do it again ? You are really helpful! Thank you!
Oh yes! Actually, I am a part-timer. I am quite ashamed to say that I don't really know much. However, I am pretty confident when it comes to the food business like cofee and deserts.
I can really make good coffee! If everything goes along fine, I want to run a coffee shop of my own. It is sad to see that the situation in the city is chaotic.
Recycling work is difficult you know? That is why we try our very best to help out!
Oh, Thank you. That was fast! I thought it will be depleted soon, so I was asking for help. Anyway I don't need to worry about it for a while since you already bring them
I'm not sure why the streets became like this. I consider myself lucky for being able to find a safe hiding place over here. Sheesh! I really do not know what will happen to me if I am not careful.
You still have no idea regarding the chaotic situation after seeing the outskirts? These things started to become like these as I was cleaning the streets. The violent mobs scared the hell out of me!
