Let me think... Are you referring to the strange crying children? Heaven forbid; I hope they are not yet abducted by the evil mobs.
Can you please pick out the rubbish and pass them to me? You should be able to collect the recyclable items by sweeping the streets.

Those crazy mobsters running around with roller skates and the crazy girls holding screwdrivers jumping around are the primary culprits for the rubbish around the streets. As long as we keep these fools from roaming around, we can start bringing order to the streets.
As expected... I thought collecting these rubbish wouldn't be a problem. You can now pass the rubbish to me.
Do you think that these rubbish still need to be gathered? For us Street Cleaners, it will definitely be better if all garbage and rubbish are organized and collected. Please help us ok?

It is great to know that you are here to help. There are these monsters who make our job more difficult in bringing the order to the streets. I'm not trying to exaggerate. Those long-furred dogs pulling milk-bottle carts gives me the creeps. Beware of them! You may also get bitten by them someday ... I'm not kidding... It is possible you know!?
Do you really want me to give you this? Here! Take it. This is enormous, you really must be careful.

Whoa! It looks like you've taken care of those monster-like dogs! How the heck did you do it? Thank you very much for your help. Finally! I can now start cleaning the street without worrying to be bitten by those hounds.

I'm not sure whether you'll feel weird after hearing from me that disposing those rubbish is an essential! Maybe you think that these stuff can cause nothing but pollution. I sincerely believe that there is something special behind those rubbish. Please help be acquire what I need by collect some rubbish stuff around.

Somebody said that they saw it taken away by group of strange people called the Wrestlers. Although I'm not sure whether they are still holding the rubbish or not, I do need your help to find out if they do.

Wow! Thank God! You found it! Hmm... It would be better if I take this to the Research Institute for their investigation. I have a feeling it is not going to be good news? Huh, what did you say? Sorry! Don't mind me. I was just talking to myself.

I only wanted to go sweep the Golf Course. Suddenly, I found myself being chased by these ridiculous girls carrying golf sticks. I didn't even have the chance to do my sweeping because these nutcases chased me all the way here. Don't you think the world will become a mess if nobody is assigned do the sweeping?

Oh! Please... I got goose bumps seeing those golf-sticks wielding at me. It was terrible! Ha! There are also mobs carrying bombs! They are dangerous. Be careful! Yeah! Those huge individuals are one of the dangerous mobs I've ever seen! Please be careful!
A golf stick! I've seen one of these before. However, I am not familiar with this specific one.

The living area of the locals are very limited. These nasty scums causing trouble just make the lives of the people in this area a living hell! The scums even let a few students get stranded! Please try to help them.
Although there are only a few of those scums around, try your best to nab 20 of them! I know you possess enough power to take them out! Please try your best to eliminate them now!

We are really grateful that you are here to help. Students like you should be concerned of the situation after experiencing this chaos. We all agree that this strange phenomenon must be taken care off as soon as possible.

The lack of resources today reflects the chaotic future we will experience if students don't contribute to the resolution of the situation. There are other matters you have to think about. For the meantime, will you help me collect some Empty Bottles? No matter what happens, you need to take care of the medicinal items carefully.
Could something unfortunate happened to him? Perhaps he went through an operation which made him a cyborg. What do you think?

The quantity of normal students is declining. This is a very depressing situation! I'm not sure whether it involves a group of delinquent students or a group of lazy airheads with mental problems. I just know there's a group of vile individuals loitering around throwing rubbish on the streets on purpose. It's really nasty!
What's worse is that they choose to throw around rubbish which cannot be recycled!
Do you think there's no need to see the content of the rubbish!? Please be quick and just take it over there.
Ah, yup! If this is the case, go over the Financial Group Research Institute! Oh wait.. No! Its at another place. I'm sorry... Try the Recycling Research Centre, it should be over there.
Hahahaha! Don't fret! It's not something that's worth worrying about.
Hmm? You need to check the contents of the rubbish first. Alright?
I want to clean the golf course but an enormous dog took away the key used to access the cleaning materials.
Hmm... How do I say this? Somebody threw away something which he shouldn't have.
Student! Can you go check the contents of the rubbish for me? Once you find it, collect it and get it back to me.
Let me handle this. I'm really sorry to bother you. This was supposed to be the stuff I'll pass to you after I'm done cleaning.

Looks like it's not going to a big deal. These rubbish looks to be collected and arranged properly. Although I'm not sure if this is enough to reward you for helping me... Can you please accept this as a token of my appreciation?

This was something I overheard while I was doing my sweeping rounds... There was this bunch of never-seen-before nasty guys who identifies themselves to be part of the "Green" Organization. They and started causing mayhem by harassing the locals.

A few days ago I witnessed a glimpse of the treacherous activities of that evil organization. I heard they had all the students clumped up into one place suffocating them to death! This is Horrible! What the heck caused the delay in action?

The number of policemen around the area is few. We still need additional manpower that can be utilized and mobilized to scout the whole area. You know what I just heard? The violent "Greeen" Organization are hiding at their headquarters near the dock warehouse. It is located opposite the Trading Hole No. 1 Passage. Do you have any information about them?

What I'm worried about is the moment when the students become scattered, what should we do then? ...Ah yup! I picked this up while doing my cleaning too. I'm sorry to have troubled you... do you want to take this?

Although I don't remember when it started. many boxes are spotted nowadays. Based on my experience, I would know what it contains when I shake it. I am sure it will contains something like 'Add-on Kit'. But it won't open easily.. Maybe you could open with oil... But I really don't know what it is inside box.. And It is hard to gather the oil.. I'm doubt I could open this box. Maybe.. Do you want to try?

The tuna oil would be one of the suitable oil you can find easily near this area. In wharf, there are many workers of tuna fishing boats. But you cannot not use any tuna oil and the quality of tuna is not always same. Can you gather 10 bottles of high quality tuna oil?
Oh~.. Ok! Ok! The box is here.. Try to open it.. Good Luck..
Oh my goodness! Why are so many people injured?
Pass the Papers for Medical Report

There isn't much medicine left. Unfortunately I can't help those who are severely injured. However, I can still be able to treat those who have suffered minor injuries. Due to the limitations of my skills, I cannot help injuries of students beyond Level 15.
¹Ì¾È, ³» ½Ç·ÂÀ¸·Î ÇÐ»ýÀ» Ä¡·áÇß´Ù°¡´Â ¿ÀÈ÷·Á ÇØ¸¦ ÀÔÈúÁöµµ ¸ô¶ó.

I cannot say that it is a kind of epidemic or sickness. I believe it is more of a serious chemical reaction where the victim's body get burned, paralyzed by electricity, or frozen. There are also other situations where the victim's body becomes stiff as a stone.
Ask about the effects of the burns
Ask about the effects of the paralysis
Ask about the effects of freezing
Ask about the effects of poisoning
Ask about the effects of suffocation
I have no idea regarding the recurring situation outside. However, I have heard from different conversations between teachers that the situation doesn't look good at all.
When the victim's whole body is exposed to burns, the physical strength and stamina will be degraded into a weakened state. Burns bring fatal effects to a victim's health so please be careful.
If a victim is shocked and paralyzed by electricity, his/her movement speed slows down.

When the body of the victim is frozen, the body stiffens which causes the movement rate to decrease and the defense mechanism to be weakened. If the victim is allowed to suffer in this condition for a prolonged period of time, the effects could be fatal.

The condition of the victim's physical strength will decrease continuously if poisoned. After being poisoned, the physical strength and stamina of the victim will decrease gradually. The rate of damage from being poisoned is higher than the case of getting burnt. Please be aware of this fact!

When a victim is suffocated, the movement of the victim will immediately become awry. However, this condition will not last long. Having said that, it is still considered a dangerous condition. Please be careful not to get suffocated!
Although the medicines I have are not really enough to heal your condition. I would still try my best to aid you. Please let me take a look at your injury.
Ask about the treatment of wounds

Oh! Are you going to register? I bet this is your first time to register. I've never seen anyone as stiff as you. Do you understand the terms of registration? I can assure you that you could always come to me to get some treatment until you reach level 15. Please do visit me in case you need some treatment. Don't you think it'll be more convenient if you change your Save Point over here?

Writing these medical reports is really an exhausting work. Can you help me solve my problem because I ran out of papers? There are stocks of papers available at the Welfare Society. Can you go there and get some papers for me?

Ah! Thank you very much! This job requires me to write Medical records all day. If you get injured in the future, please fell free to approach me. I will attend to your medical needs and make sure you get quality treatment.

Oh! You already got it? Thank you very much! You have been a great help! If not for these medicines, we will have shortages in supplies. It will cause havoc to the campus if we do not have first-aid medicine supplies like this. I hope the situation outside would get better. I'm really afraid if the situation continues it would bring disorder to the campus.

The quality and quantity of medicine supplies are not good at all. This causes us to produce our own means of acquiring medicine supplies. Excuse me. Would you be willing to help me collect some Cigarette Butts? Have you ever heard of the two notorious chain-smokers around? They are the Little Hooligan and the Hooligan. The last time I requested for cigarette butts from someone, I found out that the quality of the cigarette butts from the Little Hooligan are not of good quality. I couldn't use them to produce medicinal materials. Would you help me acquire cigarette butts from the Hooligan instead? Ah! Don't worry. I'll exchange some of my money with you if you get me 20 cigarette Butts from the Hooligan.

Wow! You already collected the Cigarette Butts! Thank you so much! Starting today, we should be producing our own medicinal materials. So, in case you have any available time to spare in the future, please come here and help me again. Ok?

We are not just experiencing a shortage in medicines but also a shortage in medical supplies used for treatment. If the situation continues to be like this, we have to come up with procedures to acquire all necessary medicine supplies and equipments by ourselves. I just had a great idea! There is a group of mobs outside called Street Junkie. They carry and wear bandages and plasters. Yes! I remember these fellas actually carry bandages in their pockets. These Street Junkies really don't need those bandages. I believe that other students will benefit a lot from those bandages. Having said that, will you help me get bandages from the Street Junkie? The supplies for bandages are minimal. We should therefore acquire these bandages to compensate the need for it.

This is great! Thanks! Most students look tough on the outside. Deep inside they are really quite as obedient as you are. You really have to communicate pleasantly to people so that they will treat you with respect. Anyway, thanks a lot! I might come and ask for your assistance again in the future. *smiles*

How are you Student? The Police Officers are here to help you sincerely. What do you need?
Ask about management office authentication plan
Tell about the result of unknown boy
Ask if there is something I can help
Deliver the security monitor video tape
Report the jail situation to police station
I think you should get advise from some of the people in this area. Most of them are aware of the "Special Language".

Sure! I can let you borrow this equipment. Was is requested by the Image Expert? I entrust this equipment to you and that shopkeeper because I believe that he is a professional. He knows how to handle this equipment. Please return it after you are done.
Have you sent it to him? That was nice! We lack manpower right now that is why we might ask you to help us with some tasks. I am sorry if we caused you too much trouble!
Hmmm... The important mail was stolen. We must get it back. Sadly,we are short of hands. There are no available officers on post. I hope we could get some students to help us.
Thank you! That was fast! Ermmm.... The mail was torn into pieces. Could you help me find the other pieces?
This is great! You can recover the mail by assembling these torned pieces. Try to assemble them and see what we can make out of it.

I know it is unusual for a Police Officer to beg for help from citizens like you. However, the lack of available manpower in the Station renders us to do so. I am very thankful that students like you are willing to help us out.
As expected, you are done with the investigation! That was great! However, we still lack some clues and evidence.

Ah! Thank you very much! With this, we can start using the database to continue our investigation. Meanwhile, could you help me to investigate this rumor? I heard that there is a giant dog wearing kid's clothing nearby.
I was surprised! Could it be that some kids transformed into dogs? Taking into consideration the weird situation around I have no doubts that it is possible. It is so weird!
It seems that the Sacred Financial Group has something to do with the chaotic incident. We just need to undergo further investigation to prove that.
Similar things like these already happened before; but, people just ignored the incident.
I just received a confirmed report that the Police Department in the other area also lacks manpower. This just causes more trouble on our part.
So the sender is Professor Chui Tai Gui... I think Ang Bee Lan who is loacted at Trading Hole Residential Area knows him. Anyway, I think you should talk to her.
Where did those spores come from? I believe that the disease spreading around was caused by that Spore Allergy.
I already received similar information before. I heard that there are monsters blowing out the Spores in Leonair Campus Basement.
The Force Field function collapsed after the incident.
Not long ago, it was also reported that a number of disappeared around this area.
The chaos right now has caused us to lose energy to pursue or normal duties.
I don't even have a clue where to start. Excuse me, could you help me to collect information regarding the lost children?
If we can access the Police Database, we could get an essential clue regarding the incident. This is not possible right now. We need more outlets to produce these resources.
Excuse me, could you help me acquire the Recovery Disk from the Mystic Peak Campus?
I just need to confirm all the information I am receiving.
Are those dogs really wearing kid's clothing? I think we should collect their saliva so that we can pursue a DNA Analysis.
One moment please... I brought the this simple checking machine to verify the information. Hmmm....
This instrument is not precise. We could not decipher any clue in this sample. Hmmm... The Dog and kid's DNA are almost the same. This is very very surprising. My predictions are true.
Anyway,I will make use of the Police Database to search for more information. I will try my best to solve this case.
This matter could have been produced by a large-scaled organization. I believe this is part of the experiment conducted by the Sacred Financial Group.
Although it is not clear that other organizations utilize the same technique of experimentation; but for sure it is related to Sacred Financial Group's hidden activities.
Come! That Authentication Terminal can give you access in order to proceed with your investigation.
Make sure you have some of your fellow students to help you. It is a very dangerous journey ahead. Good Luck!
oh, you mean that corpse? I just received the info, just abit weird...... That corpse still have pulse
For previous case, no body will bother. But now, we have to get the corpse before we get specialist.
Last time i collect the same type of stone from one of my friend in private jail. We are not specialist, so didn't notice. Is this the last few years they found the special ore?
In this situation, private jail there have something wrong, it need to double confirm wethere have the same type of stone.
Thanks. I had been go through the map before, roughly know the location. You need to pass 3 main gate, around there have ore. Just becareful to do confirmation.
Get from that place, right? We can't contact person incharge, don't know what is the problem now.......
Is it? Jail seem occupied by someone else, it cannot be made by criminal......... hm, have something need your help.
I have received some information, instructor people all disappear. They all went to private jail, please get them.
After mutation, every people get mad. To control this situation, that is better we take notice now.
Can you help me check how many criminal in jail? Please help me check it.
It not a complete document, we not sure wether want to double confirm or not.......
All the name list already list out the level of criminal, for those not in list......guess they still in city.
Main power in jail not enough, now they request for help.
Thank god from the list don't have bad criminal. Heard that have other special name list, but we don't have enough information to do investigation.
oh, still have people collect the information related ore. He is Weapon Shop Owner in middle hole, you wan visit him?
Sorry, just forget it. Now i your help, have a group of weird man grab Scared Gate document.
Please help me get back, urgent!
Thank you so much! erm....did you open the document and read it?
Actually, i will open and read the content even they not. Just now i heard about the proposal, not sure wether that is good project or not.
Oh, that is related with middle hole story~ I also just received the story into about that, can you please help me to confirm again?
Oh, i see. If that is true, Root Hole will be more worst. Weird, just now you mean earthquake? If situation in Root Hole really serious..............
What's happening there? Earthquake in Root Hole? We can't understand what's going on.
Oh, car in Middle Hole Entrance is burning. Please go and check.
That is too dangerous~ What if the car blast?
Any way. it is a bomb. No body know who did it. Wait a minute, is it the warning or fake information causing earthquake?
Really can't understand, it can happen a such big earthquaked in certain area. Need to check, else it dangerous.
Here have a walkie-talkie, please take it to image expert to fix it. You can use this to contact me anytime.
That is very dangerous, what if the car blast?
Any way. it is a bomb. No body know who did it. Wait a minute, is it the warning or fake information causing earthquake?
Still receiving info, just keep contact each other.
Please take the walkie-talkie to image expert to fix it.
Have signal, walkie-talkie is fixed...... That is good for us keep contact with each other.
Oh, need time to clean it up. Here don't have good facilities, but have many weird facilities here......it make me worry.
Heard underground have an experience room. But no body believe it. That is better we go and check.
No use, that is a complete report. We need to give warning, and also student need to becareful.
Check police docuement. Prison there using alot of medicine and equipment. Information need to be confirm.
Quite funny fake document. Even machine also cannot differentiate it. Seem people who know well this system was did it.
Internet connection not start yet, no need bother too much. Thank's for your information.
Last time also have same thing happen in this city.
No, that is police responsibility to check it. But still need to get help from student.......
Data came from campus? Is that is true, situation in Root Holw is getting worst.
I not sure what is the problem now. Please go to Root Hole and check it.
Thank you, it not look like special item. Better request help from Sacred Financial Group.

I have one report that receive every morning. In refrigeration warehouse of main wharf, there are lots of people who come in and out. So the operators cannot maintain the temperature of warehouse. We discovered that they are the old employees with their ID cards. But we are not sure how many they are since there are the bunch of copy spirits. Anyway.. do you want to try gathering ID cards?
There are two kinds of security guards. The one with gun is higher level security guard. Higher level security guards have better chance to have ID card... But they are more dangerous.

Yes. I received them well. I appreciate for your help. I believe it was not easy task.. But we still receive the report every morning. So I think there are still many ID cards. If you have a time, Please help me to collect ID cards more
Thank you very much. I will use as a reference Actually I was looking for this.
Thanks for visiting us. I don't know whether this formal procedure is effective or not, but it might be helpful for somebody.
Since you already here, you should know about Human Segregator. I help professor setup the machine, but notice world is changing now. I not sure what happen will be appear in future.

I escape with other researcher, but after a while I met a student look alike with you. Heard he know the Segregator issues, and said want to fix it up. So I gave my weapon to him. But seem this situation still haven't stop yet.
After that I heard one of the student called ¡§Zhao Chen¡¨ , he took it and run away with abnormal mentality. I want it back.
What to you think about knowing Amaruonuoryin still alive? No matter how, I want to find back the Human Segregator, I think need to get the Clone Sphere Accessory.

When I test the item, machine have record one of the student that already made few Clone Sphere, and also Amanuoruoyin Clone Sphere also appear. But it is not Clone Sphere, even Amanuoruoyin himself in terrible situation, the place will be in Head Office.......
Is it over? I not sure whether Amanuoruoyin know about it, his name is in the name list, don't know what kind of research and reason they record it. If you not keen to help, please leave now!!!
Me should ruin the job or correct it
The ceiling collapsed, the deck also broken ... The windows fell down ... What should be done first?
So, does it mean it has to be done first? It doesn't need much time, not very difficult either, just need a slight press and it is done.
I reorganized all the College's facilities alone. It's a easy job. But don't know where to start.
Ah, my towel Emm, I can work hard only if there is a towel It's bad if don't have anything to wipe while sweating The hand will become slippery and can't hold anything if it is full of sweat.
Glove!! My glove, Can start working now! But where to start? What should I do first?
If just slightly press, the logo won't drop off, need to understand the way of doing it, Don't use force at crooked area, feel like it will slightly bend according to the reversed direction ...
But it will crooked toward the reversed direction if use too much force ... Knowing the correct pressure is very important.
The spider web is the worst, and there are cracks on the wall, desk and black board. Aih, I do not have towel and glove, how am I going to start working?
Emm¡K Help me to find it first.
I think my towel is in the Locker on the 1st Floor, help me to get it¡K I will find the glove by myself.
This means that must work diligently ... Must have towel to work in comfortable way¡K That's right.
But¡K Can't find a decent glove, think carefully, I think it was placed on the shelf in the shop house, help me to find it.
Now you can go, I can complete it by myself, bring this crystal to the Student Director, I don't need it anymore.
This building is currently under supervision. Student, it is great to see individuals like you who are here to help!
Ask about methods of entering building
Ask about 3rd Floor of "Green" Command Centre
This building is currently under supervision. Student, it is great to see individuals like you who are here to help!
Ask about methods of entering building
Ask about 3rd Floor of "Green" Command Centre
Ask if he is in a trouble
This building is currently under supervision. Student, it is great to see individuals like you who are here to help!
This building is currently under supervision. Student, it is great to see individuals like you who are here to help!
Ah! You are the student sent by the Sacred Financial Group right? Can you help us with our investigation?

There are reports stating that there are smuggling activities at Wharf No. 4. Although we need to double check this, there are no ways to do it. Student! Here is my request. Could you help me investigate and acquire the smuggled goods at Wharf No.4?
You found it! Thanks! I am sure that this is enough evidence.
Is there anyone else who would like to help me arrest those smugglers?
The smuggler was known to be a member of the "Green" gangster group who rented this building. Ironically, he does not plan to ran away. He stays in his room most of the time.
Did that suspected fellow fight back? Anyway, thanks a lot! That Green Gangsters seems to be the source of all the crimes here in this area.
I heard that there are students who have special abilities. Could you help me investigate this issue?
Try to look around and investigate the building carefully. See whether can find any clue. Thanks!

Ah! You solved these cases easily! I think you are better in doing these types of tasks compared to the Police Department. Ow!Where did you find this? The money is shining. It looks weird. It seems like there is something special about these notes.
With this paper notes, we already have a reason to arrest them without a warrant. However, the you need to acquie a Terminal Approval before you can get inside the building. That is a problem!
Furthermore, we need to have the key to get through the 2nd and 3rd Floors. Could you help me acquire these keys?
Please be careful! Those mobsters will attack no matter who you are! On the 1st Floor, there is a freezer supervisor. Please don't simply commit a fight. Its very dangerous in that area,
This is the key! Why it is broken! I'm not sure if we can restore this key to its original form.
I think we'll be alright with this. There should be no more problem getting to the 2nd Floor.

To go to the 3rd Floor, we must get the key first. Although the key was bent, you can ask for help from the Warehouse Supervisor. So don't worry! You will face similar dangers on the 2nd Floor just like in the Control Center. Please be careful!
Certainly there are people who dress like Ninjas in that area. Although they do not have the skill to play double, they are obviously different from normal people.
I think this is OK. We should have no more problems getting to the 2nd Floor of that building.
Can you help us completely investigate that building in order to calrify the issues and rumors spreading around?

Thank you! The 3rd Floor is composed of a Ball Room and the Top Management Room. I think we can find the clues we need in that area. However, there are some strong mobsters that awits you. Be careful! Furthermore, those who stay in Top Management Room are international criminals. Don't approach them! It is very dangerous. If you feel you are not capable, just retreat. Do not force yourself against them!

These are torned mails. Don't you have to combine it? Try to combine it now Hmm... It is a real mail letter. The sender is Professor ChuiQingGui. Hold on, this man is the founder of Sacred Financial Group! The letter was intended for HongMeiLan. I heard about this name before.... Anyway, you can return the evidence now!
Excuse me! Please hand this evidence to the Police Station ocated in the Trading Hole. We need to continue with our investigation.
I heard that there was a report of a group fight in this area. The patrol car was here and it took away all smuggled goods. This building is now under supervision and investigation.
These look like normal garbage stuffs, but the content isn't like that. Did you see the White Drug Powder and the Golden Coin?
It seems that it was planned to exchanged with something fake. We need to confirm the powder if it is a drug. In cannot be identified as to what it is by just looking at it.
Anyway, please arrest him after you confirmed that these are illegal drugs.
Since the establishment of the Sacred Financial Group, the "Green" gangsters started to be active in the area near the Trading Hole. It has become their hideout.
From the outside, it looks like a legal Docking operations. These docks welcome illegal transport of international goods from different areas.
I wanted to investigate that building on my own but I can't get into the building after the abnormal phenomenon. Now, I must have sufficient evidence and an arrest permit to perform a search.
Two days ago we hired hacker to break into the terminal. It should be done and tested by now. Go and explain the situation at the Police Station at the Trading Hole to obtain the program.
We are aware of that building's structure! The 1st Floor is a warehouse; while the 2nd Floor contains several offices. The 3rd Floor is composed of the Ball Room and the Management Office.
During the controversial fight, it was certain that all supervisors were not around.
Although the situation out there looks the same, danger still lurks in those areas.
Like what I said before, gangsters are active in this area. Their numbers grew after the Sacred Financial Group was established.
Legend says that the power of students was diminished. Through continuous competition and training they can regain its power.
We should be able to learn something after investigating this Warehouse. Part of our objectives is to search for the source of the abnormal phenomenon.

The security of the Wharf Passage is getting worse every minute. The storage guards, gas technicians, vicious sailors and security guards have turned into monsters and they wander around in groups destroying the goods stacked in the Wharf. People have been fighting over the lacking goods and if this keeps up then more horrible things will occur. I know you must be busy but please defeat them and help me save the goods here.
Thanks to you, I wil be safe for a while!

I'm Seung Hee Ji Sophomore archer class at Sacred Cate campus. Few month ago. I followed my sister that transformed to monster and lost here near here. Actually I made the map of Leonine campus and sign board near here so that I could easily trace the friends and family that has been transformed into monster.
It is like big tombstone here.. A lot of people died for this building for construction. We believed they are the sacrifice for all.. But may not.. I think all of us cannot be happy after all.

Obviously Sacred financial group did several good job for the community. We cannot be disagree on this because there are lots of records for the company work. But there are still people who doubt about that company. Why? because they are too good? Maybe not. I think somebody has to be sacrifice for the others. All of use cannot be happy anyway.

Maybe.. It is me. I am the one who talk about it first. Ok. Look at the these document carefully. I already read them so many times. Although I couldn't find any suspected evidence, maybe the other can find it.

Oh well.. I haven't gone underground laboratory yet. You cannot use stair. Maybe you have to use elevator although I don't know how to activate it. Anyway I think you can go down if you can open it... Probably you need password.

Really? Where? Where did you meet my sister? Where.. accidentally? Ok.. I know you are not expected to meet her sister. But it is good new. . Although I sensed my sister in my heart, I didn't expected that she is really alive somewhere. Thank you a lots. Maybe if you meet my sister again, could you tell her my message? I was so proud of you as my sister and I believe you will be survived in any bad situation.
Inform Siu Er about Glamour Killer
Apply ancient magic to your saint ring.
Apply ancient magic to your saint ring.
Mr. No-Name.. Yes, I remember him. We helped him before. Oh! You brought my head gear here. Thank you very much.
Can you help me? It seems that there is someone spying on us. I can't talk to you here.
The name of the spy is Glamour Killer. It was Lucian who gave the order to spy on me. Can you help me find him?
Lucian's attacks are powerful, be careful.
This is great, I would like to know more information about this can you please help me?
Oh, thank you for telling me the truth...
Me and my partner stayed here to make a better world. We want peace. But we need more power to stop the war.
We came here from another world. There are some who have already brought power here. It is srange, I can feel you have some of that power.
Only selected people can get Saint Power. It is hard to explain to you now, please visit me often. I'll talk to you more about this is in the future.
My friend was injured when we arrived here. Another person took care of him, can you help me find them? Their names are Benu and Yun.
The place looks like its a harbor of some sort. Sadly, I do not know their current location. If you meet Benu, tell him not to worry, I am ok here.
Let me know if you are ready. I will transfer you to their location.
That's great. But.. I will need materials from Death Flame for the medicine. Can you help me?
The medicine's ready, please deliver this to Yun.
Please pass this letter to Yun.
Did you get the item? Thank you, I need to inform my partner..
The information you've gathered is the same as the data collected by adventurers like you. I want to know more, can you help me?

Thank you, I want to use these samples to discover any difference between my world and your world. It is better than doing nothing. By the way, this is the ring with saint power that I told you about. I hope it helps you on your journey.
Looks like your power has increased. Please find So Sung II and get a lambskin from Multilock.
There's ancient magic language hidden beneath this lambskin. We are not sure how it appeared in this world, but using this magic language can increase the Ring's Power.
The saint ring needs to be un-equipped for us to increase its power. We won't be able to do anything if you're wearing it.
I already know how to render the ring. Let me know if you're ready.
The saint ring needs to be un-equipped for us to increase its power. We won't be able to do anything if you're wearing it.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
Increasing Dexterity will allow your character to be a Chemical Expert to deal sustained damage to the enemy as well as debuff.
Increasing Spirit will allow your character to be a Physics Expert to summon beings that deal great physical attack to enemies.
Increasing Strength will allow your character to be a Bio Expert to limit your enemies' actions and increase your abilities.

Is this the papers for the medical reports? These are sample of documents for medical reports. In any case, the Health Room is the only department that uses these. So, it cannot be wrong. What! The Health Room is very busy too? This is why everybody was asked to help the others.
There are also items called Blessed Items. They are more special and quite hard to find. If you obtain these kind of items, could you please keep them properly?
And... I have some items which I have never seen before, but they are really precious items. Look at the information records of our department, and you should be able to enquire and obtain it.
Ah, there is one type of item which cannot be used on your own will. I can't help you with these type of Items.
Please use it only when you are on quest training.

Prior to the dispatch of all items to the various society, the items must be validated and approved first to ensure its quality, pricing and product classification.The education that the Society Members learned can now be utilized.
The resources available from our department has all been cut-off. I'm sorry for not having these items be readily available to students.
If you have unwanted good items, you can come to me. I will exchange them for money.
You can also trade with your friends if you like.

Medical Potion...Recardos Pearl...Soul Fragment...is all I remember

Long time ago, the Black Wing of Priest was kidnapped by a guy who called Dr. Choi Tae-kyu. After that, the priest become a guinea pigs of lab test. The last thing that I remember is...Elite Black Wing of Witch uttered a wail of grief...I want revenge! Especially those researchers who treat us as guinea pigs!
I know one of these day those researchers will get what they deserve from me.... Thank you.
Dalamiya is a tribal gathering society. Carl Sheldon is our Balrog's elder. The person who we trusted and bear important task.
Do you know where he is?
"I'm stuck here since the war with Lucian, i do not know anything. I'm sorry...if have any news or message I will tell to Carl Sheldon immediately."

Under the Environmental Control Tower at Central Park there is an underground facilities. Find the entrance around the tower to enter inside. As far as i know, there are many strange experimental organisms. Be careful.

Students? Yeah, I saw some¡¦
It's interesting!
During the break, they came to attend to some business of theirs.
If that's the case, time should have been combined!
Right?

The students do not even know where their colleges are what more the Financial Group's background? Simply said, the founding of the Sacred Financial Group was originally to disrupt the World's balance.. yeap , that's their original motive.
Ask about the Sacred Gate Financial Group
The students are stubborn. I do not like that kind of behaviour , because the youngsters do not have a tinge of regret within them. Not a single day goes by without something happening.
Ask questions about Sacred Gate Financial Group HQ Building

Should I ignore the old man's advice ? They do not seem different from the other students You mean you want to check out this building? As of this moment , there isn't a solution , as to what seems to be the problem I do not know what might happen Nor do I know how to solve it , nor how to teach

Standing here doing nothing, that's a bit strange.
How did he come here?
How is he not damaged?
Students,
You got to introduce yourself before you ask the Honourable person your questions, If you do not have basic manners , then how do you expect answers?

You guys are really hot-blooded students¡¦
Easily pumped up.
This will only worry people¡¦
Next time when you have an opponent to fight, no matter how big he is, never lose your head.
Your mind will definitely get you the win when everything else fails.
You students must learn how to control your emotions.

Even though there were a few people who passed by this old man.. There was only one student who cared for my body.. Though I know not of his true intentions ... The important thing was his expression.. Hmm , I have no need to worry. The air here definitely betters the others... Due to the break.

Hmmm?
Why are you waiting for this old man?
Hmmm¡¦
When you strangely respect the other person, there definitely must be a motive, right?
Though he would like to escape this dangerous place, it's impossible with a body that's so weak.

Lets say , will you naturally understand it? On this broken road , a stagnant piece of paper and are floating.... If that is the case , the time of this place hasn't completely stopped... The knowledge the students have acquired at this moment has not improved? I feel that it's a good thing not trying to understand .... Hmmmph , it seems that it's understandable This stoppage of time is a natural defence mechanism Playing this role is the Financial Group Main construction company.
Haha, that is because i here..... That woman trust student there and give out all the present.

If that's the case , the old man used to be one. At that time , they connect with another world , even though that¡¦s not the case Now , the same scumbags seem like they are everywhere The Financial Group's youngsters see this as a sign of cloning Simply said , the people cannot be identified as individuals anymore.

Don't you want to give any advice?
I feel like sharing a bit of information¡¦
Hmm, where should I start?
I want to see the student's true colors.
The colors which existed in a totally different world a long time ago.
I don't know whether those colors are a good thing
Why must they fight the monsters, no matter what?

Have you thought about it? Though it's said to be done to survive , but half of them are wrong answers Indirectly controlling whatever sense of responsibility that is left Or it might deny the sense of responsibility Right

From a spectator's viewpoint , a battle opportunity between light and darkness can be seen. That happens from this kind of situation. What do you think? The Financial Group creates these opportunities for the students as a sign of gratitude? If not , it's like a snake ready to pounce isn't it ? Hehe.. Thinking about it , it's pretty interesting.

It will enable the students to become stronger hence allow them to express the peak of their powers , if you do not self-improve , as long you try harder , the abilities will also be able to be showcased . Well , do you want me to tell you what is it?

If you want to change your level , the suitable items must be used. Helping this old man is something that is worth it , a way must be figured out in order to understand the things that he speaks.... Do you understand this concept?

The solid Ring will produce this kind of results, it is a tool which, when used to hit a certain number of times, will cause the functions of the body to be quickened. Of course the it will only work for a certain period of time , everyone's body will then grow slowly, This weapon is created according to each individual's speciality , and you may see the results of the change , have you reached the anticipated time? In other words .... , the proper information is gathered from the students in order to create suitable weapons for them.

Sorry to trouble you. But this process must be immaculately done. It can't be completed with just the ingredients. Ah here are some. Try and use them. Also , some changes may be made on the Ring. If the Director's power increases , then we will grow together with him according to his way A search must be done during the right time.

I accidentally discovered this precious tidbit of information ¡¦
I heard not long ago that if a little change was made on the student's made Ring, a better Ring will be formed.
I happen to have some precious ingredients. If you students add some of these ingredients , you may make a better Ring.
Just broken! That is better do advertisement....but student don't have enough experience........

Hm.. I am not just old man. Let me guess. Your question seems like you are so curious about Sacred Financial Group. Although I don't know much about that company, the most of people praise on what that company achieved.

Is he folk shaman scholar? The one who establishes company.. He was quite loud when the company was established. Oh.. He said that he will unify all schools in the world and the tuition would be free for gifted people,
He also provided the financial support for not only student but also family. And all the buildings near this area was remodeled. Also he was aggressive on several community service supports

I think the most people in this town don¡¯t know about it very well. Ah Right! Maybe you know there is a person who wears a black suit in front of Leonine Campus? He would know about it very well since he is the employee of that company

This building is very different from the others in terms of security. I remember that there are two major security system. The one is the security code inside skin, which the human eyes cannot see. The other one is the voice recognition so if the voice is not registered then you cannot enter this building.

HaHa, I don't know the details since I am not a employee. Maybe there is another security system. Ah. I just remember something for you. You could see the old man like me in Wharf passage. Go there and ask him about it

Why the security system is not so secure, and Why it allows you to enter this building easily... I am so worried about it. And I am more concerned about the fact that you have to enter this building. I got the message from the student who already entered here. He said that he will wait for the incoming students at 1st floor. Just go to the building main door. The security process will be done automatically. You may use the Information Terminal that could read the research docuement.

Since long time ago, I could sense bad feeling. This eight sign of divine.. I think it is not belong this world. Surely it is the key that opens the passage for another world. So you want to use this? Then this divine needs blood. maybe special blood.. Probably you could get it on the top of building. Anyway be careful.

Ok, let me see... How shall I say this?

Ah, I've heard the Construction Supervisor mentioning about this before. I really appreciate that you accepted my request. Due to the strange situation in many areas it would be wise to accept all the help that you will receive from them. Keep up the good work.
It's good that you want to take the examination. In any case, Students or Teachers will have their abilities examined on a regular basis. I hope you don't mind this too much.

Very good you've done well! In your level, you have become a stronger person allowing you to easily overcome the dangers that lie ahead. Despite your achievement you still need to take regular ability examinations to keep you in shape.

The Cleaner gave me these things before he left. Yes, actually it doesn't look any different from regular money, but if you look very carefully these are counterfeit products. Actually, the counterfeit was skillfully crafted that it can pass like the regular money.
Looks like these Currency Notes contain something important and it would be to wise pick-up items that people drop on the streets.
Ask about the location of the Leonair Campus
I am pretty sure that it was located near the Trading Hole Passage, but one day it suddenly disappeared!
It's perfect! Pieces of the map still exist and even the teachers are not aware of this fact.

Hmm... I will need someone to do something for me In order to ensure the basic safety of the students as well as the citizens.I will continue to do my part to help clear up the situation. Unfortunately the mob pestering this area multiplied dramatically.
Well done! The Sacred Financial Group will always appreciate your help in trnsporting reinforcements and supplies.

You came at the right time. It would be unwise to say that we can hold up for another week. Although the situation is but temporary; we will still need to know how to solve these kind of problems in the future.
I don't have the time to explain these things to you. I'll just sum it up in one sentence. There aren't any normal people around this area. Please be careful in approaching strangers.

The capability of our enemies are improving. Their skills are becoming more powerful and their numbers are gradually increasing, if unchecked will be facing formidable foes. We need not relax and think that we are better than them.
Moreso, the currency contains weird characters similar to ancient writing that contains hidden meanings. Please take these curreny for notes verification.
You need to take these to the Technical Teacher.
Moreover, the place is now filled with weird mobs that appeared shortly when the abnormal phenomenon began.

The big problem right now is to confirm the exact location of Leonair Campus. We have received contrasting information regarding its location. Some say its situated at the South of Sacred Gate Park, while others point to the north. It's really confusing and the only way to pin-point its exact location is to go there ourselves.

Good thing the student named Cheng Xi Zhi of the Archery Section was able to verify the location of Leonair Campus and was able to draw a map to show it. Unfortunately, the map was stolen and torn to pieces by unknown people.
The identity of the strange people is not that important. What we need to do right now is to search and gather the scattered pieces of the map.
I've heard that when the map was torn into pieces, there were clowns around the area. Hmm... With this important clue, do you think we'd be able to find them?
We only have less than 7 pieces of the map that are in bad condition.

I have to try and put these pieces together even if looks impossible. The written words are too sloppy, the drawing is also irregular in nature, the paper has been severed, and the boundaries of the pieces of paper just don't connect properly...
The Student Director has had the experience on working with archeological evidences before; maybe he has the skill to put these papers together.

The lack of manpower should not stop us from preventing these evil to spread. If we do that the consequences will be unimaginable. It would be advisable to address problem now before gets out of control.
Please help me retrieve the medicines listed on this document.
Your mission is to slay the monster called Ice Master. I won't give you a time limit as past mission, so give it a shot.
You bit the Ice Master?, the Bloody cold bastard... Anyway you pass the mission..
Are you going to º»µ¿ It is strange that time has stopped. I though the °ø°£Ãà might be chaged... I knew that Saint building is located in º»µ¿ Hopely you can have a look inside the º»µ¿.
This Terminal controls the entrance and exit to the Science Center.

The Force Field Mechanism of the Terminal is able to run properly. To optimize the Force Field, you must gather Spiritual Spheres. The required quantity of Spiritual Spheres in order to activate this terminal's Force Field effect 7.
The optimization of the current Force Field is completed! Please proceed to the next terminal responsible for the next Force Field Optimization.
Inside the Science Center, there are some evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these spirits will bring unknown effects to the environment. Please try your best to eliminate these mobs.
The target amount of purification has been achieved and verified. Thank you for your efforts!
The top priority targets for this area are the Street Junkies. Please help eliminate 22 of them.
This Terminal controls the entrance and exit to the Library.
The Force Field mechanism of the Terminal is able to run properly. To optimize the Force Field, you must gather 18 Spiritual Spheres.

The optimization of the current Force Field is completed! If you are able to complete the remaining Force Field optimizations, you will be able to learn its effects. Please move to the next terminal responsible for the next Force Field optimization.

Inside the Library, there are some evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these evil spirits will bring unknown effects to the environment around them. Please try your best to eliminate them.

Inside the Library, there are some evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these evil spirits will bring unknown effects to the environment around them. Please try your best to eliminate these mobs.
Inside the Sports Field, there are some evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these evil spirits will bring unknown effects to the environment. Try your best to eliminate these mobs.
The target amount of purification has been achieved and verified. Thank you for your efforts.
The top priority targets of this place are the Brute Punks. Please help eliminate 26 Brute Punks.
The top priority targets of this place are the Slashers. Please help eliminate 27 Slasher targets.
The top priority targets in this area are the Jr. Bruisers. Please help eliminate 29 of them.
Welcome to the Trading Hole Area! I am the Archery Section Agent. How can I help you? Please feel free to look around if you like.
I am sorry the Manager is not here right now. Please come back again later. For the meantime, is there anything I can do for you?

Oh! So, you would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile to do than to teach you students! Since the manager around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.

You would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile for me to do than to teach you students! Since the manager is not yet around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
If you don't know the importance physical strength, it will be very difficult for you to understand the future lessons. By the way, I need to ask you to do something.

Did you see the Police Station nearby? There is a police officer waiting for you at the Main Door. Just approach him and tell him that I instructed you to look for him. I believe he has something in store for you.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK, you may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK! You may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
Oh! You found it! It has been 18 years since I last saw this device by specialist named Liu Cheng You. Thank you very much!

Student! Please remember that consistent training will be part of your quest for victory. There will be times of disappointments ahead but you need not be sad and preoccupied. Just focus on your training and you will develop to be a more powerful individual.
Broaden your horizons! It is great to ave a wider perspective of life! Imagine this is part of the lesson! Someday, it would benefit you and the people around you.

Oh. Ok. Even if he is not here, I could give you some information. After the meteor falls 18 years ago, the chairman realize the danger in Real World. And he expected that there will be some effects from Another World that has been destroyed by some invaders.

The meteor fall was actually the living particles of Another World, which can transmit the power to another body. And the List of Saint is the list of people who affected by that particle, And they were able to survive during that incident because of the transmitted power.

So SFG people thought that the way to prevent the disaster from this incident is to gather the people who has the transmitted power. If not, the real world will be destroyed.... That's why they should enforce them to join this campus whether the methods they used are right or wrong. That's what happened.

Do you know there is the private prison of Saint Financial Group? There are special minerals that come from only the mine near that prison. It used to be a working area for prisoners. The well-refined and mixture of that mineral can enhance the steel... especially weapons and armor with special power... But the success rate is too low and it requires the large amount of oil. Are you still willing to try it?

The easiest way to get oil is from the tuna near this area. You could easily find the tuna boat workers in wharf. But kindly check the quality of oil. Some tuna oil are useless. Please get 10 bottles of oil.
Well done. I will put that oil on this machine. But I am not sure it will create something that helps you. Anyway good luck.

Oh.. You received the information that I requested, don't you? I was so worried about my boss because I couldn't contact him a long time and couldn't gather the information around here. I'm so appreciated that you were able to deliver this information. Now I can breathed a sigh of relief a bit. Thanks you very much.

Wait.. I just remember something. A few days ago, I got another time capsule delivery from another student.. Contents are.. the pictures that the gangsters were trading something without the doubt. But the weird thing is there were the SFG Flag in the ship which might contains the gangster's trade goods. I don't know whether it is for on purposes or not. I hope this information would be worthy for the reward of your delivery.

Excuse me. I don't know all information for this state, because I instead my teacher still stay here. But, I have some story to you. Before, some people have festival for keep thiers time. After this festival, appear some problem.....

There are powers of Dragon, Tiger, Phoenix and Turtle at Sacred Gate, Mystic Peak, Phoenix and Trading Hole. However, these powers were too strong and gave damages to people. Therefore, 'Director' had built the E-Rooms at where there was too much power to seal it.

Since then, people found a way to use the holy power after continuous research. However, it was coded and 'Master CD' given at 'Lead Club' authentication is needed. If you give me the 'Master CD', I will help you use it temporarily.
Decoding is done. Please select the class which you would like to receive weapon.
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Weapon has been delivered. Hope this weapon can be a helpful to you!
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Ok, then pick the type of weapon you prefer.
Welcome. Although I'm not at the situation that I could welcome someone, I am so glad that there is someone I want to ask my favor.

Maybe it is not so hard task. It would be just simple treasure hunting compared to what you've experienced so far.. But I'm so sorry that it won't be so pleasure one. There will be my copy spirit. I couldn't go near him easily. It looks like he is staying away from me. You just need to check where he is and what he looks like.
Ah... That place... With that body... Perhaps... It was good decision not to go near him. I might be vanished. Then two worlds also will be under chaos and eventually vanished.
Is there something I need to tell you more?

Maybe you shouldn't put that prodigious name. It was just the list of names regardless all related incidents.
The problem was.. we really push ourselves to gather the people in the list too much.
Ask about the students who got harm.
Of course I knew. I was the one who controls on it. The truth is.. They were not cooperated with me at first place.. Then we had no more time to waste. And only few of them accepted the our offers.

I didn't want to be hero.. Maybe I rather want to be hero because it means I should admit all the rights of people. But I don't want to do it. It is OK as long as the world is not destroyed and people are living regardless any sacrifice..
Eventually I won't bother any blaming or hatred form the people because there are some supporters who can easily change the world history. I even didn't feel any sorry or guilty .

18 years ago, I joined the team of meteor fall investigation. At that time, I thought it is just natural phenomenon. Who would thought that it will upside down our knowledge of science? Since we couldn't progress on investigation, the team was disbanded. After 1 year from first investigation, the team was reorganized... Then I found it.. The crack of time space..

And the foundation of great geometry theory was completed. Unfortunately before this theory had been completed, there were already lots of experiments with its branched theory. The one of them is D Engine which was developed for airplane. It can compress the time space and reduce the travel time. The prototype had no problem but at the last testing of manufactured engine , the whole air-plain was disappeared suddenly.

Because of that accident, all the other project had been canceled. All information treated as confidential manner. After that, all the supports were from unofficial routines. Even if I worked unofficially, the supporters got more interest as I discovered something. And some day, I was able to report the truth of Meteor fall. It was unofficial, but because of this report, I could establish the Saint Financial Group.

At first, I was preparing the military base but I realized that people in list are too young. So to make them more comfortable, I changed the plan from military base to school campus, and had to add the regular education curriculum too. Also I had the other reason to make this campuses.
Because of my title as Director of Campus, I overused my authorities. Maybe it is my execuse.. I believed that they are too young to overcome this incident by themselves..

There are two suns in the sky although we cannot see the other one right now. And two suns provide enough sunshine, wild temperature, and good environments. But at the other side of earth, there is the place that does not have these benefits.

Oh, I used the term¡°Earth¡±. There are same air, soil, and rocks here just like movie and cartoon?. How about the floor where you stand? Is it weird that this world are too much same as the real world that you live?
Although this place became a ruined world because of the war,.. Yes, This is also Earth.

After I established SFG and prepared all school campuses, I found out that the another world is actually this place ¡°Earth¡±. Future of earth. .. It was not good timing. We were not yet prepared completely and had unexpected result... And We were able to know the history of another world.
As you know about another world, there is 'Daramai' race who lived without sun and realized their unfair situation and isolation in another world.

But 'Ragia' races disagreed the shared of sunshine. Not only that, they tried to obliterate 'Daramai' race who asks a favor about sunshine. And also 'Ragia' consider 'Daramai' as an abandon race. That's why there were the war between Light and Dark. And it results this.
But.. I discovered that 'Daramai' base placed as same location as SFG head office. Yes.. 'Daramai' was trapped inside Sacred Gate Area with special field, and fought until further future.

'Ragia' council cannot change the mind simply... Even they abuse the power that accumulate to save the world, and it is impossible to possess all the benefits forever... So if I cannot change the history, then I want to lead the war for ourselves. With another world knowledge, my preparation, and your power, I want to make the future better.

So I removed the Leonine barrier and started to make living-bio-weapons... Someday I even couldn't control myself.. I just drived to developing the new and better living-bio-weapons without knowing the purposes, the directions and the effects.
Now I can see How selfish I was and what I have done... I think you are the only hope now.
You're correct. You want it, too. right? You saw one in my room like me. Tha's correct,too. But, I'm true, too. Both he and I think " I'm true". If you belive me, could you help me?
This is the Archery Training Room. Please go back to your own place unless you have something important to ask.
Hmm?You seem to be very attentive.
Hmm, to confirm about a basic thing is a good attitude.
When using a bow, the most important thing is your concentration.
You must use your skills more often to learn how to instantly kill the enemy.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills.
What do you want to know?
Ask about the methods of training
Ask about the methods of combat
There is no turning back now. Please be aware of this.
Hmmm?The registration process is almost done. The next procedure is to request for an Exit Approval.

In order to push the limit of concentration, don't spend too much attention on unused muscle.
Keeping a distance from the enemies is the best strategy. It is also a way of protecting yourself from your target's attacks.
During times of closed-ranged battles, make sure to keep enough distance from your targets for protection and accuracy.
Due to the weakness of your defense, it is much better if you form a group together with other players.
Students from the Archery Section need not to depend solely on strength. Do consider to upgrade your character's agility to increase the accuracy of hitting your targets.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character. If you concentrate on Dexterity, you will earn fast attack speed and become a Fast Attack Type. Distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Vitality, will allow your character to become Power Attack Type. Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Intelligence, will allow your character to become Skill Type.
Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.

The starting skills won require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient. But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

Now, there are hardly a few decent human beings around. Most of them are transformed into evil monsters. But this situation can be solved. Please remember this.
The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be.

There is something that you need to do before submitting your registration form. Just like what I said before, these aggressive mobs are causing destruction in our campus. Please go outside and prevent them from causing more destruction.
Whatever happens inside or outside of this building, carelessness will just completely change your destiny.
After submitting the Exit Approval Form, you are entering a world of danger. Please remember this!

Oh you saw.. the list of saint.. It is true that there is nothing wrong with list. You might be curious about the behind.. Right? Why are there many students that have a problem in their family ? Actually it is simple. There is not many parents that send their children to experimental school. Even if the school offers extraordinary features, it doesn't matter for the parents who think the tradition importantly.

Many people raise this question.. Whether It is forgiveness work or not. Hm.. By the way I have no right to teach you then! I have to force you about what I don't know well. You know there are arena in trading hole. Look for the teachers there.

Before, I said that citizen need your help from suspicious men... I believe you.... Please help her.
Thank you. There is many suspicious men. If you're not expecting it, you will run into danger. Please take care...
Really? I was worried .... but, it's disappear to see you.

What seems to be bothering you?
The deadline for this on-going construction is drawing near and the project supervisor seems to be missing.

It is very troubling to know that most of the people here in the construction site project became strange. The machineries also broke down. These series of events caused the delay and disorder in the construction area.
Oh! Please send this type of hard-headed students away. Its is a complete waste of time. Nothing can be done! They just add to the chaos in the streets!

Student! Please do listen to my request... In order to finish the construction project before the deadline, we must replace these crazy workers with efficiently working machineries. The problem is that the generator is broken. This just makes things more complicated!
My friend from the Sword Section told me that this is not the only area where strange things started to happen. Imagine just what our world would be like if that continues to happen?
I am very scared of the news that will come from Physics Teacher of Sacred Gate College. We need to meet him at the Sacred Gate Ring.
Excuse me, can you help me acquire the necessary spare parts for the generator from the Technical Teacher?
I cannot leave this area because these crazy workers might abandon their work stations if I leave.
Thank you very much for bringing this spare parts. This can help aid the construction project at least for some period of time until it brakes down again.

Student!!?? oh, I think so, your teacher is very busy, now, ok...

You must use your skills more often to learn how to instantly kill the enemy. Students from the Archery Section need not to depend solely on strength. Do consider to upgrade your character's agility to increase the accuracy of hitting you targets.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills. Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them. The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient. But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

In order to push the limit of concentration, don't spend too much attention on unused muscle. Although there isn’t a definite way, keeping the distance between the archer and the target is the best.
Even in a very close situation, you must always keep your distance to your target.
Due to the weakness of your defense, it is much better if you form a group together with other players.
Nevertheless, do not ignore your Strength.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character. If you concentrate on Dexterity, you will earn fast attack speed and become a Fast Attack Type. Distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Vitality, will allow your character to become Power Attack Type. Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength and Dexterity and some to Intelligence, will allow your character to become Skill Type.

The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be.

Oh! Surprised! How did you find me? I've been waiting for someone coming because Scientist Teacher asked me a favor. I forgot to deliver this message to him as frantically coming here.Can you deliver this message instead of me? He's inside of Collapsed City.

A massive size of army was moving out from inside of the city, and¡¦ they were carrying big loads a lot. I guess that they are supplies for armies. Can you cut off them? Ah, but, please be careful the big one. I don't have a good feeling.
Wasn't it hard? You are fantastic! The students in rear will definitely appreciate you a lot.
While researching inside of the city, I found a strange enemy in mechanical arms. I couldn't finish my survey because of him. Looks dangerous but you would know what you can do for this, don't you?
I was right! Thank you so much! I can restart my survey now.

I think you should know that in cases of group combats, the Brawler Section students play the role of not only close distance attack; but also to destroy the enemy's formation. Furthermore, Brawler Students find it is easier to concentrate because they have no two-handed weapons or shields.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills.
You still haven't finished the Student Registration? Please go to the Student Director at the School Administration Office and finish your registration.
Ah! Can I help you with anything?

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
Use Dexterity as the primary attribute and the remaining points to Strength. This will allow your character to attack faster using fists.
In contrary, using Strength as the primary and Dexterity as the secondary target for Stat points will allow your character to perform strong attacks using the leg.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

The Main Gate of the campus building is straight ahead. The Welfare Society and the Lockers are over there. You should go and check them out. And about the student registration, you must go to the School Administration Office which is beside the Welfare Society and find the Student Director. You can also get treatment if you go to the First-Aid Room. So, you might wanna go there and heal if you’re injured.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
Use Dexterity as the primary attribute and the remaining points to Strength. This will allow your character to attack faster using fists.
In contrary, using Strength as the primary and Dexterity as the secondary target for Stat points will allow your character to perform strong attacks using the leg.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character..
Increasing Dexterity will allow your character to be a Chemical Expert to deal sustained damage to the enemy as well as debuff.
Increasing Spirit will allow your character to be a Physics Expert to summon beings that deal great physical attack to enemies.
Increasing Strength will allow your character to be a Bio Expert to limit your enemies' actions and increase your abilities.

The Information Room Terminal is unable to function properly due to error in the school's Main Terminal. Please resolve this problem.

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to browse the document.

After you finish reading and activating the Shockwave skill book, use the [K] button to open the skill window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Shockwave in the Qi option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Shockwave skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Shockwave Skill

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to browse the document.
Now, there are no means to keep this Terminal to function properly.

After you finish reading and activating the Refresh skill book, use the [K] button to open the skill window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Refresh in the Support option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Refresh skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Refresh Skill
The Shockwave skill is the art of using the Qi Energy to attack closer enemies. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

The Refresh skill is used to hasten health recovery against damages. However, this skill can only be used on your own character. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
If you distribute the points to Strength, Stamina and Dexterity, your character will grow into a Swordsman exhibiting very fast attacks.
If you concentrate on Strength. Your character will grow into a Swordsman inflicting high damages to targets.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Take note that the Sword Section consumes a relatively large amount of SP.
If your SP is consumed completely, your accuracy and attack rate will diminish. This will expose your character to a dangerous situation.
Therefore, be careful when you cast a skill.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.
