Because the Crazy Dogs are blocking the tunnel, they will attack anything that passes by. Eliminating them will be hard due to the gas pipe near the tunnel making it dangerous to anyone who decides to enter. Sorry for this bad news!

Of course we can't allow a normal resident to go through. Only students from Sacred Gate School are allowed to enter.

He was recognized as their master. I guess we need to do the same to pass through the tunnel.

The weather that day was pleasant, everyone was ready to work. There were also students running around the building and they didn't seem to care what's happening around them.
When I was about to report the situation to the Police, there was an explosion at the 3rd floor. After that everyone here turned into a monster.
I was not able to do anything.. I just stood there. I saw a group of people running out from the gate, there were two individuals supporting an injured man. It was very scary.
I did not dare ask them what happened. Those people were very weird, there was a group chasing them and the rest ran on different directions. All I can say is, their clothing is very weird.
Have you met them again after that incident?
I never met them again, everyone that day look demented..
Who are you? You look so useless and noting can give me a help, can you please leave here, ok?

Why you want to know who am I ? Don't know whether have give any help to student or not, if you want to become stronger, you need to you control your curiosity first.

You seem know the traditional train tactic, but different is from the attack way, no matter fail or get damage, train more.....

Welcome Students! May I ask what are you looking for?
In future, I'm PET manager. If you want skill , tell me about want skill.
Exchange to PET Pick up medicines of item kind
Exchange to PET Pick up money
Exchange to PET Pick up Polishing items
A Broom? Anyway, It is really inconvenient to perform tasks while carrying this broom around.
The weather is getting cold and gloomy. My body is starting to feel some sore pain.
Ask about the usage of the Lockers

Of Course! Just use these lockers whenever you want. However, please do not utilize all these locker spaces by yourself alright? Try to stick to one locker space for yourself. Just store items that you want to keep for future use inside your locker. In case you need more space for your locker, you need to spend a portion of your money for that arrangement.

Sigh. How do I answer that question? As you probably know, there are 3 Campuses in the area. However, There are rumors stating that there is another campus making it 4 campus all in all. There are several conversations between the teachers and the School Administration talking about the force.. Force Fie,,,, Ah yes! the Force Field! Although I am not one hundred percent sure, I believe that there is something very important about that Force Field. Of all the campuses here in the area, The Leonair Campus is the weirdest. I remember a time when I was listening to a conversation between teachers; the sky suddenly became strange looking, and something very peculiar and abnormal fell into the Leonair Campus, Since then, major chaos has started. What actually happened is something I'm dying to know more about. If you guys find important information about that event, please don’t forget to inform me alright?
Broom? Oh! That Broom! I really have no idea what's so special about these brooms. If you really need to take it, here it is. However, please do return them as soon as possible.
Oh! Its great to finally see a normal human being again!
Hmm... If you listened in class, you can imagine how it would be like. It occurred earlier than expected. It all started 18 years ago.

We have anticipated this incident a long time ago; however, the extent of the situation was beyond our expectations. Please help collect essential information regarding this matter. Please help collect as much possible information as you can.

Right, now I am the one managing the distribution of this unique costumes because the person originally assigned to this job disappeard. Personally, I don't like the idea of distributing these items. The idea is the same, however I find it a bit of a pity to distribute these items off just like this.
Hmm... What do you want to know?
Ask about what should be done.
Ah, are you looking for the spare parts to fix the bus? There are several people who collected the same spare parts recently. They keep coming back because of recurring car accidents.
All spare parts have been released and the ones left are not compatible with the ones you need.
So your here to buy more spare parts. Hmmm... Where did you get these strange currency notes? Look, I still have a lot of those things here and I really don't know where they came from.
Those currency notes are obviously strange and its good we have discovered them before the problem worsen. Just continue delivering the Order Document. It'll be a big help!
Oh so you've already reached the level that I require to qualify for this exam? Your learning speed is faster than I expected!
Good you have passed the exam by achieving your level eventhough it was less than what I expected. You will need to practice more in order to be ready for any kind of attack from these fellas.

Ah, are you looking for the spare parts to fix the bus? There are several people who collected the same spare parts recently. They keep coming back because of recurring car accidents. It will be great if these spare parts can be put to good use. Although we are prepared with the necessary equipments for incidents like this, the supply of spare parts are dwindling.
You can get the spare parts you need from the supervisors of the Construction Site located at the 4th Hole. However, you will need to exert extra efforts and prove your self worthy of the items.
These currency notes have been verified by the cash widrawal machines as genuine money.
Do you think that these rubbish still need to be gathered? For us Street Cleaners, it will definitely be better if all garbage and rubbish are organized and collected. Please help us ok?
Please take them for notes verification.
Great! Before passing you the exam questions, I'll remind you again on the purpose of this test that I have previously mentioned the last time. Your regular targets in this test are not human beings.
That’s the reason why you need to regularly take this type of exams. You will be able to learn things that you really need to learn.
You really must continue learning diligently in the future. Eventually, the enemies that you have to fight will not be at this level only. Do you understand me?
I hear the taxi system can only transport teachers and students.
Everyone is encouraged to use the Taxi System to travel around cities. Don't worry, it wouldn't cost much.
Very Good You did well getting here. It was really hard to find me huh? Now, let me show you the magic crafting an special item with the badges and cards~!
What ingredients do you need to make this special item?
I already have the ingredients, just make the item for me!

Hizuka Badge 100ea + Klown Badge 80ea = Hizuka Hat(7D)
Hizuka Badge 150ea + Klown Badge 100ea + Klown Card 100ea = Klown Look Box (7D)
Hizuka Badge 200ea + Klown Badge 150ea + Klown Card 150ea = Klown Bike (7D)
Okay! Now, make the item just for me!
I want the KLOWN Look Box!
If you can win, then you can say anything that you want.
Just shut up, i just wanna give you a punishment.
Please cooperate with with Carl Sheldon!
Wrong!!! This place is the connection point between the other world and our world. If stay here too long, you will be become the guardian and gatekeeper of this place.
Is there anything else i need to help?
If you want to have more power.. we must stop Lucian's wild ambition...and save our world...
You will no remember this conversations when you come here on the next time. Bye Bye.
Seem I have noting else can talk to you,it is so incredible that you still alive!
what do you mean about sister?
What you holding it? Look like letter.....
You said you get the letter from Lee Zhen? Fast give me!
Erm,my sense is correct....can you come back again after the exam?
It because you are late cause you get limited ability,but it's enough for you!
What? You not know the current status in this lame world...?
so power oh~ I have something to tell you.....
I used to be same with you last time,want to stop this chaotic place.But too bad, after I went in Financial Group Tower and find out Professor Chui's reserach project.
Oh? Where you heard from? Who else will know this..... Lee Zhen?! Lee Zhen still alive? Oh great, I need your help, please go and find Lee Zhen. He will know it after you say Amanuoruoyin.
Erm...Got this such thing happen. Sorry, can you help me to write a letter and pass it to Lee Zhen?
It's ok, my help may not helpful.....

He said want to stop this chaotic situation, and build up ability. But actually he hope to find his sister, after I met up his sister. I can't do anything. what can I do is leave his sister alone and safe her friend. But I still fail.
That all for what I remember. You can go back now, hope you remember what I told you before.

It maybe you keep on build up your ability,your skill are excellent. Although you have telent, but you still cannot stop it. You need to be stronger than them! Be concentrate always and build up more your ability.
I am lying, I saw my sister slowly lost her way.....

In that place, one person...... It because of Professor Chui, No!!!! Is my fault, I hope sister can forgive me. She suffer is because of me. Please pass messege to her, ask her be patient. I will go and safe her.

I was sophomore in Sacred Gate Campus and enrolled at swordsmanship class. I didn¡¯t want to study here.. Maybe that's why¡¦.

Don't look at me like this~ I'm not a good mood to talk to you nicely and I am not a kinds of person who can take care of the others. I don't care whatever people said. but because of my personality, my timid friend got hurts many times. Anyway someday he was getting into some kind of superstition... I couldn't do anything for it....
If I think I don't stop him, he cannot be normal anymore. I couldn't believe him that he was so afraid of his incarnation images and memory... So.. me.. I should do this...

So Seung Il.. After he died, I couldn't just leave this place¡¦ Here there will be some clues. And I also heard that there is a private laboratory for S.F.G. near here... I am sure that the monsters near here are related that laboratory either directly of indirectly...
I think.. It is already meaningless whether the laboratory is exist or not.
Overflow the monsters... But I don't think they are only in underground. I it clear now? The experiments on a Living body was done in that laboratory. And that's for creating the living weapon.
Why? SFG creates Official 4 campus for the education? What about jail? and Laboratory.. Is it for defense system of this village? Haha.. Look~ I'm getting so silly if there are many thought.

By the way. The guy I talk you while ago has just like that. Look around you before you think about the reason behind this underground. What you are trying to do now... We are not a god or legendary hero~ Just a human....
Oh, You found something? Can I see? Oh? Wow~ is it like time machine? I could read the script on this. This is a Ganil Language.
the machine... that go through something.. Vector? I don't know whether it is for time space or physical space... Definitely you could move to another time space by this machine.
Then it is not yet complete at all... And it is not working at all. Probably there will be the missing parts in somewhere. And if you can find them, we might find a important clue...
Wow Impressive... How were you able to find those things in this gutter-like place? How about changing the job as detector?
I'm not sure how it works very well since my major is software.. I think the important parts are complete although some minor parts might be needed later.

You know it is not just a list of names? Yes, I don't mind the ideal of SFG nor the ideal of Another World. But I don't like to make the sacrifices on that ideal. The indulgence of sacrifice is... just a excuse... Jung Il, Maybe if he was there, he would like to support it.

Ask about dispatched Extra Activity Teacher
Exterminate Guard Dog with Fluorescent Color
Report Fluorescent Colored Guard Dog Extermination

If you cannot talk to dispatched Extra Activity Teacher then why don't you take over the control tower. Seems like there were unseen rivarly between the students from each school to find the clue of Another World. Therefore, the teachers dispatched here only allowed students who dominated this place to trade items, receive quests and talk to them. In order to train them hard.
..that this is one of the places hit by meteoric shower and was used as the energy source for the research complex. Umm.. Something must have been found in the meteorite.. Anyways, thanks!

You seem strong enough as the people said! This is the Saint Power Plant discovered a few days ago. Many teachers and the students are investigating this area but we need more help from strong students like you. Please help them.
Someon has seen a giant animal gushing out smoke from its body near the Power Facility 1-2. It is not sure if it was a human or a mutant but you will be able to find a clue by investgating this area.

The Guard Dogs which used to guarding this place are glowing in weird fluorescent color. It must be an undiscovered virus. Anyways, they are listed in the dagerous creature list so please defeat them.
Thank you! We now can investigate broader area.. When did Nurse Trainee (Dispatched) got here??...

I am not sure whether the information of this place where the meteorite had fallen, unkown creatures and viruses can be useful to find clues but please tell 'Student Conselor' at Market Plaza about it.
There was a trace of a humna.. Umm.. It cannot be the dispatched teachers.. There might be a survivor, would please go take a look?

Really?! It's just getting more suspicious. Power Plant Manager wasn't even here for a few recent years¡¦ looking for a CD.. Hmm.. If my guess is right then the high officials must have done something secretly.
Very well. There was a very suprising incident. One day, mutants had attacked us teachers in surprise while we were educated secretly. That when he helped us. Now is the time for us to help him.
I am not sure who the nurse trainee (Dispatched) is but I heard that she had only studied the virus and the schizophrenia. Go ask her!
As expected, he managed to produce the Aspirin with herb of World Tree which can only be acquired by someone with mighty power. It is our turn to help him.
Go see him once more. If he is ok then he must have came back to normal.
Glowing and sprkling monument is still left here all in one piece. If you have time would you please go check it out? You might will be able to find new informantion around there.
What? It¡¯s not a meteorite? Cant' be?! If it is just a immitatin than how could it stay unchanged that long..

There was a script covered with stain over it? A few days ago, Nurse Trainee (Dispatched) found that the saliva of Guard Dog (Elite) help oxidation while she was studying virus samples. Use that saliva and remove the stain over that script written on the Meteorite Monument.

I did not know that the Saliva of Guard Dog (Elite) was a very dangerous chemical. It would be hard to believe but if that Saliva is vaporised then it even destroys the Ozone layer. Please defeat all Guard Dogs (Elite) infected with virus.
You did well! It feels great to watch you grow! Learning and training ourselves is the only way fulfill what we desire!
Oh my goodness! Why are so many people injured?
Pass the Papers for Medical Report

There isn't much medicine left. Unfortunately I can't help those who are severely injured. However, I can still be able to treat those who have suffered minor injuries. Due to the limitations of my skills, I cannot help injuries of students beyond Level 15.
I'm sorry I cannot help you!

I cannot say that it is a kind of epidemic or sickness. I believe it is more of a serious chemical reaction where the victim's body get burned, paralyzed by electricity, or frozen. There are also other situations where the victim's body becomes stiff as a stone.
Ask about the effects of the burns
Ask about the effects of the paralysis
Ask about the effects of freezing
Ask about the effects of poisoning
Ask about the effects of suffocation
I have no idea regarding the recurring situation outside. However, I have heard from different conversations between teachers that the situation doesn't look good at all.
When the victim's whole body is exposed to burns, the physical strength and stamina will be degraded into a weakened state. Burns bring fatal effects to a victim's health so please be careful.
If a victim is shocked and paralyzed by electricity, his/her movement speed slows down.

When the body of the victim is frozen, the body stiffens which causes the movement rate to decrease and the defense mechanism to be weakened. If the victim is allowed to suffer in this condition for a prolonged period of time, the effects could be fatal.

The condition of the victim's physical strength will decrease continuously if poisoned. After being poisoned, the physical strength and stamina of the victim will decrease gradually. The rate of damage from being poisoned is higher than the case of getting burnt. Please be aware of this fact!

When a victim is suffocated, the movement of the victim will immediately become awry. However, this condition will not last long. Having said that, it is still considered a dangerous condition. Please be careful not to get suffocated!
Although the medicines I have are not really enough to heal your condition. I would still try my best to aid you. Please let me take a look at your injury.
Ask about the treatment of the wounds

Oh! Are you going to register? I bet this is your first time to register. I've never seen anyone as stiff as you. Do you understand the terms of registration? I can assure you that you could always come to me to get some treatment until you reach level 15. Please do visit me in case you need some treatment. Don't you think it'll be more convenient if you change your Save Point over here?

Writing these medical reports is really an exhausting work. Can you help me solve my problem because I ran out of papers? There are stocks of papers available at the Welfare Society. Can you go there and get some papers for me?

Ah! Thank you very much! This job requires me to write Medical records all day. If you get injured in the future, please fell free to approach me. I will attend to your medical needs and make sure you get quality treatment.

Oh! You already got it? Thank you very much! You have been a great help! If not for these medicines, we will have shortages in supplies. It will cause havoc to the campus if we do not have first-aid medicine supplies like this. I hope the situation outside would get better. I'm really afraid if the situation continues it would bring disorder to the campus.

The quality and quantity of medicine supplies are not good at all. This causes us to produce our own means of acquiring medicine supplies. Excuse me. Would you be willing to help me collect some Cigarette Butts? Have you ever heard of the two notorious chain-smokers around? They are the Little Hooligan and the Hooligan. The last time I requested for cigarette butts from someone, I found out that the quality of the cigarette butts from the Little Hooligan are not of good quality. I couldn't use them to produce medicinal materials. Would you help me acquire cigarette butts from the Hooligan instead? Ah! Don't worry. I'll exchange some of my money with you if you get me 20 cigarette Butts from the Hooligan.

Wow! You already collected the Cigarette Butts! Thank you so much! Starting today, we should be producing our own medicinal materials. So, in case you have any available time to spare in the future, please come here and help me again. Ok?

We are not just experiencing a shortage in medicines but also a shortage in medical supplies used for treatment. If the situation continues to be like this, we have to come up with procedures to acquire all necessary medicine supplies and equipments by ourselves. I just had a great idea! There is a group of mobs outside called Street Junkie. They carry and wear bandages and plasters. Yes! I remember these fellas actually carry bandages in their pockets. These Street Junkies really don't need those bandages. I believe that other students will benefit a lot from those bandages. Having said that, will you help me get bandages from the Street Junkie? The supplies for bandages are minimal. We should therefore acquire these bandages to compensate the need for it.

This is great! Thanks! Most students look tough on the outside. Deep inside they are really quite as obedient as you are. You really have to communicate pleasantly to people so that they will treat you with respect. Anyway, thanks a lot! I might come and ask for your assistance again in the future. *smiles*

Oh, you are not an Assassin, the friend of darkness seeking the light! I cannot help you!
Do your best until we can go back to our home!
Assassin is a club learning the skills to outreach the limit of human with the power of Solidified Stone and the ancient martial arts to win in a fight no matter!
There are tons to learn so don't rush it! Come back after you take care of the things in the campus.

The uniqueness and the advantage of Assassin is that we take out an opponent quick in no matter what kind of condition we are in. Therefore, it is essential that we reduce the unnecessary movement using skills. Remember, Assassin has be quick and precise in any given condition!
Starting from '0', you will receive '1' skill point at each level up.
How much do I know about the school?
Oh! Wait! I must take care of something really quick...
Paper work is too complicated! The registration is complete and I must process the Exit Approval Form...

'3' points are given at each level up. Depending on how you distribute them will decide your expertise.
If you distribute into DEX then you will be the fast blade master using Dual Spear.
If you distribute into POW then you will be the powerful and unstoppable Scythe master dealing great damages.
If you distribute into INT then you will be the master of giant Shuriken using magic and toxic bombs.
Why are you not registered.. You have not been getting ready as I have told you that is why... You will find something suitable at the DB room Terminal, go get it!
We have just been created and it is hard to take care everything. The chaos in and outside of school and the pile of works... Gee... I have no time to rest...

The creatures that wander around in and outside of school used to be the innocent teachers and citizens. Well, there has been people who weren't innocent too but anyways... The point is that they have been mutated and turned into freaks so do not pity them! Survivor is our top priority until we can go back to our homes.
If it hadn't been the sudden phenomenon, I would not have become the instructor. However, since I have decided to do this, I am here to support you so don't hesitate to come to talk to me.

The phenomenon has much more effect out the school. All the people outside right now reports that they should never let their guard down for a second. Once you are out there, don't lose your tension. Remember, survivor is our top priority.
Once you submit the Exit Approval Form, you are swearing to take full responsibility of all that so be strong!
This is just a portion about Saint List. You will be surprised when you get closer to the truth. The current moment is important but I hope you could think deeper as you get closer to the truth.
I know you must be confused! Go to Trading Hole and meet Zia. She will give you extra information on Saint List.

What's up?? I can't help you, anything
Show the recommendation letter to Monisha.
Give the ring design to Monisha.
Give the necklace design to Monisha.
Give all the materials to Monisha.
I'm Monisha, my class is Science I think I'm high class than you.
I've always hated the outside world.. Like you I hated violence.
Where have you been hiding all this time?
My class have always been in direct order of the Saint Foundation. Our class is found undergound, w/c is why you don't see us that much.
Its confidential and not to be disclosed to the likes of you.. and even if I explain it to you, you would not understand because of its complexity.
What is your purpose of coming here?
To tell you the truth.. I really don't remember.. I hope to know my purpose soon though.
It is Ok.Its hard to find a trustworthy person these days..But if you can help me, I'll help you too.. After all..I don't have anyone else to rely on.
I need some documents. If you go to Root Hole, please look for the documents from Pretty Veyah
This is the reward for you as my appreciation. Please accept it
Erm....You can help me, I heard about research document stolen by Spice Girl. Can you help me get back from them?
It is not easy to get back, god bless...
You get it back.... Thank you very much. This is a gift for you, Mesil Power.Please let me know if you want the power, i can help you.
Cannot get the power immedeately, you let me keep the Mesil Potion, i give you a book.After you read it, you will get the power.
Wow! A Spiritual Sphere with mysterious power. Let me exchange it to a skill scroll for you, so you can acquire the power of Mesil.
Oh.. Grocer asked you to show me this document? Well, you'll need a decoder to understand the contents of this document. You can get the decoder from Shocker.
Good job finding the decoder. Gimme a minute to decode it. Alright! Here you go.
I suppose this is the item you need?
Weapon series you want for Gunner Division
What type of weapon do you need?
What type of weapon do you need?
What type of weapon do you need?
What type of weapon do you need?
What type of weapon do you need?
Oh.. That ring.. Help me get the ring design from Hell Scissors. I need it to make the ring.
As promised, here's the ring made from the design you gave.
Hmm.. I'll need its design document before I can make one. Get it from Bomber Clowns in Sacred Gate Hole and I'll make you one.
I'll need a minute to make the necklace. Are you willing to wait?
It's done. Erm.. This is the first time I made this kind of item.. I'm not sure if it would work or not.
We'll need special materials from Got Milk If you want a more powerful weapon.
What type of weapon do you need?
Oh. Well.. I'll need materials for that. You may get them from Skating Master in Trading Hole.
Here you go. Its better than the first ring.
Sure thing. All you have to do is collect the materials I need to make the special weapon.
What type of weapon do you need?
Oblivion Potions resets your current ability. You just need to drink it. If you want to try it, I can create one. But, i'll need ingredients.
The materials I need are Bone Powder, Fermentation Water and a Cigarette Butt. But, i'm not sure if it would work. Hehe.
I believe you can do it.
Erm.. Okay. Get me the ingredients and i'll make one for you.
It'll take me a while to make the potion. Are you willing to wait?
Here you go. Its still not perfect. But, you can still use it to reset your ability. Go ahead and try it.
It's not that big of a deal. I just recently heard rumors that a weird person in Leonine looks a lot like my friend. Can you help me check if its true?
I heard he's really weird and he's called Mr. No-Name.
Thank you. Its good to hear that he is Okay
I would like to know more about what happened to my friend the past years. Please help me get more information.

Looks like you already had it verified at the Administration Office. How was it? Mmm... Is that the cassette? It doesn’t look too good, let me take a look.
Ask about the condition of the Cassette.
Give me the cassette. It will be of no use to you even if you keep it for yourself.
This is not a place that you can enter as you please.
Wish to get inside Leonair Campus.
Wish to get inside Leonair Campus.
Ask for the Leonair College ID card
Ask about the public service of Saint Financial Group
Ask if he is in a trouble
Ask if he is in a trouble
The Special Agents of the Sacred Financial Group was organized to determine whether the abnormal phenomena proliferating originates from this place.
It seems to me that you don't care about the school. It is impossible not to know the four schools established by the Sacred Financial Group in this area.
My current position will be compromised if I try to infiltrate the campus. Take my advice, never go inside that school. It would be safe and wise to stay here.
Request to go in Leonair Campus
Are you going in from that side? I can¡¦t even move with just standing at here, you still saying like this? Inexplicable, don¡¦t know whether is stupid or fierce.
Not bad! Still ok? I just want to ask you something... Oh! Nothing, never mind!
I cannot leave my station so it would be nice if you can do me a favor.
Correct! This is the leaf I saw before. All the others have mutated, but this one remains the same.
You are not allowed to enter this area.
Good! Now go inside Leonair Campus to understand the real situation.
What are these? Bandages? Considering the massive corrosion present on this thing I would say they came from corpses.
No matter how minimal the information we have, the experimental body of the plant will yield an accurate forecast. However, we need to know why the dead people in that place were able to walk.
Although I am not an expert on this matter, I am able to find many weird things. I will be really hard to understand the situation.

Previously, the Sacred Financial Group Research Center had relative ease recovering these things. Good thing they have a specialist on this matter at the Trading Hole. You need to bring it to him and request for its recovery.
Ask about Sacred Financial Group Research Center
I talk about things that ordinary people will never understand because I was exposed to pure technical knowledge at the Reasearch Center.
You need to take the special purpose elevators located at the 3rd floor to reach the undergroud floors. You will also need a special ID card to access the elevators.

It was recovered successfully! Even though it took you a lot of time, I really appreciate your efforts. Have you seen the contents? Its better if you keep everything you saw and learned to your self as of this moment.
The tape was tampered. It would seem that this tape was previously viewed by someone, but this will do.
Normally, the School Administration Office keeps the card for safe-keeping and is used only in special occasions. You need to get the card and have it duplicated.
Good! This looks like Leonair Campus. Both the map and the authentication book confirm the strange phenomenon in that place. That meeans you have felt the unbalanced energy corrupting the school.
Hmmm... Very Good! While I look for someone to replace me, you can go ahead and test your abilities in this area.
You have to prove that you can handle the challenges that lie ahead by defeating 20 Sacred Gate Defenders in 40 minutes. After achieveing this feat you can come back to me.
Please be warned that the electrical attack of these mobs are deadly. Please be careful.
Whether you like it or not, you have to listen to my request. Currently, there is something growing inside the Leonair campus. You have to venture inside and check what it for me.

Can you tell me what is going on inside? I need information so that I can replace and make a new Force Field. You need to conduct a thorough observation of the grass and the plants growing on the campus.
Please collect 5 Smallpox leaves for me.
There are ladders inside the campus. Climb the ladders and pass by a drill ground to take samples of the plant and come back.
So you saw corpses loittering around campus. It seems like the situation is worst than what we have anticipated posing a greater problem that we must solve.
Excuse me. Can you please help me investigate the Leonair Campus; and check if the Student director is still alive? I think you will be able to manage this task.
Great! I am going to assume that you will be able to carry out this task successfully. I put my trust on you. Please be careful!

This damage is not caused by humidity, rather the wounds were caused by prolonged exposure to heat.
If these symptoms persist, your nerves can also be affected! Its hard to say if this will happen or not.
Recently, there are a number of people asking about that disease. Authenticated information suggests that it might be influenced by the experimentation of the plant's body.
I believe that the influence from these plants would not have proliferated, unless it was spread through the discharge pipe located at the 2nd floor of Leonair Campus.
With the present students' abilities we still need to reorganize to fully understand the situation.
Please go to the Trading Hole and locate the Master of Taoist Rites. His lessons would be of great help, it will make you stronger.

You are so annoying. I am so tired to stand here for a long time. Anyway meet this person and ask him about the problem then come back here. He is Construction Supervisor. He requests some helps to company.

Isn't it obvious? We are helping the people upon the requests, And even if there is no request, we could find and assist those who need some helps. It is same whether it is for the neighbor or it is for the country. The difference is just scale.
So you don't know after all? Oh well.. I have nothing left to tell you about it¡¦ Then It is better to look for the teachers and ask them about it.
I was expecting that. It won't be hard to do it. Then see you later
I am so sorry you don't have a choice. If you won't help this time, I won't tell you about it anymore. Don't you like to go there and help him?
You've defeated them! Thank you very much!
It is just too hard for me to investigate the phenomenon alone. I could get all the hands I need but this is sucha dangerous place and...
Thank you but you are not just ready yet for Leonine school... If you really like to help me then please get some more training.
Hmmm, wow you've got the Bine Hands of mutated man eating Poison Ivy around here! You must have gotten some training!

I just am glad to know that there are beings that haven't lost their minds at this dead land of Leonine school. It would be possible to find out what happened on the day of Phenomenon with their help... This is a very dangerous job but would you please go find out?
Umm.. So this "hard to Read' notebook contains the record of what happened here at Leonine on the day of Phenomenon. Great job! Thank you so much for this precious data.
Exchange to Entry Extra S card
Citizen need your help from suspicious men. I can't help her,, if you have power, help her please.
Before, I said that citizen need your help from suspicious men... I believe you.... Please help her.
You need Entry card for enter ExtraStage S Grade. But, you still don't have it.
Thank you. There is many suspicious men. If you're not expecting it, you will run into danger. Please take care...
Really? I was worried .... but, it's disappear to see you.

Thanks~ The one who processed my document said that the document is disappeared. And then he is also disappeared... I couldn't do anything because he didn't tell me where he lost. Until now, I couldn't enroll.. Anyway Thank you!
It's OK.. I just got some hits... They are nothing.. I just wasn't able to counter the attacks. Probably I need more practice to catch up the classmate.
Oh! Thanks, It will be useful~ I think I could defense myself with this. Watch me, I will catch up their skills as soon as possible.
I transferred here from my old school~ Then what's this?.. The school don't provide no dormitory.. And I wasn't able to enroll easily... I am going to quit.. I want to go back!
One told me that he find document for me. So, I'm waiting him, now. But, he still doesn't come here. Could you help me for find document?
They hate me by I'm late. So, I need to study more than they. Could you find me for learn quickly ?
Thank you. If they come back here, they will find me. So, I'll wait them untill they back here.
I'll study here by myself. Thank you
"Long time no see... If you ever need anything, please do not hesitate to ask."
Help me deal with Evil Genius because I want a good night sleep.
Oh!! Now I can get a good sleep. Here is the Spiritual Sphere. While I do not know whether they are useful.

oh~ Isn¡¯t it good luck packages? How come you are holding them? I see... There was like that happening ..I am good that you want to bring ill luck packages instead.. Anyway thanks to take hard work in charge in stead of my friend Nothing big..but hope to be blessed by this lucky necklace..Happy new year~
Already late.. Never seems to come.. When can I start my work for this year?

It's new year.. I must work hard for this year..but Tired pig never seems to come
too loiter on the way here..even though Tired pig should bring good luck packages not only ill luck packages !

We must get in contact with her immediately.

Hmm... First is normal item. There are items which have been upgraded, with better performance, called rare items. There are also items called Blessed Item. It is much more special and very well done, but will be quite hard to find. If you obtain these kind of items, could you keep them properly? And... I have some items which I have never seen, but really precious items. By looking at the information record of our department, you should be able to enquire and obtain it. Ah, there is one type of item which cannot be used on your own will. I can't help you with this item as it will be little bit difficult Please use it only when you are on quest training.

Yes, we are the best shop to manage the items flow ... Prior to the dispatch of all items to the various society, the items must be validated and approved to ensure quality, proper pricing and product type. The education that society members learned from there can finally be used now. Although it has been mentioned before, but now the resources that was available from our department is currently not available, we don't have the items that should have been there. Please accept our apologies.

Hmm... are you asking about items? After defeating the enemy, you can get some items. Stronger enemy will drop better items. If you have unwanted good items, come to me, I will exchange it with money. But if you could trade with your friends, it is not necessary to look for me.

Why did you register so late? Similar to the paper before this, just understand how to arrange the style and put it well and don't really need to know how to write. All the messy and lengthy documents is not required in this world where everything is just a matter of a click. But do I just write on the paper? No other orders?

It is not enough to just fill up the registration application form and bring it over right? Because of the Student Director, therefore it can be done easily, otherwise, you will need to redo it before you come again. Anyway, as it is now a critical time, it is possible. Anyway, just present the Egress Application Form to the Student Director at the School Administration Office and the registration is almost done.
What, still on registration? Sorry, came directly ... Normally we go one by one, but this situation is an exception. So ... perhaps coming directly would be better ... should be ...

There's no way to go outside during the abnormal time. The students are able to go outside because they have a little power but for a normal person like me, going out is just like a nightmare. Although it's only hearsay, the monsters out there are dead.. Feel weird? I didn't believe it too, but you would agree after listening to them. Isn't it just like that? Human being have no concern for one another... there is no responses even when you speak to them. Although I didn't see it with my own eyes, but it's just sounds very strange. So, must hand the Egress Application form to the Student Director.

Tell her about Seung Hee Ji
Ask if there is something I can help
Is there something that I could help you?
I was the vice-representative of archery class in Scared Gate Campus. ..But.. I died.... Since I didn't have a power like my sister, I transformed into the monster. .
My poor sister killed me eventually. It was not easy. Then she shared her power. So my copy spirits could get same body form and spirit.

I know well here because I am the copy spirit. This place is where many free spirits are captured. There are certain forces that the spirits cannot go out of this place. Will it be a grudge of spirit?
If possible, I want to leave this place. But I couldn't go out because of certain invisible forces. I just hope that the other free spirits won't suffered this... Maybe it is my grudge..

When two different dimensions are crossed each other, there will be certain effects that the living one inside the intersection of dimensions would suffer a transformation into new living object with a violence. Sometimes it could make several living objects.
I was the one of them. But there are special cases that new living objects can have same mind as old one...

I did what the sister should not do. I want to hug her instead of staying here as soon as possible. But... I cannot get out of here. And Unfortunately my body is also not human body. I have a favor. Could you send my words to my sister?
Maybe there will be another copy spirit that has better body. If not, please tell her. I was so happy that you could stop me.. And Also don't be weak.. Please help me.
Oh. That was the answer. I won't never give up . Thanks. Now I feel easy.. Maybe someday another my copy spirit will visit to Hee Ji since I know her feeling. Then I will just take a rest here.

Morally.. it is wrong to put a enforcement on that list. But if there is no enforcement on list, what will it be happened? Now can we talk like this? I believe this is the evil that is existed by inevitable reason.

Suddenly... I thought of something.. The artificial heart power generator room in underground.. It has been discovered that the electricity is stable in artificial heart without outside power supply. Is it really artificial heart that is truly made artificial object. For me, its movement is so natural.. and look weird. Could you check that place?
If the beat rate is little bit changed... and the vibration is almost same then it is really artificial heart.
Ah ok.. You look so tired. If that one is based on real one... Then it won't happened that kind of problem. Thank you for your help
This Terminal controls the access to the Right Dragon Park.
The Terminal's Force Field function is operating normally. You must gather 4 Spiritual Spheres to activate the Terminal's Shielding Effect.

The current area's authentication has been done. Please wait until the other area's authentication is complete. You can transfer to the next terminal to complete the Force Field activation and optimization.
There are evil spirits moving around the Right Dragon Park. The mobs possessed by these spirits bring undesirable effects to the surroundings. Please try your best to eliminate them.
Please show me where are you injured.
Ask about the impression of Saint Financial Group.

They started to appear not too long ago. At first there was only one, but then they rapidly multiplied. However, I believe that hey didn't seem to have the ability to mastermind nor execute the chaotic event.

Since you are able to make it all the way here, you should already have the basics covered. But now let me fill you in on two more issues.
Ask about the effects of Petrification
Ask about the effects of Confusion

I'm sorry, my memory still hasn't fully recovered. If I treat you now, maybe your wound will worsen. My medical skills is like a double-edged sword, it can either help you, or harm you, do you understand?
The body of the victim will become as hard as a stone, and will remain stiff and immovable. However, the defensive qualities of the victim will in fact become higher while under this effect.
This condition can be described when the victim starts getting very dizzy, attacking power and accuracy reduced by one half, and SP dropping below certain levels.

Not long ago I received the bleak news from the Physics Teacher from Phoenix Hole saying that there are insufficient supplies of First-Aid medicines. But my situation is similar to most other people, I can't leave the position at which I'm currently stationed.

Looks like you delivered the medicine safely. It wasn't easy, was it? But thanks to those medicines we were able to save many people's lives. If the road that leads to our hospital hadn't been blocked, this measure wouldn't have been necessary.

You came just in time, I was just worrying that they might need some medicines over there. These are medicines which I have prepared, kindly deliver these for me and please be careful on the journey ahead, Ok?
It seems to me that you knew that this thing was unavoidable. That's why you're telling me this in advance.
It seems to me that you knew that this thing was unavoidable, that's why you're telling me this in advance.
Sorry to keep you waiting. These raw materials are messy to deal with, but they're going to be quite effective. Can you please wait for a while?

It is now completed! Here. take it! After receiving this injection, I believe that the patient will recover completely. However, since the victim's body has been sustaining this sickness for a long period of time, it would be advisable to tell the victim to be mindful of his body for the next few days.

Fortunately I still am still sane, however, apart from my medical skills and knowledge, I can¡¦t remember much else. What can I do now is only this, taking care of the medicines here.
Excuse me, but can you deliver the medicine over there?

*Sigh*, it’s just unfortunate that I haven’t got any medicine prepared before this, I need to get some ingredients from the Physics Teacher at Mystic Peak Small Square. It's a hard task, that area is infested by weird dogs and I am confident that you can do this for me. These medicines are needed very urgently.
This is the first time I'm seeing so much spores bundled together. They must be similar to sand. Hmm... These must be the spores that caused the allergy, right?
Here are some of the materials that are needed for producing the antibiotic. These things are obtainable nearby. Can you help me collect these items?

I heard that this hospital also get some supports from Sacred financial group. I am not sure about the group because I am new here. But I also heard that this hospital provide better facility and working environment after those supports.

Don't you want to know why the Werewolf has become more aggressive after the sudden phenomenon? I wonder what has effected the Werewolf like that. It will be possible by analysing the blood sample of Weerwolf... Would you please get me some blood sample?
Thank you for helping me clear this!
This is for Extra Stage. If you want Extra Stage, hurry up take this.
Ask whether the violence was on purpose.

I have done something wrong... ..Therefore I became a criminal , doing things... but it looks like I can leave immediately .. but I have no idea how I suddenly behaved as I did. ..it was as if someone was controlling me... asking me to murder...

It was as if someone was in my head directing me to do it though I know it's wrong...but... I guess it's pointless explaining it... I always thought that it was a bad thing.. ..yes , I initiated the rebellion... but , why even I am becoming like this? Can you see my leg? It looks...alive...doesn't it?
I am sorry! The video rental business is closed. The chaotic situation in this area has made most of the business operations to stop. Anyway, what can I do for you?
Ask to assemble the eight signs of divine.
Ah! My daughter is missing! I hope you are here to help me. I feel so troubled! Student, what can I do for you?
Pass the materials for Cassette recovery
Ask to assemble the eight signs of divine.

The Hospital services are unable to do treatments for my daughter. Sadly, the Police Department cannot do their duties. It is total chaos around here. Please! You must help my daughter... If you do, then I'll help you to recover that Cassette.

Is that real?! Thank you very much! The Nurse advised us that it was not a common allergy. Therefore, it was difficult to produce the treatment. I've heard something at the Police Station regarding the treatment; but I cannot remember what it was.
I am sorry.... I can't help you recover the Cassette.
You already acquired the medication! Thank you very much! This medicine will help my daughter in her treatment. As promised, I will now help you recover the cassette.

First of all, the nature of our business is Video Rental. We have no available equipments for Cassette recovery. I think we will be having a hard time in recovering this Cassette. We need the necessary equipments. I believe that the people at the Police Station can help us. Can you help me acquire the necessary equipments to fix this Cassette from the Police Station?
Ah, thank you! Let me try to fix this.... Just wait for 2 seconds. I'll let you have a look at my expertise on Video Equipments.
Here! It is done! Eventhough we cannot recover the entirety of the video, I think this will help you a lot. The video still has its essential contents. I made two copies for you.
About that? I heard it before, but I was more worried about my daughter. Sorry I can't help with that.
Is it about Mr. Brave? Yes? Sometimes I heard people complaining about him. I just ignored them.
That's right, this is the oil! So, where did you acquire these?
What? Broken Cassette? I cannot help you with that right now! My daughter is having high fever! Student, please help my daughter. She need treatment immediately.
You better check out the content of the cassette before returning it back to the Campus.
Please take good care of that cassette! It is very fragile. We might not be able to recover it again.
I feel very stressed-out! Need some Special Oil to recover my dizziness. Please help me.
I already order that Special Oil but it was not yet delivered to me. I heard that it was unloaded at No.3 Wharf. Can you get if for me?
Could you help me to look for it? Meanwhile, I will try my best to relax. Please take care. I heard it is dangerous in that area.
Our radio also have this status..... It seem a magnetic field........
Oh, this is walkie-talkie, it can be get it last time beside the stadium. But now now more......you can try to go that location and take a look.
So lucky! If like this, sure can repair it.......

Finally.. There is a student who want to enter Head Office. Why?. My shop required to prepare this equipment. Who is expecting this? Anyway It is not my business. But I am little worried about you since you helped me a lot before.

Can I see? Oh.. It is that one. Yes? ah.. 1 year ago, I read some documents regarding this and got trained about it. Let me see. All parts are here, so I could resemble it easily. But one of part has been cracked. I just need to hold this part since it is a attachment and it requires special paste to attach. You could attach it by a crystal powder in undergroud prison. I will show you how to attach it. Get a crystal powder and attach it.
Hm¡¦It's really strange. Really odd creatures are here. Inspires my curiosity a lot. Hope to go back to my lab as soon as possible. Hope that this situation goes end soon.
Deliver research report on enemy troops
Get the blood sample of Mutant Citizen
Deliver the blood sample of Mutant Citizen
Get the blood sample of Twisted Soldier
Deliver the blood sample of Twisted Soldier
Get the reseach report on the size of enemy.
Finally I got it! I've desperately needed it. Thank you! Ah, I have something for Ryuin. Wait for seconds..Where did I put it?
Ah! Here it is. It's a research report written while searching inside of the city. Please hand it over to Ryuin. He must want it.
Resembles Gorilla.. And a bunch of rare creatures are here, but they are really aggressive. It's my personal request, though, could you get me the blood samples of them?
Deeply appreciated! I want to proceed my experiments more!

Sorry, but I have one more favor for you. Did you see an abnormal living thing with strange arms. Looks really creepy, but I badly want to have a study about it. Can you bring me the blood sample of it?
Thank you for your help! Thank you so much! I'll never forget your hard decision on this!
What can I do to help?
I met the people who came out from Leonine Campus. I vividly remember that I got sneak-attacked by someone after I went into Leonine Campus. What? Why is my corpse still here...
Looks like I¡¦ve also become a monster just like them, and have been transported here the moment I passed away.

It's too late to do anything now for me, just try your best to make sure that no-one else is sacrificed again... And when the next time if you meet me in a transformed state, do not hesitate to kill me...
Plus, I vaguely remember that I felt as if I was cloned many times over, I don't know how many of my friends were attacked...
Hi, can help me defeat 100[Changgie soldier]?
Do you finish to defeat Changgie Soldier??
Thank you so much. You have very special skill.
Ask about the method to attack Lucian.
Ask about Blaze Angel Mia's information
Give the Ganil's Tear to me
Using Warrior's Spirit Neclace to exchange for Warrior Heart Necklace.
Ask about the method to Other World.
Give the magic soul stone to me
Using Warrior's Heart Necklace to exchange for Warrior Spirit Neclace.
Carl Sheldon is my friend, please introduce your self, or else...
"Aha~ you are the people from the other world...i'm sorry, too many things confuses me...haha.. Call me Liese."
"Am sorry if I lead you to worried...actually there is noting to worry about. However, you are awesome since you can reach here, it is prove that you are not a timid guy."
Ha...very easy, right?Lucian will appear again after one hour!!Help me on that time, please!!
Carl Sheldon,Mia and me came to this place after we were separated with other partners, and we found two important items in the basement....
Why Lucian need to attack it?
Go explore and search for the item which can make yourself more powerful!Find it at The absolute starting point!
The absolute starting point is a place where gathering all the force of power in this world, and it is also the birthplace of all things in this world.
Lucian have a weakness, you can create an item by using this five mysterious beads to fight against him. Those five mysterious beads can be collected from Lucian.
"Not bad... I will give you a relic of the Warrior, hope you can keep it carefully."

There is a door where can connect to our world. But you cannot enter because your time is yet to become . In front of the door, there is a person named Mia.......... When start to attack Lucian, you must be careful. It is my pleasure talking to you.
"Go and tell Carl Sheldon that Lucian is desires to conquer the absolute starting point. Mia is guarding the Dalamiya's door."
It is impossible if only rely on my ability
"The absolute starting point is unstable now. If I'm not injured, i can handle it with my power... Bring the tear to me, you can gather it from Fallen Blaze Angel and Gravity Cyborg."
I will make a necklace which is stronger than the Warrior's Luck and give it to you. If you want it, please take off your necklace. Tell me when you are ready.
Our partners need the Warrior Soul's relic...and to make one for you as well.. you must bring the Mia's magic soul stone to me. You must subdue it before bring to here.
I can help you to exchange the Warrior's Soul and make it into Warrior's Heart. If you want it, please take off your necklace. Tell me when you are ready.
Oh pity girl, she truly suffered on her fate.
Oh! Its great to finally see a normal human being again!
Hmm... If you listened in class, you can imagine how it would be like. It occurred earlier than expected. It all started 18 years ago.

We have anticipated this incident a long time ago; however, the extent of the situation was beyond our expectations. Please help collect essential information regarding this matter. Please help collect as much possible information as you can.

Right, now I am the one managing the distribution of this unique costumes because the person originally assigned to this job disappeared. Personally, I don't like the idea of distributing these items. The idea is the same, however I find it a bit of a pity to distribute these items off just like this.
Hmmm... What do you want to know?
Ask about what should be done.

Ah, are you looking for the spare parts to fix the bus? There are several people who collected the same spare parts recently. They keep coming back because of recurring car accidents. It will be great if these spare parts can be put to good use. Although we are prepared with the necessary equipments for incidents like this, the supply of spare parts are dwindling.
All spare parts have been released and the ones left are not compatible with the ones you need.

So your here to buy more spare parts. Hmm... Where did you get these strange currency notes? Look, I still have a lot of those things here and I really don't know where they came from. These notes were verified by the withdrawal machines as genuine notes before. I've already asked the cleaner to collect all these notes before. If this continues on spreading it would be a worse problem. Please take them again for verification.
Those currency notes are obviously strange and its good we have discovered them before the problem worsen. Just continue delivering the Order Document, It'll be a big help!
Oh so you've already reached the level that I require to qualify for this exam? Your learning speed is faster than I expected!
Good you have passed the exam by achieving your level eventhough it was less than what I expected. You will need to practice more in order to be ready for any kind of attack from these fellas.
In any case, I cannot help you with what you are looking for. Try to visit the Supervisor located at the Construction Site 4th Hole instead.
You can get the spare parts you need from the supervisors of the Construction Site located at the 4th Hole. However, you will need to exert extra efforts and prove your self worthy of the items.

Great! So.... Before passing you the exam questions, I'll remind you again on the purpose of this test that I have previously mentioned the last time. Your regular targets in this test are not human beings.

That’s the reason why you need to regularly take this type of exams. You will be able to learn things that you really need to learn. Although the situation has arisen earlier than expected, it will not be until now.
You really must continue learning diligently in the future. Eventually, the enemies that you have to fight will not be at this level only. Do you understand me?
This Terminal controls the access to the Student Center 1 Building.
The Force Field function of the terminal is operating properly.
The Force Field verification is completed! Please proceed to the next terminal to complete the required Optimization procedures.
There are some Evil Spirits moving around the depths of the Student Center 1.
You are required to gather 13 Spiritual Spheres to optimize this Terminal's Force Field function.
The mobs possessed by these Evil Spirits bring undesirable effects to the surroundings. Please try your best to eliminate them.
Oh my goodness! Why are so many people injured?
Pass the Papers for Medical Report

There isn't much medicine left. Unfortunately I can't help those who are severely injured. However, I can still be able to treat those who have suffered minor injuries. Due to the limitations of my skills, I cannot help injuries of students beyond Level 15.
¹Ì¾È, ³» ½Ç·ÂÀ¸·Î ÇÐ»ýÀ» Ä¡·áÇß´Ù°¡´Â ¿ÀÈ÷·Á ÇØ¸¦ ÀÔÈúÁöµµ ¸ô¶ó.

I cannot say that it is a kind of epidemic or sickness. I believe it is more of a serious chemical reaction where the victim's body get burned, paralyzed by electricity, or frozen. There are also other situations where the victim's body becomes stiff as a stone.
Ask about the effects of the burns
Ask about the effects of the paralysis
Ask about the effects of freezing
Ask about the effects of poisoning
Ask about the effects of suffocation
I have no idea regarding the recurring situation outside. However, I have heard from different conversations between teachers that the situation doesn't look good at all.
When the victim's whole body is exposed to burns, the physical strength and stamina will be degraded into a weakened state. Burns bring fatal effects to a victim's health so please be careful.
If a victim is shocked and paralyzed by electricity, his/her movement speed slows down.

When the body of the victim is frozen, the body stiffens which causes the movement rate to decrease and the defense mechanism to be weakened. If the victim is allowed to suffer in this condition for a prolonged period of time, the effects could be fatal.

The condition of the victim's physical strength will decrease continuously if poisoned. After being poisoned, the physical strength and stamina of the victim will decrease gradually. The rate of damage from being poisoned is higher than the case of getting burnt. Please be aware of this fact!

When a victim is suffocated, the movement of the victim will immediately become awry. However, this condition will not last long. Having said that, it is still considered a dangerous condition. Please be careful not to get suffocated!
Although the medicines I have are not really enough to heal your condition. I would still try my best to aid you. Please let me take a look at your injury.
Ask about the treatment of wounds

Oh! Are you going to register? I bet this is your first time to register. I've never seen anyone as stiff as you. Do you understand the terms of registration? I can assure you that you could always come to me to get some treatment until you reach level 15. Please do visit me in case you need some treatment. Don't you think it'll be more convenient if you change your Save Point over here?

Writing these medical reports is really an exhausting work. Can you help me solve my problem because I ran out of papers? There are stocks of papers available at the Welfare Society. Can you go there and get some papers for me?

Ah! Thank you very much! This job requires me to write Medical records all day. If you get injured in the future, please fell free to approach me. I will attend to your medical needs and make sure you get quality treatment.

Oh! You already got it? Thank you very much! You have been a great help! If not for these medicines, we will have shortages in supplies. It will cause havoc to the campus if we do not have first-aid medicine supplies like this. I hope the situation outside would get better. I'm really afraid if the situation continues it would bring disorder to the campus.

The quality and quantity of medicine supplies are not good at all. This causes us to produce our own means of acquiring medicine supplies. Excuse me. Would you be willing to help me collect some Cigarette Butts? Have you ever heard of the two notorious chain-smokers around? They are the Little Hooligan and the Hooligan. The last time I requested for cigarette butts from someone, I found out that the quality of the cigarette butts from the Little Hooligan are not of good quality. I couldn't use them to produce medicinal materials. Would you help me acquire cigarette butts from the Hooligan instead? Ah! Don't worry. I'll exchange some of my money with you if you get me 20 cigarette Butts from the Hooligan.

Wow! You already collected the Cigarette Butts! Thank you so much! Starting today, we should be producing our own medicinal materials. So, in case you have any available time to spare in the future, please come here and help me again. Ok?

We are not just experiencing a shortage in medicines but also a shortage in medical supplies used for treatment. If the situation continues to be like this, we have to come up with procedures to acquire all necessary medicine supplies and equipments by ourselves. I just had a great idea! There is a group of mobs outside called Street Junkie. They carry and wear bandages and plasters. Yes! I remember these fellas actually carry bandages in their pockets. These Street Junkies really don't need those bandages. I believe that other students will benefit a lot from those bandages. Having said that, will you help me get bandages from the Street Junkie? The supplies for bandages are minimal. We should therefore acquire these bandages to compensate the need for it.

This is great! Thanks! Most students look tough on the outside. Deep inside they are really quite as obedient as you are. You really have to communicate pleasantly to people so that they will treat you with respect. Anyway, thanks a lot! I might come and ask for your assistance again in the future. *smiles*

( A lifeless looking body looks as if its still alive but the pulse has already stopped. )
Now, a few years? With someone else, where?
Where is my love? I really want to know. Maybe we can find her on one of the schools.
Let me know if I can help you.
No, can you recall any clues?
Thank you for your help, you're such a nice person.
No, can you recall any clues?
The trials of love is this you? Golf Bomber fight, please.
Complete eradication? I would have loved someone to prove it.
I gradually came to think of the unpleasant past has happened, she broke my heart ... Please help my body get back in the ultra-spiritual body I used to have a broken heart
This is my heart? It seems that this is not enough, please give me a copy from the cruel bald macho, please find it for my body.
Now that you are ready to see you me and my love to let go. Thank you.
I like to help student You need help? Please tell me.
I want to use the taxi service.
I want to get a taxi card.
Report the status of Power Plant
Using it is dangerous for a new student. I recommend progressing through your profession to do other affairs.
I need to know the situation outside the campus. There¡¯s a rumor saying that a lot of blood drinkers are lurking near the campus entrance.
Wow. That was fast! As promised, here is the special card. Please take it.
I just received a campus memo from the school director. It appears that there is a group of bad guys using short swords to harass students at the campus entrance. Please help them.
Those drunk people walking around the city is making me worry. Lets put a stop to this nonsense before they do more damage.
More and more Cordys and Sanitizers are entering the city. We need to take action. Please help me clear them out.
I am worried about our new students, please help me defeat Dark Swordsman Jr.

I was recently visited by a Sacred Gate Student. He showed a special design to me but I did not quite get what it meant. I think Monisha will be able to understand it. Please pass this document to her.
Is it done? Here's a recommendation letter for you. You may trade it with Monisha for an item.
Please find Technical Teacher (Phoenix) in Phoenix Hole and inquire about the taxi issue.
Please try the service. I believe you already know how to use it.
Tenured students doesn't really want to wear the current uniforms. Maybe it is because the uniform is no longer suitable for them. I think I can supply a uniform that has a better quality to them.
I really want to arrange all the old books and ancient books in the dormitory. Can you help? I will give you a reward.
You already collected them all. Thank you so much. This is the uniform that I told you about. Please take it.
If you want to use the Taxi Service, please go to the dormitory and collect 10 old books for me.
I know someone who's knowledgeable in mixing items. His name is Jack. You may find him at the Market.
