Click shortcut icon of Extra Activity to confirm the goal and carry out the instructed task then you will be rewarded with Title which you can put above your name and the Activity Point. Complete enough activities to acquire activity points and go see "Extra Activity Teacher' and buy special item it.

Many number of students are performing investigation, research and given missions in Power Plant after its discovery. However, they have gotten competitive because there is a rumor saying that whoever dominates the area will be able to find a clue to get to the Another World.

Carrying out a very special mission is called Extra Activity. Extra Activity would be collecting particular item or eliminating particular monster and when you are done, you will be rewarded with the Title which is to put above your name and activity points. With enough activity points, you can buy very special items.

A very special Power Plant has been discovered which is connected through the tunnel behind Saint HQ. Currently, teachers are dispatched to carry out special mission given after the discussion of the deans of each school. There are not enough information gathered yet but I hope a excellent student like yourself can borrow them hands.

From what I have heard so far, all the life forms such as the trees and plants are sick. In order to figure out what the host is, it requires help from many students. Please go there and find dispatched Extra Activity Teacher.
The energy generated from Power Plant to Research Complex?.. Hmm.. Why?... It would lead me somewhere..

Once, I had investigated all the places hit by the meteoric shower. But I could not find anything special. Oh! Saint HQ had covered up the meteoric shower. I didn't know why then but I think I can put the pieces together now.
It's the time to break the limit Good luck!
Urga in St. Research Cplx wants to help you earn new power. Go meet him and ask for help.
Things are getting worse around here everyday¡¦
I am in no better situation. It makes me shiver, you asking me a favor even though we do not know each other. But, if you do me a favor first then I might rethink this through..

All of my co-workers are mutated. It is a very sad story. However, if the Toxicant they possess gets into school then it would cause catastrophy. So, please do defeat those researchers. If you come across a necklace while defeating them then please bring it to me.
Hu Hu Hu.. As I thought.. I had expected it but I am happy to confirm it. Thanks!

I was born a twin and had a younger brother. We used to work together at this place. He was very talented. Maybe that is why he was chosen to be experimented. However, I came back to find my brother after that incident. Please find my brother!
Are you sure it is my brother? Well, it sure sounds like him. It will take much more time to recover his identity. Please take care of him as much as you can! Please!
I found the mutant supplying toxicant to them! Tech Researcher (Elite) has been giving secretion to others. It is the cause. Go get rid of him.
Ah! Student! Why do you look so troubled?
Ask about the document related to action guild for emergency
I am very frustrated for just being an employee for a company! Someday, I want to have my own business. To have the right attitude and outlook in life is an essential!
Student! Increasing my knowldege in order to have a great career headstart is an important aspect of my goals right now. Would you be willing to help me?

Ah! do you really want to help me? Thank you very much. The MinFuLeiSi Special Publishing House published a book that was snatched from me. The title of the book is Online Games Programming Guide. A villain known as the Cripple Guy took possession of it. Please help me by acquiring the book from that vile mobster!
I can't believe that this rare book; which is hard to buy, was snatched by that person. This is inexcusable! My dear Student, could you help me to find it again? Please?!
Thanks! Its great to know that you are here to help. There is another book snatched from me entitled Games Programmer C++. It was snatched by a villain known as the Skating Master. Please help me!

That book I bought is very precious! It is one of my favorite books because it covers thae basics of Programming. I spent a lot of money to buy that book. Sadly, somebody took it away from me. Could you help me acquire the book again?

Ah, do you really want to help me? Thank you very much. The book which got snatched from me was published by MinFuLeiSi Special Publishing House, title of the book is Special Influence Games Programming It was snatched by a friend call Hodel. Please help me.

I am little bit afraid to buy book at this time. It is alright just standing like this, but if only the book is moving, then it would get attacked. This time I didn't buy the book, gotten it from a known friend. Can you help me one more time?

Thank you very much. The book which got snatched from me was published by MinFuLeiSi Special Publishing House, title of the book is Programming RPG for DirectX It was snatched by a friend call Clown ICE. Please help me.

I really need to have those books in order to overcome this difficult stage. I believe there are also other people making requests to you; please do spare some of your time to help me. Would that be OK?

So you really want to help me? Thank you very much. The book which got snatched from me was published by the MinFuLeiSi Special Publishing House. The title of the book is Tricks Of The Windows Game Programming. It was snatched by a friend named Golf. Please help me.
You found it! I never expected that you will really help me find these books! Thanks a lot. You are really a helpful student!
Wow! Thanks a lot! I feel ashamed. I would like to express my deepest gratitude to you for having the trouble of attending to my requests. These books will really help me a lot!
What are you asking about? Do you need information regarding Programs? Games Program? Right?! I will try my best to provide you with all the necessary information that you need!
Most of the civilians here have nothing else to do but to watch the chaotic situation to worsen. Its good to see students like you helping out minimize the chaos in your own little ways!
I have a feeling that sales today would be low. However, I'm keeping my hopes up!

There are different textbooks about Gaming; but, just a small number of them are useful. Furthermore, most of the useful Gaming books are hard to find. This is why I feel very disappointed when I lost my precious textbooks!
If don't buy those books, you won't be able to buy it again in future. They are limited in supply. The precious books I bought was snatched away. It is very disappointing!
There are no more textbook supplies in this city. This is why I am vigilant in creating my own copies of these textbooks. Soon, I want to establish my own special course on Progamming.
I picked this thing up while I was walking around the area. I wonder if you can take this and put it into good use. Here! Please accept it!
I picked this thing up while I was walking around the area. I wonder if you can take this and put it into good use. Here! Please accept it!

Ah. It is so appreciated.. Actually it was a personal collection.. I was so upset because I had to hard time to collect that. If you ever tried to collect something, you might understand how I feel... Anyway, Thank you very much.
Ah. The action guide of emergency? Yes.. I have. Haha, I cannot believe my collection is helpful!
I also happened to know, and when I heard someone in this place because they were isolated and unable to exit the story. No matter how you want to see if anyone needs any help.
I've got the books collected during this period is really very expensive .... Oh. Is good enough to be shouted that "this is a good thing ..! " level. Know of it?
I do not know the value of books these people, how could something so important to deal with it .... so the thought of this .... Please help me find..

Only The Full Moon Piece Makes my Full Moons Stays with me! Can you bring me the full moon pieces
400 Full Moon Pieces = Full Moon Random Box
Exchange 400 Full Moon Pieces to Full Moon Random Box.
This Terminal controls the access to the Art Center Building.
The Terminal's Force Field function is operating properly. You must gather 13 Spiritual Spheres in order to optimize the Force Field function of this Terminal.
Force Field Optimization is completed! Please proceed to the next Terminal and complete the required optimization to learn the Force Field Effects.
There are evil spirits moving around inside the Art Center. The mobs who are possessed by these evil spirits bring undesirable effects to the environment. Please do your best to eliminate them.
There are evil spirits moving around inside the Art Center. The mobs who are possessed by these evil spirits bring undesirable effects to the environment. Please do your best to eliminate them.
The required amount for purification has been achieved. Thank you for your tremendous efforts.
The primary target in this area are the Street Junkies. Please eliminate 22 Street Junkie targets.
The next target are the Sluggers. Please eliminate 24 Slugger targets.
The smell of the sea is the only thing that makes me feel at peace in this area. The nasty gangsters have taken control over the facilities.
The smell of the sea is the only thing that makes me feel at peace in this area. The nasty gangsters have taken control over the facilities.
Ask about the security code for head office

Wow! The body looks pretty strong! But how to wear clothes like that? Buddha to gold, we can tailor makes the man, I have prepared just for you, you take it to find what to wear it. Take as gift from the elderly.

Hello Student! I've never seen you before. I am not sure though. You came here to look for me? Do you want to talk about the Sacred Financial Group? Why? What is wrong? Walking to this area is tiring right? I bet you are tired. Have a rest first.

Did you see the Freezing Warehouse over there? There is also a Water Purification Center before in that area. I heard that it performed basic water purification processes. Can you go there and check if the Purification activities are still operational?
Too late! How could you spend so much time just looking for just one bottle? You already look so tired. There's still a long long way to go!

The Water Purification Centre seems to be not working. There something wrong with their facilities. The generator is unable to function properly. Student, go and get the spare parts for the generator. You can find it at No.2 Wharf. Also, go and then find another empty bottle to replace the one you got just gave me.
What!? How am I going to deal with your carelessness? Nevertheless, I have to pay you since I've assigned you a task.

Something strange is going to happen soon! The series of events that occurred in the Management Office the Green Gangster Headquarters will lead us to disorder. I heard that these vile individuals have an evil plan. This just makes me so worried. The cassette tape recording of the situation that occurred in that office can be acquired in the Management Offices. Please help me acquire it so we can further investigate the vile activities that they have.
That's the video cassette! I hope we can get something substantial in the video in order to help our investigation.
It looks like it's been placed in a humid environment for a long time. Please go to the Trading Hole and ask the Image Expert to recover it. He is a friend of mine.

Wow! Thanks! Are there news from my friend who fixed this? OK! Forget about the cassette for a moment. Here's an important thing, a few days ago there was a kid who was kidnapped and disappeared, Who could have done that?
Last time is heard in No. 4 Wharf, but no instruction. You can just ignore first. Although no helper, but not difficult to search.
More thing you need to do in future. But i believe you can make it...

My duty here was to safeguard the docks and ensure that no illegal activities are done. It is sad to say that my experience in the dock trading has rendered me to be left alone being ignored by the illegal traders. The area is now under the control of the evil gangsters.
Listen to the Request of the Old MAN
Thank you.... Although all is old book, but it is very important for me. Take care....
I'm grateful for what you've done.
Erm....item i gave out, it come back to me.....
Get Scroll of Demon Spear Dance
Get Scroll of Spear Guardian's Wrath

Oh we meet again¡¦ So. You want to enter Head office this time? You know the student is not allowed to enter this building. Not only it is the center of place where a time stopped in this are but also there are lots of danger in that place. Still want to go? Ok. Anyway my friend also expected this. Bring the code!

You.. Do you know what this mean? Actually this is not just code. Although the code number is the simplified access code, you cannot run away from this school. Everything what my friend foresee become true.
What can I do to help?
I dowanna die¡K I¡¦ve still got many unsettled things..! I just dowanna die like this~!
What the¡K I¡¦m not dead yet¡K of course I can still speak! I¡¦m not dead yet, I¡¦m still alive and kicking! I¡¦m still alive~!

I¡K. really don¡¦t know¡K. At this moment, I can¡¦t remember anything ¡K However whether or not I still retain my memory is secondary¡K I just want you to help me stay alive! Can you hear my voice? I said I dowanna die!

This is the new heaven of virus. Thanks to that the medical professions are living a very busy lives. The mutants have separate organ for poison and virus and they can belch whichever whenever they like. There is no cure or antidote yet. Please take care of yourself.
People who were attacked by Guard Dogs are getting infected faster. It must be stopped. Please go extract the virus from Guard Dogs.
Thank you! Let me make it up to you!
Virus sample of Guard Dog isn't the only thing needed to progress the research further and it is on temporary hold. If I just had a normal blood sample, everything must be whole lot easier.
I thought all the Guard Dogs had been mutated. I never thought to get normal blood! This is enough to help the research.
I know its rude of me to call you but you know, I cannot go anywhere. I have a very personal favor to ask¡¦
I have seen a person who looks very similar to who I dated before I attended nursing school. If you see a tall and slim young man with glasses then please tell him about me.
I have been getting trained to become a nurse for past a few years. I don't know about this place. Oh! Yes, I was at the hospital for a while. It's true.
Thank you so much for doing this! I have found out that the Tech Reseacher (Elite) has more deadly virus than the Guard Dog. Please get their virus samples, I need them to make new antibiotics.
Extra Activity Teacher who I met while I was studying nursing was very mysterious man wrapped behind a veil. He was hiding many things and plus he knew the Power Researcher P...
I once was devoted into schizophrenia research. There had been many failure in the process but I managed to find the perfect combination formula.

World Tree is legendary tree which can survive from the Evil Spirits and unpleasant mutants. There is a rumor that the scent of Herb of World Tree can call spirits.. Adding this herb into a medicine will maximize the effect of such medicine. Just bring me the ingredients then I will make it for you.

Yes, correct. This is the 'Herb of World Tree'. It has been really long since I have last seen it.. It feels weird.. Combine processed saliculic acid of World Tree and bark of willow with acetylsalicylic acid to make a very special medicine.
It is done! Please inform the Student Director (Dispatched)
I am trying to connect this place and the schools to communicate by adjusting signal. But there is not enough parts to make the controller. Guard Robots must be using some electrical parts I need.
I am trying to connect this place and the schools to communicate by adjusting signal. But there is not enough parts to make the controller. Labor Robots must be using some electrical parts I need.
Controller is ready. Get to the "Satellite Dish' which you can find it in minimap then it will automatically control the satellite signal for better communication.
Oh Great! Please keep this secret in case anyone asks about this!
( A lifeless looking body looks as if its still alive but the pulse has already stopped. )
May I ask what are you looking for?
Exchange to Purplish Dragon Swrd Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Lite Dragon Swrd Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Ugrd. Iron Bow Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Spar Aly Bow Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Spar Lite Aly Bow Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Spirits Spear Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Dragon Wand Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Tough Glv Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Lite Tough Glv Box(15D)
Exchange to Purplish Hvy. Tough Glv Box(15D)

Good luck!! Next step, you need try talking with school helper.
Good luck!! If you complete this quest, you can get 2 stats Point.
Oh, do you have Dormant Moon Lamps?
Exchage to Coupons for Moon Bear Leather Apparel

You need collect 5 tickets for exchange to Moon Bear Costumes.
Do you have 15 tickets??

You need collect 30 Rice-cake soups for exchange to Lucky pouch
Do you have 30 Rice-cake soups??
Ekstra! ! Ekstra! Come and get the special experience.
Ekstra! ! Ekstra! Come and get the special experience.
I can't give chance to you
Ok, I'll give this chance to you
"Good Luck!! This mission is very easy."
"Great!! I hope that you are best of the best in this school."

Sigh.. I don't even know where to begin. My situation is a bit complicated because I have to attend to the Health Advisor's request in searching for first-aid medicines. I lost the list of medicines, and that is a serious problem.

This is the first time in my life that I've met a problem that doesn't make ant sense even one bit. I can't even go outside to know the actual situation. Where in hell did these mobs came from? Not so long ago, I nearly found myself dying in the hands of these creatures while I was rescuing a friend of mine. I barely escaped the jaws of death and I tell ya... It was horrible!
Ask about the situation on the streets.

Hmmmm... Let me see. Even though I had a tough time coming here, I don't think I have any other information to tell you. But hold on for a minute... There is this thing called the Abrasive Kit. You can utilize that item to produce better and stronger equipments for yourself.
Ask about how to use the Abrasive Kit

Open the inventory window and choose the Abrasive Kit. Drag it to the item you want to transform by clicking the top right position of the item, and the item will be upgraded. But you must realize that there is a big probability of failure. You must understand that items vanish resulting from unsuccesful transformation attempts.

Make sure you stop and never pass through the crossroads in front. There are a lot of weird dogs loittering that area and no one knows where they came from. It would be safer to travel along the left or right corner streets. Honestly, I am not familiar with the other roads because I've never actually passed by them before.

It's hell having these fellas around I tell ya!
Ask whether there are any other useful information.

You mean the mail from the Headquarters of the Finance Department? Hmm... I actually had this kind of documents before; but I'm not sure where I placed it. Ah! It’s here. It looks like a simple document, however, it was personally requested by the Student Director I think he has little trust on students. What is important is that the document is still here.

Oh my goodness! I almost... I didn’t think about it at the start. I was thinking of asking you to do something. I was not aware of the full extent of chaos perpetrated by these weird mobs within the campus grounds and its vicinity. This is the reason why I stay here. Not so long ago, the Health Advisor's written note requested by the Blood Drinker was stolen. I am sorry for bothering you; but may I know whether you've found the stolen note?
Well I'll be... This Is the note! Thank you for finding it for me. However, bigger problems remain despite the fact that his note has been found.

Please consider if you could do me a favor it and deliver this medicine to that fella. The Health Advisor has ordered several times the recovery of the first-aid medicine as soon as possible. So please accept my request again. There are fellas known as the Blood Drinkers. They rob people who posses the medicine. It is evident that these Blood Drinkers have the medicines. Please ensure that the people will never be robbed again.

Oh! You have found all of them! Thank you very much Student! Please take these medicines to the Health Advisor now. The people causing disorder in the campus prevents me from bringing these medicines to the Health Advisor personally.

Hmmmm?Did the Health Advisor like it? Oh! He did? See those fellas becoming more reckless? Especially that group of people called the Ardee Boys. Trust me, those daggers they are waving around are awful. Even though you see everyone carrying blood-stained daggers around, you necessarily don't have to be afraid of these slashers; but those Ardee Boys are dangerous! Student, please do me a favor. Help me acquire those knives from the Ardee Boys. Although it is impossible to acquire all daggers, I think getting 10 Daggers shouldn't be a problem.

Sorry for causing you too much trouble. I really appreciate all your efforts, especially by your part in aiding the eradication of these dangers in the campus. Your performance is indeed impressive. If ever I meet your teachers again, I would not forget to mention the good things you did for me.
I heard there appear more capital item. You can get the rumor through campus's cross junction there~
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him

Holding a broom means that you're sweeping right? If you’re not, then please put away the broom before coming into the Admin Office.

Student! It looks like you still haven't registered as a College Student yet! Even though the situation outside is a complete disorder, I will never let a new student skip the registration process. You need to register first so we can assess that you are qualified to be a student of this college. Please accomplish the Registration process as soon as possible.

This place was build to gather all outstanding students and educate them to be strong individuals. If new students still haven't reached a commendable level at this time, that just implies a lack of self development in there part.
If you have been listening carefully during your class session, you wouldn't ask me this question. The surrounding chaos outside prevents students to maintain a stable state of mind.
Green? It sounds decent enough. Since the college was established, the nearby area became a gangster territory. It has now become a place for criminal gang organizations.

The four colleges were set up with a Force Field. However, the weird situation that happened in the Leonair Campus caused the spread of abnormality within the Sacred Gate, Mystic Peak and Phoenix campuses.
What! You still don't know the location of the Health room? You can go straight across the Administration Office and you'll probably see a room labeled as the "Health Room".

It's a strange thing that the students sent to investigate the Leonair Campus hasn't arrived yet. The specialist from the Financial Group also has no idea regarding this matter.
This is not the right time for students to become clueless with regards to the registration process. In the past, there's no need to repeat these routines.

There are still a number of students who haven't registered. Most of the students don't even report to school. If only the school schedules for this academic year were organized, then we wont be having these problems.
Although it's hard to operate normally in this chaotic condition, but still we cannot completely ignore the proper procedures.
We should try our best to survive this abnormal situation. We should be calm and hold everything together until this big matter has been resolved.
After attending your classes, you will understand that the balance in this world has started to break apart. The student's reaction regarding this situation is like they don’t even care.
Your Registration and Exit Approval is already completed. Why do you look uneasy?
The Force Fields around the campus needs to be activated in order to see its effects.
Please acquire the Broom from the Locker Custodian. But before returning it back to him, please dispose the Rubbish trashes inside the Dormitory. Please don't mess around. O.K?
The students are doing good in terms of their training. Please be prepared to go outside for your training.
Really! These are two Cigarette Butts! Its not that I don't trust the Students. I just worry about them.
So, these are the notes from the Legend? I have been expecting this for a long time.

My associates will contact you again in case they need some more notes in the future. We will inform you where to meet up. I would like to remind you that we are not just talking about normal money here.

At last! The Order Books and information from the Financial Group Headquarters has arrived. However, the Guard outside the Main entrance takes possession of it. Please help me acquire the documents from the Guard. Return here if you already got it.
Our campus also needs backup disks. If you want to recover the emergency facilities, there’s no other way but to make a move and acquire these disks.
So, these are the notes from the Legend? I have been expecting this for a long time.
Alright! Thanks! I can use these to utilize the necessary facilities around. Hold on! This would not take long. Just bring the documents over.
Do you want some instructions? Let me see?It’s been awhile. I don’t know if it’s still good.
Please clean the Dormitory and gather all the garbage. We just happened to prepare the broom. Go and collect the garbage when you have the time.
Wow! You collected a lot! These would be enough. Thank you very much. Please come back again to help if you have the time to spare.
The broom can help students differentiate the garbage which could help the investigation.
The broom can be acquired from the locker room. Go take it and I'll explain to you what to do next.
These paper notes does not look like counterfeited money. These notes are made exquisitely. Obviously there is an objective behind all these.
Hmm?The numeric figures in these notes are flawless. Let us try what we can do with this low quality notes.
Please do not forget to report to me any important discovery you might find on the 3rd Floor.
Is this cassette? Could this contain the records of Leonair Campus? Did you read the contents? Have you made a request to the Specialist from the Financial Group?

Students, listen to this. Everything has been designated from the beginning. Everything depends on the existence that controls them. There is no way to get away from this process. There should be no more doubt about life right? There are things that can be known, and things that should not be known. You have to distinguish the difference between them.
You have to verify this first. It shouldn't be a problem. This means you can't predict what will happen next.
Yeah! This is a matter that demands a large amount of time.
I am sure that there are some people who will initiate the start of chaos. No matter you like or not, you have to do it.
Under this tremendous situation, a Gang should practice unity and do their best in serving its purpose.
This situation was predicted a long time ago. Sadly, it happened earlier than expected. We must act swiftly to discover all the details so that we can solve this as soon as possible.

Not so long ago, the students had a big fight. Since then, these abnormal things started to happen. Maybe we can figure something out from there. There have been also malicious rumors that some students are joining the Green's Territory. Who could've spread these hearsays around? Could it be the group of people from the Sacred Gate Park?

Perhaps solving the mystery inside the Leonair Campus would help make the situation better. The students and teachers have become our enemies. This just makes the situation hard to overcome. We should be prepared in case the situation becomes worse.

This situation never happened before. Procedures have become complicated while the Computer Room is not functioning properly. If these matters are not resolved, the students might be in danger. Oops, I talked too much!
I will help you process the application forms. Take the Original copy away. Go to the Society Room and hand-in your Exit Approval to the teacher. After filling it up bring it over here.

I'm not questioning the capability of the student. It’s just that they are not human anymore. I have no idea what’s wrong. A lot of students are coming to the First-Aid Room and it seems that there are no perfect solution to this problem. You must understand this.

I won't repeat these statements to other students either. Now, what would it be?
All I ask is for you students to be careful and not to die. That's all I can tell you.

Our world is not maintaining its original state. It’s like some students who have developed some special and uncanny capabilities. Most of them do not even know how to use these powers effectively. It’s hard to stay safe right now.
Our college has a special Force Fields everywhere. Sad to say that at a certain level, these Force Fields would be affected by the unusual phenomena.

I know that there are some foolish people in front of the Headquarters just by looking at them. Nevertheless, I feel comfortable because of the exam that each Student must go through.
There are a group of Mobs called the Little Hooligan walking around. Please go and get two (2) Cigarette Butts from them. If you do this, I will reward you with both experience and skill points.
You've completed the Force Field Activation? That was fast! I bet you've strong!
The School Principal used a weird material to create the Force Field. I really don't believe it but it really has amazing effects!

I already mentioned this to you many times before. The situation outside is unexplainable. It is something I never imagined. Some students who reached the Main Gate and attempted to pass through were rushed to the first-aid room. How come they were not able to pass through?

There is a test procedure prepared before passing through the Main Gates. Once the Terminal located near the Main Gate started the test procedure, you are required to finish the test within a specific amount of time.

In order to start a Gang you need at least five (5) members who do not belong to any gang. The Gang Leader applicant should possess a character level of 30 and pay a processing fee of 1,000,000 Gold Coins. Gang Upgrade Charges: [Level D]: 2,000,000 Gold Coins [Level C]: 3,500,000 Gold Coins [Level B]: 5,000,000 Gold Coins [Level A]: 7,000,000 Gold Coins
If you decided to dissolve the Gang or terminate the Gang, the experience will be lost.
If either you quit a gang or if you are kicked from a gang, you are temporarily not allowed to join another gang. Please remember this important note.

No wonder i never see you now days, you went to that place.
I already know the situation there. Please send this document to Trading Hole Police Station.
Middle Hole and Root Hole have serious problem. You need to cool down and go further.
Financial Group's Director Lee Shi Zhang is one of the most sought after FengShui master. After he experienced 18 years ago's meteor shower. He can foresee future..........
Teacher only know how to manage college task, they not know other thing. But, i can't expect the worst is Financial Group Area.

the residents in the those planar worlds and parallel world co exist with us. However, our human eyes are unable to detect the physical differences after the merger, not even if there is a planar being standing beside us.

It already prove. As long as a single cell is able to penetrate this world, and merge with the life form from this world, a new life form will be created through this process. Those devastating creatures we see right now are also created through this process. Do you understand?
Root Hole? The Financial Group's Building? Yes, i met a old man there. I heard thre are twin. You know what he talking about?
En...en.. Haha.... The old man seem very like you.
Go Trading Hole and talk to AngBeeLan. You may know more detail.
It is like the attendance list of students.. Maybe it is more like the student record list. Anyway it is nothing wrong with that list. Then why are you so curious about it?
Ask about the background of those students
How did you enter this school? It is just same as you. Don't waste of you effort on list.
I'm not sure why the streets have become like this. I am so lucky I was able to find a safe place to hide. Sheesh! I really don't know what will happen to me if I am not careful.
You still have no idea after seeing it? Things suddenly became like these as I was cleaning the streets. You should be careful strolling around this area. It is really dangerous!
Ever since these events unfolded, we really do not have time to run away. No one is left to do the cleaning up to now.

We really must try to treasure all kinds of resources. I will call upon you again when you have some free time to spare again in the future. I'll exchange the stuff that you collect for me with any of my other items.
If we continue to tolerate the lack of resources, we will have problems in the future. Let us try to help each other gather the resources we need in order to survive this chaos.
It will be a good start to help me collect Empty Bottles. Please remember to utilize your medicinal supplies carefully. We need to conserve resources during these times.
Holding a broom means you are sweeping right? If you are not, please put away the broom before coming to the Administrator's Office?

Student! It looks like you still haven't registered as a College Student yet! Even though the situation outside is a complete disorder, I will never let a new student skip the registration process. You need to register first so we can assess that you are qualified to be a student of this college. Please accomplish the Registration process as soon as possible.
Request to Pass through the Main Gate
Request to Pass through the Main Gate
Request to Pass through the Main Gate
Request to Pass through the Main Gate
Listen Root Hole's information from Old Man
Request to Pass through the Main Gate

This place was build to gather all outstanding students and educate them to be strong individuals. If new students still haven't reached a commendable level at this time, that just implies a lack of self development in there part.
If you have been listening carefully during your class session, you wouldn't ask me this question. The surrounding chaos outside prevents students to maintain a stable state of mind.
Green? It sounds decent enough. Since the college was established, the nearby area became a gangster territory. It has now become a place for criminal gang organizations.

The four colleges were set up with a Force Field. However, the weird situation that happened in the Leonair Campus caused the spread of abnormality within the Sacred Gate, Mystic Peak and Phoenix campuses.
What! You still don't know the location of the Health room? You can go straight across the Administration Office and you'll probably see a room labeled as the "Health Room".

It's a strange thing that the students sent to investigate the Leonair Campus hasn't arrived yet. The specialist from the Financial Group also has no idea regarding this matter.
Ask about the Leonair College ID Card
This is not the right time for students to become clueless with regards to the registration process. In the past, there's no need to repeat these routines.

We should try our best to survive this abnormal situation. We should be calm and hold everything together until this big matter has been resolved.
After attending your classes, you will understand that the balance in this world has started to break apart. The student's reaction regarding this situation is like they don’t even care.
Your Registration and Exit Approval is already completed. Why do you look uneasy?
The Force Fields around the campus needs to be activated in order to see its effects.
Please acquire the Broom from the Locker Custodian. But before returning it back to him, please dispose the Rubbish trashes inside the Dormitory. Please don't mess around. O.K?
The students are doing good in terms of their training. Please be prepared to go outside for your training.
Really! These are two Cigarette Butts! Its not that I don't trust the Students. I just worry about them.
So, these are the notes from the Legend? I have been expecting this for a long time.

My associates will contact you again in case they need some more notes in the future. We will inform you where to meet up. I would like to remind you that we are not just talking about normal money here.

At last! The Order Books and information from the Financial Group Headquarters has arrived. However, the Guard outside the Main entrance takes possession of it. Please help me acquire the documents from the Guard. Return here if you already got it.
Our campus also needs backup disks. If you want to recover the emergency facilities, there’s no other way but to make a move and acquire these disks.
So, these are the notes from the Legend? I have been expecting this for a long time.
Alright! Thanks! I can use these to utilize the necessary facilities around. Hold on! This would not take long. Just bring the documents over.

These paper notes does not look like counterfeited money. These notes are made exquisitely. Obviously there is an objective behind all these.
Hmm?The numeric figures in these notes are flawless. Let us try what we can do with this low quality notes.
The broom can help students differentiate the garbage which could help the investigation.
The broom can be acquired from the locker room. Go take it and I'll explain to you what to do next.
Oh! Its great that you are here! I am looking for someone who is willing to clean the dormitory.
Wow! You collected a lot! These would be enough. Thank you very much. Please come back again to help if you have the time to spare.
Is this cassette? Could this contain the records of Leonair Campus? Did you read the contents? Have you made a request to the Specialist from the Financial Group?
The Computer malfunction has caused tremendous problems around here. Are you suggesting that we get help from the Police Station? That is weird. The Policemen should assist the Financial Group.
Yeah! This is a matter that demands a large amount of time.
I am sure that there are some people who will initiate the start of chaos. No matter you like or not, you have to do it.
Under this tremendous situation, the Gang should practice unity and do their best in serving its purpose.
This situation was predicted a long time ago. Sadly, it happened earlier than expected. We must act swiftly to discover all the details so that we can solve this as soon as possible.

Not so long ago, the students had a big fight. Since then, these abnormal things started to happen. Maybe we can figure something out from there. There have been also malicious rumors that some students are joining the Green's Territory. Who could've spread these hearsays around? Could it be the group of people from the Sacred Gate Park?
The weird event that started in the Leonair Campus has made the abnormal situation to spread.

Perhaps solving the mystery inside the Leonair Campus would help make the situation better. The students and teachers have become our enemies. This just makes the situation hard to overcome. We should be prepared in case the situation becomes worse.
This situation never happened before. Procedures have become complicated while the Computer Room is not functioning properly.
If these matters are not resolved, the students might be in danger. Oops, I talked too much!
I will help you process the application forms. Take the Original copy away. Go to the Society Room and hand-in your Exit Approval to the teacher. After filling it up bring it over here.

I'm not questioning the capability of the student. It’s just that they are not human anymore. I have no idea what’s wrong. A lot of students are coming to the First-Aid Room and it seems that there are no perfect solution to this problem. You must understand this.

Please follow the procedures needed to process the application form. These are rules. These are not made for fun. Do you understand what I mean?
Erm?The Exit Approval ends here. I have said this a lot of times. It is up to you whether you want to listen to it again or not.
I won't repeat the lesson regarding the different locations in the map. I will not repeat the lesson regarding how to fight those monsters out there.
I won't repeat these statements to other students either. Now, what would it be? All I ask is for you students to be careful and not to die. That's all I can tell you.
Our world is not maintaining its original state. It’s like some students who have developed some special and uncanny capabilities.
Most of them do not even know how to use these powers effectively. It’s hard to stay safe right now.

Our college has a special Force Fields everywhere. Sad to say that at a certain level, these Force Fields would be affected by the unusual phenomena. There are also the strong mobs outside the campus that causes destruction and chaos. However, I believe that you can defeat them if you are able to activate and learn the effects of the Force Fields.
I know that there are some foolish people in front of the Headquarters just by looking at them. Nevertheless, I feel comfortable because of the exam that each Student must go through.
There are a group of Mobs called the Little Hooligan walking around. Please go and get two (2) Cigarette Butts from them. If you do this, I will reward you with both experience and skill points.
You've completed the Force Field Activation? That was fast! I bet you've strong!
The School Principal used a weird material to create the Force Field. I really don't believe it but it really has amazing effects!
I already mentioned this to you many times before. The situation outside is unexplainable. It is something I never imagined.

Some students who reached the Main Gate and attempted to pass through were rushed to the first-aid room. How come they were not able to pass through? There is a test procedure prepared before passing through the Main Gates.
Once the Terminal located near the Main Gate started the test procedure, you are required to finish the test within a specific amount of time.
No matter how bad it may seem, we can’t just ignore this. Does it make you nervous? Imagine if the other students get to know this. Be tough!
In order to acquire knowledge on the Suggestion Book, students need to bring the paper notes to the Student Director located at Mystic Peak.
The paper notes are not normal money. Be careful not to misplace it!
Ermmm?So, the people of Mystic Peak have the same thoughts too? This is an experimental product of the Counterfeited Anxiety Money.
It looks the same as the normal notes; but its kind of weird. Just take a look at the copper coins.
Ah! No! Its not necessary to read the contents right now. Just hand-in that documents to the Lecturer. Please go and find the mail sent by the Sacred Financial Group.
Listen to me students. Since the computers in our college are unable to operate properly, it would be difficult to get authentications by just merely showing the documents around.
The documents should match the data in the system. Let's skip the documentation of the emergency procedures. I will just inform you any developments.
For the meantime, may I request you to go to Mystic Peak's Student Director and procure the Computer room Backup disk?
We need this urgently so that we can recover information from the primary facilities.
Considering your current level right now, it is not necessary to read the rest of the document. Just bring the suggestion book over.

The success in combating this phenomenon cannot be achieved by just leveling or curing illnesses. There is a broader perspective in determining the cause of all of this.
The cost of experimentation to achieve this is high. When I have the time, I'll try to gather everyone to discuss this matter.
Until now, the students might not have the brooms prepared. I need to explain one thing first. Hmm...
The peculiar phenomenon that happened a long time ago caused the endangerment of the people's mental and physical well-being.
Most of the students and teachers who attempted to stop that abnormality are left inside the campus dormitory. This event accumulated a lot of garbage around.
It looks like the garbage maybe related to the negative effects of the strange phenomenon.
Please investigate the garbage. You might be able to find a way to stop this abnormal situation from spreading.
It looks like you already acquired the broom. Please go and collect the garbage and bring it here.
Please clean the Dormitory and gather as much garbage as you can.
Have you already made the request to the Specialist from the Sacred Financial Group? Ok…Please bring the cassette over here.

In order to start a Gang you need at least five (5) members who do not belong to any gang. The Gang Leader applicant should possess a character level of 30 and pay a processing fee of 1,000,000 Gold Coins. Gang Upgrade Charges: [Level D]: 2,000,000 Gold Coins [Level C]: 3,500,000 Gold Coins [Level B]: 5,000,000 Gold Coins [Level A]: 7,000,000 Gold Coins

If you decided to dissolve the Gang or terminate the Gang, the experience will be lost. If either you quit a gang or if you are kicked from a gang, you are temporarily not allowed to join another gang. Please remember this important note.
Hump...... situation there our of my expectation~ Please go that place to check.
Totally no information. Why don't check whole city? Wei, this document get from Trading Whole Police. You can try to advice him.
Until now? Noting can do now, you can go and study the landform to differential it between Middle Hole and Root Hole.
Financial Group's Director Lee Shi Zhang is one of the most sought after FengShui master. After he experienced 18 years ago's meteor shower. He can foresee future..........
The security forces stationed on Sacred Financial Group will be tight and numerous. However, these new recruits won't pose any threats.. Please take high precautions.

We lives in world that is surrounded by numerous planar worlds and parallel dimensions. There are theories of the merging of our world with the other planar worlds and parallel universe, where the residents in the those planar worlds and parallel world co exist with us. However, our human eyes are unable to detect the physical differences after the merger, not even if there is a planar being standing beside us. Should these theories held some truth, are we not able to enter the other planar worlds and parallel dimensions? These theories have not yet been proven though.

It will be impossible to fathom the originality of the lifeforms of the other planar worlds and parallel dimensions... If we are to infused the current cells and DNAs of the lifeforms in this world with the lifeforms of the planar worlds and parallel dimensions, wouldn't this process generates new lifeforms?? As for you wondering new comers, are you guys able to comprehend the complexity of this processes?
Root Hole? Heard there is building belong to Sacred Financial Group? I been there last few years....
en,,,en... haha....those fella only can praise student..
Go Trading Hole and talk to AngBeeLan. You may know more detail.
It is like the attendance list of students.. Maybe it is more like the student record list. Anyway it is nothing wrong with that list. Then why are you so curious about it?
Ask about the background of those students
How did you enter this school? It is just same as you. Don't waste of you effort on list.
Please send this document to Police man.
Holding a broom means that you're sweeping right? If you’re not, then please put away the broom before coming into the my office.

Student! It looks like you still haven't registered as a College Student yet! Even though the situation outside is a complete disorder, I will never let a new student skip the registration process. You need to register first so we can assess that you are qualified to be a student of this college. Please accomplish the Registration process as soon as possible.

Not so long ago, the students had a big fight. Since then, these abnormal things started to happen. Maybe we can figure something out from there. There have been also malicious rumors that some students are joining the Green's Territory. Who could've spread these hearsays around? Could it be the group of people from the Sacred Gate Park?
Perhaps solving the mystery inside the Leonair Campus would help make the situation better.
The students and teachers have become our enemies. This just makes the situation hard to overcome. We should be prepared in case the situation becomes worse.
This situation never happened before. Procedures have become complicated while the Computer Room is not functioning properly.
If these matters are not resolved, the students might be in danger. Oops, I talked too much!
I will help you process the application forms. Take the Original copy away. Go to the Society Room and hand-in your Exit Approval to the teacher. After filling it up bring it over here.

I'm not questioning the capability of the student. It’s just that they are not human anymore. I have no idea what’s wrong. A lot of students are coming to the First-Aid Room and it seems that there are no perfect solution to this problem. You must understand this.

Erm?The Exit Approval ends here. I have said this a lot of times. It is up to you whether you want to listen to it again or not.

I won't repeat the lesson regarding the different locations in the map. I will not repeat the lesson regarding how to fight those monsters out there. I won't repeat these statements to other students either.
Now, what would it be? All I ask is for you students to be careful and not to die. That's all I can tell you.
Our world is not maintaining its original state. It’s like some students who have developed some special and uncanny capabilities.
Most of them do not even know how to use these powers effectively. It’s hard to stay safe right now.

Our college has a special Force Fields everywhere. Sad to say that at a certain level, these Force Fields would be affected by the unusual phenomena. There are also the strong mobs outside the campus that causes destruction and chaos. However, I believe that you can defeat them if you are able to activate and learn the effects of the Force Fields.
I know that there are some foolish people in front of the Headquarters just by looking at them. Nevertheless, I feel comfortable because of the exam that each Student must go through.
There are a group of Mobs called the Little Hooligan walking around. Please go and get two (2) Cigarette Butts from them. If you do this, I will reward you with both experience and skill points.
You've completed the Force Field Activation? That was fast! I bet you've strong!
The School Principal used a weird material to create the Force Field. I really don't believe it but it really has amazing effects!
I already mentioned this to you many times before. The situation outside is unexplainable. It is something I never imagined.
Some students who reached the Main Gate and attempted to pass through were rushed to the first-aid room. How come they were not able to pass through?

There is a test procedure prepared before passing through the Main Gates. Once the Terminal located near the Main Gate started the test procedure, you are required to finish the test within a specific amount of time.
No matter how bad it may seem, we can’t just ignore this. Does it make you nervous? Imagine if the other students get to know this. Be tough!
In order to acquire knowledge on the Suggestion Book, students need to bring the paper notes to the Student Director located at Mystic Peak.
The paper notes are not normal money. Be careful not to misplace it!
Ermmm?So, the people of Mystic Peak have the same thoughts too? This is an experimental product of the Counterfeited Anxiety Money.
It looks the same as the normal notes; but its kind of weird. Just take a look at the copper coins.
Ah! No! Its not necessary to read the contents right now. Just hand-in that documents to the Lecturer. Please go and find the mail sent by the Sacred Financial Group.
Listen to me students. Since the computers in our college are unable to operate properly, it would be difficult to get authentications by just merely showing the documents around.
The documents should match the data in the system. Let's skip the documentation of the emergency procedures. I will just inform you any developments.

For the meantime, may I request you to go to Mystic Peak's Student Director and procure the Computer room Backup disk? We need this urgently so that we can recover information from the primary facilities.
Considering your current level right now, it is not necessary to read the rest of the document. Just bring the suggestion book over.

The success in combating this phenomenon cannot be achieved by just leveling or curing illnesses. There is a broader perspective in determining the cause of all of this. The cost of experimentation to achieve this is high. When I have the time, I'll try to gather everyone to discuss this matter.
Until now, the students might not have the brooms prepared. I need to explain one thing first. Hmm...
The peculiar phenomenon that happened a long time ago caused the endangerment of the people's mental and physical well-being.
Most of the students and teachers who attempted to stop that abnormality are left inside the campus dormitory. This event accumulated a lot of garbage around.
It looks like the garbage maybe related to the negative effects of the strange phenomenon.
Please investigate the garbage. You might be able to find a way to stop this abnormal situation from spreading.

In order to start a Gang you need at least five (5) members who do not belong to any gang. The Gang Leader applicant should possess a character level of 30 and pay a processing fee of 1,000,000 Gold Coins. Gang Upgrade Charges: [Level D]: 2,000,000 Gold Coins [Level C]: 3,500,000 Gold Coins [Level B]: 5,000,000 Gold Coins [Level A]: 7,000,000 Gold Coins

If you decided to dissolve the Gang or terminate the Gang, the experience will be lost. If either you quit a gang or if you are kicked from a gang, you are temporarily not allowed to join another gang. Please remember this important note.
Hump...... situation there our of my expectation~ Please go that place to check.
Wei, this document get from Trading Whole Police. You can try to advice him. Until now? Noting can do now, you can go and study the landform to differential it between Middle Hole and Root Hole.
Financial Group's Director Lee Shi Zhang is one of the most sought after FengShui master. After he experienced 18 years ago's meteor shower. He can foresee future..........
The security forces stationed on Sacred Financial Group will be tight and numerous. However, these new recruits won't pose any threats.. Please take high precautions.

We lives in world that is surrounded by numerous planar worlds and parallel dimensions. There are theories of the merging of our world with the other planar worlds and parallel universe, where the residents in the those planar worlds and parallel world co exist with us. However, our human eyes are unable to detect the physical differences after the merger, not even if there is a planar being standing beside us. Should these theories held some truth, are we not able to enter the other planar worlds and parallel dimensions? These theories have not yet been proven though.

It will be impossible to fathom the originality of the lifeforms of the other planar worlds and parallel dimensions... If we are to infused the current cells and DNAs of the lifeforms in this world with the lifeforms of the planar worlds and parallel dimensions, wouldn't this process generates new lifeforms?? As for you wondering new comers, are you guys able to comprehend the complexity of this processes?

en,,,en... haha....those fella only can praise student..

Students! Where are my precious students. The situation in this area is a complete chaos!!!
Dear Student, please be careful while roving around the corridors. Be safe! Evil Spirits are all around!

Ah! I need all necessary data information stored and encrypted in the Cassette! There are also documents like diaries that would help me understand how the chaos began! This video Cassette is locked! Where is the key? I believe it is in the 3rd Classroom of the Second Year Corridors. Please be discreet while traversing the eerie hallways!

This is the key! Why is it distorted? We need to fix it first. Someone in the 7th Class of the Second Year Batch can have this key fixed. Student! Please visit him and have this key fixed! Don't run around in the corridors! Take Care!
Oh! Here is the Cassette! Please use it properly and take good care of it. This is a very important aspect of our investigation. This can help us unlock the mystery behind the Chaos.
Crystal! Hmm... What happened here? This is not right! Why did the Administration Office became like this? Where are those teachers? Everyone disappeared after the chaotic incident!
It's real! The entire city was affected by the abnormal phenomenon. I hope this situation can be solved.
Student should have learned from class that the start of the chaos started something about 18 years ago. It started when the eclipse and meteor shower happened in Northern Asia.
Once you collected all the necessary records, compile it and give it to him! Please be courteous!
Aha! I remeber the special number code. I wrote it in the memo. Just bring it over so we can decipher the code.

Everything started during that time. The Sacred Financial Group set up all 4 Colleges which are protected with Force field Mechanisms. This is their way to protect the people; especially the Students!

That is the starting point of everything that is unexplainable. Theres is nothing to hide now. All the people already know the source of the chaos. I hope everyone can help lessen the disorder especially in the streets. Here is another information... The meteor shower is a sign of communication between the outer world and the world we are living in right now. It is one of the greatest mystery bothering my thoughts.
This just proves that there is another world or dimension out there! In fact, I believe that we are controlled by a machine. I just hope that this is not true!

I have a lot of beliefs and theories in stored for you; but, there is no time to spare! the only sure thing I can tell you is that there is still a way to stop the spread of chaos. Student! Please keep your hopes up! Vigilance is a virtue!

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character..
Increasing Dexterity will allow your character to be a Chemical Expert to deal sustained damage to the enemy as well as debuff.
Increasing Spirit will allow your character to be a Physics Expert to summon beings that deal great physical attack to enemies.
Increasing Strength will allow your character to be a Bio Expert to limit your enemies' actions and increase your abilities.

C’mon! If you keep up with such indifferent attitude when facing your teacher, your teacher will get very downhearted! Oh no! Now where has the teacher gone??

Ok! Let me see... How shall I say this?

Ah, I've heard the Construction Supervisor mentioning about this before. I really appreciate that you accepted my request. Due to the strange situation in many areas it would be wise to accept all the help that you will receive from them. Keep up the good work.

It's good that you want to take the examination In any case Students or Teachers will have their abilities examined on a regular basis, I hope you don't mind this too much. The capability of our enemies are improving. Their skills are becoming more powerful and their numbers are gradually increasing, if unchecked will be facing formidable foes. We need not relax and think that we are better than them.

Very good! You've done well! In your level, you have become a stronger person allowing you to easily overcome the dangers that lie ahead. Despite your achievement you still need to take regular ability examinations to keep you in shape.
The Cleaner gave me these things before he left. Yes! Actually it doesn't look any different from regular money, but if you look very carefully these are counterfeit materials.
It looks like these Currency Notes contain something important and it would be to wise pick-up items that people drop on the streets.
Ask about the location of the Leonair Campus
I am pretty sure that it was located near the Trading Hole Passage, but one day it suddenly disappeared.
It's perfect! Pieces of the map still exist and even the teachers are not aware of this fact

Hmm... I will need someone to do something for me. In order to ensure the basic safety of the students as well as the citizens, I will continue to do my part to help clear up the situation. Unfortunately the mob pestering this area multiplied dramatically.
Well done! The Sacred Financial Group will always appreciate your help in transporting reinforcements and supplies.

The situation has worsen prompting the Sacred Financial Group to send people that will monitor the events. Don't worry the Teacher is just talking to herself. Sorry to have bothered you. Anyway, I'm so sorry if I bothered you.
I don't have the time to explain these things to you. I'll just sum it up in one sentence.
There aren't any normal people around this area. Please be careful in approaching strangers.
Actually, the counterfeit was skillfully crafted that it can pass like the regular money. Moreso, the currency contains weird characters similar to ancient writing.
No matter what, these currency notes seem to contain some hidden meanings. Please take these currency notes for verification.
You need to take these to the Technical Teacher.
Moreover, the place is now filled with weird mobs that appeared shortly when the abnormal phenomenon began.
The big problem right now is to confirm the exact location of Leonair Campus.

We have received contrasting information regarding its location. Some say its situated at the South of Sacred Gate Park, while others point to the north. It's really confusing and the only way to pin-point its exact location is to go there ourselves. Good thing the student named Cheng Xi Zhi of the Archery Section was able to verify the location of Leonair Campus and was able to draw a map to show it.
Unfortunately, the map was stolen and torn to pieces by unknown people.
The identity of the strange people is not that important. What we need to do right now is to search and gather the scattered pieces of the map.
I've heard that when the map was torn into pieces, there were clowns around the area. With this important clue, do you think we'd be able to find them?
We only have less than 7 pieces of the map that are in bad condition.

I have to try and put these pieces together even if looks impossible. The written words are too sloppy, the drawing is also irregular in nature, the paper has been severed, and the boundaries of the pieces of paper just don't connect properly.
The Student Director has had the experience on working with archeological evidences before; maybe he has the skill to put these papers together.
Recently, the number of scums causing a ruckus around here has increased tremendously.

The lack of manpower should not stop us from preventing these evil to spread. If we do that the consequences will be unimaginable. It would be advisable to address problem now before gets out of control.
Your mission is to slay the monster called Ice Master. I won't give you a time limit as past mission, so give it a shot.
You bit the Ice Master?, the Bloody cold bastard... Anyway you pass the mission..
Are you going to º»µ¿ It is strange that time has stopped. I though the °ø°£Ãà might be chaged... I knew that Saint building is located in º»µ¿ Hopely you can have a look inside the º»µ¿.
Oh dear..It's already too late.. So stupid that I lost that..

ill luck packages have been stolen by Alienated zina which I've collected for a year..I have no idea what she will do with it.. thoroughly understand her.. She eagerly hoped to be in the 12 Earth's Branches..she would have a grudge..but already the matter has decided.. My goodness.. I have no time ! Will you find that packages for me?

you really have gathered these so many? So thank you.. It's still many packages out there, but I am happy..
I should repay your kindness.. Here.. Choose one you like

Thanks~ The one who processed my document said that the document is disappeared. And then he is also disappeared... I couldn't do anything because he didn't tell me where he lost. Until now, I couldn't enroll.. Anyway Thank you!
It's OK.. I just got some hits... They are nothing.. I just wasn't able to counter the attacks. Probably I need more practice to catch up the classmate.
Oh! Thanks, It will be useful~ I think I could defense myself with this. Watch me, I will catch up their skills as soon as possible.

Why.. Why can't we bring the car in school? I have the driver license and the car which i brought by myself. The reason I was late for enrollment is the car. I had to look for parking lot outside campus. Aw...
One told me that he find document for me. So, I'm waiting him, now. But, he still doesn't come here. Could you help me for find document?
They hate me by I'm late. So, I need to study more than they. Could you find me for learn quickly ?
Thank you. If they come back here, they will find me. So, I'll wait them untill they back here.
I'll study here by myself. Thank you
Students who do not belong to the Shaman Section, please step out.
Announce the situation for new student
Announce the situation for new student
Normal students are not capable of handling the activities of the Shaman Training Section. Normally, educational institutions would not approve the establishment of such organization.
Focusing your Stat points to Intelligence makes your character built for Support.
Ah! Don't worry. You are not suited for killing people.
Your character build is not suited for battle.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills. Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.
The Main Gate of the campus building is straight ahead. The Welfare Society and the Lockers are over there. You should go and check them out.
I’ve found out that the quests before are not that difficult. But now... it’s too hard for me to accomplish them.
Hmmm?The registration process is almost done. The next procedure is to request for an Exit Approval. There is something that you need to do before submitting your registration form.

Look for the Student Director so he can assist you in your registration. You can also get treatment if you go to the First-Aid Room. So, you might wanna go there and heal if you’re injured.
We are taking actions in the investigation of the case. Just remember that the evil force cannot control everyone.
Now, there are hardly a few decent human beings around. Most of them are transformed into evil monsters. But this situation can be solved. Please remember this.
The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be.

It is an essential factor to learn to contemplate in peace. This is how your power strengthens. However, considering the current situation, there is no time to think about this method.

When facing your enemies you should also posses skills used to induct direct damages to your targets. Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.

If you have your Stat Points primarily distributed to Strength, and secondarily with Dexterity, your character builds into a Spear Type. This allows your character to exhibit strong close-ranged abilities.

You can also allocate Stat Points equally to Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence. This will allow you to exhibit an Attack Type character. Focusing your Stat Points on Intelligence will make your character built for the Supportive Type.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
Use Dexterity as the primary attribute and the remaining points to Strength. This will allow your character to attack faster using fists.
In contrary, using Strength as the primary and Dexterity as the secondary target for Stat points will allow your character to perform strong attacks using the leg.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Most skills will require you to consume skill points in order to learn them.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

Hmm... Welcome to the Sacred Gate Ring! How can I help you?

You should know the answers to your questions. It's not your first time to be here. The point of reference would be the Sacred Gate Park, to its right is the Phoenix Campus, to the left is Mystic Peak Campus and to the south is Sacred Gate Campus. Good, do you remember now?

Back then, this place was awesome for relaxation because it was filled with birds and children. There were clowns selling balloons and making people laugh. Now things have changed the once blissful atmosphere have been covered by a murderous mist.

Ok, what do you want to know?

Ah, I've heard the Construction Supervisor mentioning about this before. I really appreciate it that you accepted my request. Due to the strange situation in many areas it would be wise to accept all the help that you will receive from them. Keep up the good work.
It's good that you want to take the examination.

Very good you've done well! In your level, you have become a stronger person allowing you to easily overcome the dangers that lie ahead. Despite your achievement you still need to take regular ability examinations to keep you in shape.
The cleaner just left after dumping this to me not too long ago.
Looks like these Currency Notes contain something important and it would be to wise pick-up items that people drop on the streets.
Ask about the location of the Leonair Campus
I am pretty sure that it was located near the Trading Hole Passage, but one day it suddenly disappeared.
It's perfect! Pieces of the map still exist and even the teachers are not aware of this fact.

Hmm... I will need someone to do something for me. In order to ensure the basic safety of the students as well as the citizens, I will continue to do my part to help clear up the situation. Unfortunately the mob pestering this area multiplied dramatically. However, recently the number of mob causing a ruckus around here has increased tremendously.
Well done! The Sacred Financial Group will always appreciate your help in transporting reinforcements and supplies.
The situation has worsen prompting the Sacred Financial Group to send people that will monitor the events.
We can't just relax by allowing this fellas to multiply and continue menacing this areas.
The Student Director has told about these things before as one of the things in this world that we cannot change.
In any case everyone will have their abilities tested on a regular basis.

The capability of our enemies are improving. Their skills are becoming more powerful and their numbers are gradually increasing, if unchecked will be facing formidable foes. We need not relax and think that we are better than them.
Actually, the counterfeit was skillfully crafted that it can pass like the regular money.
More so, the currency contains weird characters similar to ancient writing that contains hidden meanings. Please take these currency for notes verification.
You need to take these to the Technical Teacher.
Moreover, the place is now filled with weird mobs that appeared shortly when the abnormal phenomenon began.

The big problem right now is to confirm the location of Leonair Campus. We have received contrasting information regarding its location. Some say its situated at the South of Sacred Gate Park, while others point to the north. It's really confusing and the only way to pin-point its exact location is to go there ourselves.

Good thing the student named Cheng Xi Zhi of the Archery Section was able to verify the location of Leonair Campus and even was able to draw a map to show it. Unfortunately, the map was stolen and torn to pieces by unknown people.
The identity of the strange people is not that important. What we need to do right now is to search and gather the scattered pieces of the map.
I've heard that when the map was torn into pieces, there were clowns around the area. Hmm... With this important clue, do you think we'd be able to find them?
We only have less than 7 pieces of the map that are in bad condition.

I have to try and put these pieces together even if looks impossible. The written words are too sloppy, the drawing is also irregular in nature, the paper has been severed, and the boundaries of the pieces of paper just don't connect properly.
The Student Director has had the experience on working with archeological evidences before; maybe he has the skill to put these papers together.

The lack of manpower should not stop us from preventing these evil to spread. If we do that the consequences will be unimaginable. It would be advisable to address problem now before gets out of control.
Don't worry the Teacher is just talking to herself. Sorry to have bothered you.
Does the Financial Group have any intentions to help at all?
I am really sorry, but you need to be constantly educated so as not to commit the same mistakes when facing similar problems.
I know your really disappointed because the Teachers don't know much.

I know that there are a lot of different and contrasting perceptions on this problem that are not necessarily true. How can I put this... It is like when someone says that one plus one doesn't equal to two. Wouldn't that statement be incomprehensible?
Your mission is to slay the monster called Ice Master. I won't give you a time limit as past mission, so give it a shot.
You bit the Ice Master?, the Bloody cold bastard... Anyway you pass the mission..
Are you going to º»µ¿ It is strange that time has stopped. I though the °ø°£Ãà might be chaged... I knew that Saint building is located in º»µ¿ Hopely you can have a look inside the º»µ¿.

Community service of Sacred financial group? Of course we all know because all the campuses are the part of Sacred financial group. I just realize that there is no contents regarding this company. Oh well.. You might think I am not responsible person but I am not really interested in background of this company.. . I'm sorry. I don't know the details.

The dispatched agent who is investigating the phenomenon at Leonine school is having a hard time because of the Saint Private Guards(= Sacred Gate Defender). Please defeat them to help Dispatched Agent with his investigation.
