You seem like a freshman, what class are you in? I'll give you a weapon for your class. Tell me the class you are in. This weapon is also available for Extreme class. But make sure that it is given to only new students who reach level 10. Come to me every time you reach the level of 30, 50 and 70. I'll exchange your armor to the better one then.
If you are a Swordman, press here.
If you are a Brawler, press here.
If you are a Archer, press here.
If you are a Shaman, press here.
If you are a Gunner, press here.
Do you want a weapon for freshmans?
Greet politely as a new member of Assassin.
If you are a freshman and level 30, I can give you a weapon suitable for you.
I want one for Swordman class
I want one for Brawler class
I want one for Archer class
I want one for Shaman class
I want one for Gunner class
Ask for proper weapon of Assassin
Sword is a study of high standard to improve yourself physically and mentally. Which type of weapon do you want to train with?

Seems like It is time to replace your weapon. When you reach the level 30, 50 and 70, you can come to me to exchage your armor. Keep in mind it is impossible to exchange weapons when you are eqiupped with the weapon to replace.
The basic thing for Brawler is well trained to be a master. Which type of weapon do you want? If you are Extreme class, using dexterity or power as the primary attribute is helpful to you.

Seems like It is time to replace your weapon. When you reach the level 30, 50 and 70, you can come to me to exchage your armor. Keep in mind it is impossible to exchange weapons when you are eqiupped with the weapon to replace.
The most important thing for Archer is focusing on the goal, not yourself. You need to learn how to hadle a practice bow with good skill at first.

Seems like It is time to replace your weapon. When you reach the level 30, 50 and 70, you can come to me to exchage your armor. Keep in mind it is impossible to exchange weapons when you are eqiupped with the weapon to replace.
The power of your skills lies on your understanding of the Universe's Spirit. Your specialty is not for direct fighting. You just start with a stick.

Seems like It is time to replace your weapon. When you reach the level 30, 50 and 70, you can come to me to exchage your armor. Keep in mind it is impossible to exchange weapons when you are eqiupped with the weapon to replace.
You can defeat enemies more quickly with a gun. Which type of gun do you need?

Seems like It is time to replace your weapon. When you reach the level 30, 50 and 70, you can come to me to exchage your armor. Keep in mind it is impossible to exchange weapons when you are eqiupped with the weapon to replace.
Are you a freshman? Once you reach level 10, I can give you a weapon you need then. But if not, you had better focus on your training.
You have not reached level 10 yet. It is not that difficult. Come back to me after you achieve level 10. Then I will give you a useful weapon for present.
The basic of Assassination is to defeat a target without knowing that he or she already defeated the target. Therefore, it all starts with how to be the expert of training level weapons.
I can see that you need new weapon now. When you have reached level 30, 50 or 70 come back to me for a weapon. Remember you cannot trade a weapon while you are equipping it.
This Terminal controls the Access Permission to the Laboratory.
The Terminal's Force Field function is operating properly.
The Force Field function of this Terminal has been Optimized! To complete the Force Field Optimization process, please proceed to the next Force Field Terminal to be optimized.
Inside the Laboratory is a part where Evil Spirits move around.
The required amount for purification has been achieved and authenticated. Thank you for your efforts.
To optimize the Force Field function of this Terminal, you must gather 10 Spiritual Spheres.
Those Mobs possessed by the Evil Spirits bring undesirable effect to the surroundings. Do your best to eliminate them.
The primary targets in this area are the Slashers. Do you best to eliminate 27 of them.
This Terminal controls the access to the Practice Center.
The Terminal's Force Field function is operating properly.
The Force Field Optimization for the current Terminal is completed! To complete the Force Field Optimization Process, please proceed to the next Force Field Terminal to be optimized.
Inside the Practice Center is a part where Evil Spirits move around.
The required amount needed for purification has been achieved and authenticated. Thank you very much!
To optimize the Force Field function of this Terminal, you are required to gather 10 Spiritual Spheres.
The Mobs possessed by the Evil Spirits bring undesirable effects to the surroundings. Do your best to eliminate them.
The primary targets in this area are the Elite Fencers. Please do you best to eliminate 26 Elite Fencer targets.
I'm not sure why the streets have become like this. I am so lucky I was able to find a safe place to hide. Sheesh! I really don't know what will happen to me if I am not careful.
Exchange a Green Pearl for a Red Pearl.
Exchange a Blue Pearl with a Green Pearl
You still have no idea after seeing it? Things became suddenly weird as I was cleaning the streets.
Ever since these events unfolded, we really do not have time to run away. No one is left to do the cleaning up to now.

Thank you very much! I am so sorry for bothering you. We really have to treasure these kind of resources. I will ask for your help in the future in case you have a spare time to assist me. I will exchange any precious item you collect for any of my available items.
Wow! This Blue Pearl is a very valuable item. Please choose any item here in exchange for this Blue Pearl.

If this mess and lack of resources continue, we'll have tremendous problems in the future. There are other matters you need not to worry about right now; you can just help me collect some Empty Bottles. Please utilize Medicine Items carefully.
Wow, this Red Pearl is special! Please choose any of my available items in exchange for this.
Everytime I try to clean up the trash just gets mixed up and disorganized. Please help me.
Pass Trails of person you are looking for
Pass Trails of person you are looking for
Pass Trails of person you are looking for
Pass Trails of person you are looking for
Pass Trails of person you are looking for
Ask about the status of Middle Hole

Ah, it's that stone! But hasn't it been identified yet? It's called .. USS¡K something¡K I heard that it's like some sort of secret code, but it's only hearsay Is this for me? Hmmph¡K even though from the way it looks it's not of much use... but I thank you anyway.
Why did the people come here in a helter-skelter manner? The shop's weapons are all forcefully taken away by these people! From what I know, those people are fake.

Furthermore the snow has increased, even earthquakes have happened, the city is filled with chaos! My shop collapsed at that time... Even though what I said was out of anger, I still have to find back my lost weapons. Please, even if it's just only some of them, can't they be recovered?
Honestly speaking, I don't expect them to be found , but we still have to try our best.
Wow, you really helped me find them ! Even though it's just some of them, I am still very grateful .. As long as we have this, it will be easier to rebuild our shop.. If we do this.. And do that¡K

There are some friends that I am waiting for, but I am afraid that they might have been victims of an earthquake Pardon me, but can you help me find them ? Though I have no idea whent they will come back, but I will still wait.. If the friend returns, we can hear more details about the stones. About last time at some Financial Group building..
Oh you are here! Hmmm what have you found¡K Ahhhh I think I have been overly optimistic At the city's current state, it's a mistake to hope for that friend to just mind his own business...
That is your friend's item isn't it. Even though it's said to be stolen everywhere, but it's still strange...
Then I have something to ask of you. I have no idea whether there are people who are injured or are in need of help like my friend. Can you help check the situation nearby?
Hmm, furthermore, even the Trading Hole Police Station is reporting about the current bad situation.. I am not even sure whether this thing is true or not.

Oh what's this? What..! Oh my god.. How did you get this? This is the weapon blue print that uses a human body. Permanent rechargeable bullet shell and self-recoverable armor.. Who the hell is thinking about this!?
The weird laboratory in underground prison.. And the blue print of Leonine campus! I heard some rumors regarding the laboratory. But.. Oh my.. is the company really doing this?
Thank you very much.. I will check it out. Anyway.. I cannot believe there is the book that helps us this wired situation. Is there greater fortune teller?
Oh no.. It is quite large. How did you bring all of this? You can leave them to us. We already heard about your story. We will bring them to police office.
I need some beads for create and fixing weapone. could you help me?
Wow, that's bead. right? Thank you. Next time, if you have free time, could you collect more beads for me? haha~
Are you blind? This is ia total mess!
Oh, you are not an Assassin, the friend of darkness seeking the light! I cannot help you!
Do your best until we can go back to our home!
Assassin is a club learning the skills to outreach the limit of human with the power of Solidified Stone and the ancient martial arts to win in a fight no matter!
There are tons to learn so don't rush it! Come back after you take care of the things in the campus.

The uniqueness and the advantage of Assassin is that we take out an opponent quick in no matter what kind of condition we are in. Therefore, it is essential that we reduce the unnecessary movement using skills. Remember, Assassin has be quick and precise in any given condition!
Starting from '0', you will receive '1' skill point at each level up.
How much do I know about the school?
Oh! Wait! I must take care of something really quick...
Paper work is too complicated! The registration is complete and I must process the Exit Approval Form...
Oh! You have a Spiritual Sphere. Exchange it with desired Skill Scroll.

'3' points are given at each level up. Depending on how you distribute them will decide your expertise.
If you distribute into DEX then you will be the fast blade master using Dual Spear.
If you distribute into POW then you will be the powerful and unstoppable Scythe master dealing great damages.
If you distribute into INT then you will be the master of giant Shuriken using magic and toxic bombs.
Why are you not registered.. You have not been getting ready as I have told you that is why... You will find something suitable at the DB room Terminal, go get it!
We have just been created and it is hard to take care everything. The chaos in and outside of school and the pile of works... Gee... I have no time to rest...

The creatures that wander around in and outside of school used to be the innocent teachers and citizens. Well, there has been people who weren't innocent too but anyways... The point is that they have been mutated and turned into freaks so do not pity them! Survivor is our top priority until we can go back to our homes.
If it hadn't been the sudden phenomenon, I would not have become the instructor. However, since I have decided to do this, I am here to support you so don't hesitate to come to talk to me.

The phenomenon has much more effect out the school. All the people outside right now reports that they should never let their guard down for a second. Once you are out there, don't lose your tension. Remember, survivor is our top priority.
Once you submit the Exit Approval Form, you are swearing to take full responsibility of all that so be strong!
This is just a portion about Saint List. You will be surprised when you get closer to the truth. The current moment is important but I hope you could think deeper as you get closer to the truth.
I know you must be confused! Go to Trading Hole and meet Zia. She will give you extra information on Saint List.

Welcome to the Trading Hole Area! I am the Brawler Section Agent. How can I help you? Please feel free to look around if you like.
I am sorry the Manager is not here right now. Please come back again later.

Oh! So, you would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile to do than to teach you students! Since the manager around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.

You would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile for me to do than to teach you students! Since the manager is not yet around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
If you don't know the importance physical strength, it will be very difficult for you to understand the future lessons. By the way, I need to ask you to do something.

Did you see the Police Station nearby? There is a police officer waiting for you at the Main Door. Just approach him and tell him that I instructed you to look for him. I believe he has something in store for you.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK, you may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK! You may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
Oh! You found it! It has been 18 years since I last saw this device by specialist named Liu Cheng You. Thank you very much!

Student! Please remember that consistent training will be part of your quest for victory. There will be times of disappointments ahead but you need not be sad and preoccupied. Just focus on your training and you will develop to be a more powerful individual.
Broaden your horizons! It is great to have a wider perspective of life! Imagine this is part of the lesson! Someday, it would benefit you and the people around you.

Oh. Ok. Even if he is not here, I could give you some information. After the meteor falls 18 years ago, the chairman realize the danger in Real World. And he expected that there will be some effects from Another World that has been destroyed by some invaders.

The meteor fall was actually the living particles of Another World, which can transmit the power to another body. And the List of Saint is the list of people who affected by that particle, And they were able to survive during that incident because of the transmitted power.

So SFG people thought that the way to prevent the disaster from this incident is to gather the people who has the transmitted power. If not, the real world will be destroyed.... That's why they should enforce them to join this campus whether the methods they used are right or wrong. That's what happened.

Do you know there is the private prison of Saint Financial Group? There are special minerals that come from only the mine near that prison. It used to be a working area for prisoners. The well-refined and mixture of that mineral can enhance the steel... especially weapons and armor with special power... But the success rate is too low and it requires the large amount of oil. Are you still willing to try it?

The easiest way to get oil is from the tuna near this area. You could easily find the tuna boat workers in wharf. But kindly check the quality of oil. Some tuna oil are useless. Please get 10 bottles of oil.
Well done. I will put that oil on this machine. But I am not sure it will create something that helps you. Anyway good luck.

Oh.. You received the information that I requested, don't you? I was so worried about my boss because I couldn't contact him a long time and couldn't gather the information around here. I'm so appreciated that you were able to deliver this information. Now I can breathed a sigh of relief a bit. Thanks you very much.

Wait.. I just remember something. A few days ago, I got another time capsule delivery from another student.. Contents are.. the pictures that the gangsters were trading something without the doubt. But the weird thing is there were the SFG Flag in the ship which might contains the gangster's trade goods. I don't know whether it is for on purposes or not. I hope this information would be worthy for the reward of your delivery.

Excuse me. I don't know all information for this state, because I instead my teacher still stay here. But, I have some story to you. Before, some people have festival for keep thiers time. After this festival, appear some problem.....

What had happened? I cannot remember anything. I think I have lost consciousness by a strong power, unknown¡¦ I keep seeing a vision of weird looking monster.. I am not sure what happened but since you have saved my life, let me show you some rare object. These are bit expensive but they are really hard to find.
Anyways, thank you very much! We will meet again, if we are meant to be!
Welcome to the Trading Hole Area! I am the Sword Section Agent. How can I help you? Please feel free to look around if you like.
I am sorry the Manager is not here right now. Please come back again later.

Oh! So, you would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile to do than to teach you students! Since the manager around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.

You would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile for me to do than to teach you students! Since the manager is not yet around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
If you don't know the importance physical strength, it will be very difficult for you to understand the future lessons. By the way, I need to ask you to do something.

Did you see the Police Station nearby? There is a police officer waiting for you at the Main Door. Just approach him and tell him that I instructed you to look for him. I believe he has something in store for you.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK, you may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK! You may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
Oh! You found it! It has been 18 years since I last saw this device by specialist named Liu Cheng You. Thank you very much!

Student! Please remember that consistent training will be part of your quest for victory. There will be times of disappointments ahead but you need not be sad and preoccupied. Just focus on your training and you will develop to be a more powerful individual.
Broaden your horizons! It is great to have a wider perspective of life! Imagine this is part of the lesson! Someday, it would benefit you and the people around you.

Oh. Ok. Even if he is not here, I could give you some information. After the meteor falls 18 years ago, the chairman realize the danger in Real World. And he expected that there will be some effects from Another World that has been destroyed by some invaders.

The meteor fall was actually the living particles of Another World, which can transmit the power to another body. And the List of Saint is the list of people who affected by that particle, And they were able to survive during that incident because of the transmitted power.

So SFG people thought that the way to prevent the disaster from this incident is to gather the people who has the transmitted power. If not, the real world will be destroyed.... That's why they should enforce them to join this campus whether the methods they used are right or wrong. That's what happened.

Do you know there is the private prison of Saint Financial Group? There are special minerals that come from only the mine near that prison. It used to be a working area for prisoners. The well-refined and mixture of that mineral can enhance the steel... especially weapons and armor with special power... But the success rate is too low and it requires the large amount of oil. Are you still willing to try it?

The easiest way to get oil is from the tuna near this area. You could easily find the tuna boat workers in wharf. But kindly check the quality of oil. Some tuna oil are useless. Please get 10 bottles of oil.
Well done. I will put that oil on this machine. But I am not sure it will create something that helps you. Anyway good luck.

Oh.. You received the information that I requested, don't you? I was so worried about my boss because I couldn't contact him a long time and couldn't gather the information around here. I'm so appreciated that you were able to deliver this information. Now I can breathed a sigh of relief a bit. Thanks you very much.

Wait.. I just remember something. A few days ago, I got another time capsule delivery from another student.. Contents are.. the pictures that the gangsters were trading something without the doubt. But the weird thing is there were the SFG Flag in the ship which might contains the gangster's trade goods. I don't know whether it is for on purposes or not. I hope this information would be worthy for the reward of your delivery.

Confirm the goal of Extra Activity and carry it out by pressing 'Y' button then you will be able to earn Title which you can add to your name and the activity points. Carry out many Easy Activities and purchase a special item.

I used to be a gold digger before I came to this place. As I have worked many years, I figured out how to make the money. Many people would look whats in front of them to make money. No way! I do not know that person. I used to be the researcher who went back and forth from Control Tower to Evironment Control Tower. When such incident happened, I escaped from basement of complex just before they made me an experiement object.

We must go look for the people who can replace us. But before that we must stop the things that are coming out from Leonair Campus
Ermm.. I can't see ... Am I on this world? I feel I am in a different dimension!

The entrance to this building was set up with a Force Field function. In order to pass through this door, you must have an Authentication Booklet. I can make one for you if you like!
Now I remember! I need 8 pieces of Black Feathers from the Shadow Crows. Please acquire them for me. Thank you!
I need Eight pices of Enchanted Feathers This is needed to create the Authentication Scroll. Along with it, you can pass through these doors. Very Good! This would be enough!

There are two things that you can do if you have the strength. Either you attack your enemies or protect your friends.
You know which is correct without me telling right? Remember, hurting other people will only be forgiven if you do so to protect other persons.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.
If you distribute the points to Strength, Stamina and Dexterity, your character will grow into a Swordsman exhibiting very fast attacks.
If you concentrate on Strength. Your character will grow into a Swordsman inflicting high damages to targets.
Lastly, distributing the points evenly to Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence will allow you to become a Skill Type character.
Take note that the Sword Section consumes a relatively large amount of SP.
If your SP is consumed completely, your accuracy and attack rate will diminish. This will expose your character to a dangerous situation.
Therefore, be careful when you cast a skill.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

And about the student registration, you must go to the School Administration Office which is beside the Welfare Society and find the Student Director. You can also get treatment if you go to the First-Aid Room. So, you might wanna go there and heal if you’re injured.
Even though it's just my observation, but all the teachers and students from the school came out fine.

Please remember that the evil can’t control everyone! Now, there are hardly a few decent human beings around. Most of them are transformed into evil monsters. But this situation can be solved. The teachers are doing all that they can to return all things the way it should be. Please remember that.
There is something that you must do before submitting your registration form.
Just like what I said before, these aggressive mobs are causing destruction in our campus. Please go outside and prevent them from causing more destruction.

Whatever happens inside or outside of this building, carelessness will just completely change your destiny. After submitting the Exit Approval Form, you are entering a world of danger. Please remember this!

Oh you saw.. the list of saint.. It is true that there is nothing wrong with list. You might be curious about the behind.. Right? Why are there many students that have a problem in their family ? Actually it is simple. There is not many parents that send their children to experimental school. Even if the school offers extraordinary features, it doesn't matter for the parents who think the tradition importantly.

Many people raise this question.. Whether It is forgiveness work or not. Hm.. By the way I have no right to teach you then! I have to force you about what I don't know well. You know there are arena in trading hole. Look for the teachers there.

It used to be so easy to repair a car.....
Ah! there you are! What were you doing for the past few days? Me? I'm trying to fix this antique truck! Its really difficult! Can you help me?

I have to take a good look at the office first before i can decipher what's going on. Errr... I was halted to stop fixing this piece of wreck! Just now, there was a giant dog that took away my Key. I can't do anything now.
Help the Truck Driver recover the Key
Thank you very much! I am pretty confident that you can take good care of those nasty hounds. You look so strong! I believe tha you have the courage. Do you want to accept my request?

Oh! You really found it! It does not look the same anymore. Ah! Have you heard about the heroes? They are the students who possess exeptional capabilities. Yes! ?I just heard about the rumors that they are not normal studenst. Anyway, thank you very much!
My friends usually provide me with the Diesel supplies I need. Right now, I have no means to acquire Diesel for this truck. Student please help me acquire some Diesel supplies.
Please hurry! Its dangerous out there!
I think you can negotiate to acquire the diesel supplies that we need. Please be vigilant!
It's really impossible to get this truck to move. I've tried my best to get this thing to work! I feel hopeless now.... Could you help me?
These supplies can also be used on the ships. I think the neighborhood also keeps a supply of these diesel. The No.1 Wharf is a short walk from here.
Oh! You acuired the supplies faster than I expected! Thank you very much! Now, I can start to fix this wreck.
This area suddenly became like this. I heard that this village looks very peaceful before.
Anyway, people suddenly disappeared. The trucks and buses stopped moving too! Its like total chaos in here!
The fuel for this vehicle is already consumed. I think we can acquire some supplies nearby.
I heard there are some supplies at theTrading Hole. Please help me!
There are also some spare parts, gasoline, and oil for lubrication in that area. Please help bring me some of those supplies.

The Trading Hole has started to get messy. I heard that prisoners trying very hard to escape. There are also issues that the Management Office staffs are having a big fight along with the students and gangsters.
Please do go to the Freezing Warehouse just for investigation. We might find something necessary for our investigation.
There was an old man asking me to let students go to that area. The old man wearing white clothes looks very peculiar.
I lost my chocolate! Someone took my chocolate from me!!! ¡¦Ah, stupid.. It's my fault...What can I do now?
She said that she likes being with me! I feel like flying in the Sky!
Huh? Didn't you call my name?

Have you thought carefully? Are you ready to accept?
Hey. Have I not told you before? I told you that you will come back to me. Ah, it seems it is time for you to gain the new power.
Have you thought carefully? Are you ready to accept?
I've finally met you. We were likely to meet by chance but, really, I have been planning this for a very long time. Did you know that I've been waiting for a long time to pass to you a new power?
You and I are not yet meant to meet. Train harder and when you are powerful enough, come back to me.
Have you heard of the 7 who started it all? I heard there are 7 fixed stones. Even with uncertainty, the 7 stones must be destroyed to end the chaos.
You have the ability from rigorous training but is that enough to deal with the dark forces and stabilize the fixed stone to return the balance?
I will do it next time
I look at how accurate others are. Prepare yourself more and come back to me.
Ah, you seem stronger than before. I will always be prepared for this so, you have to come to me again.
Congratulations. You are now able to learn a new strength. Train hard and help me again. For now, it is the time to give you your reward.
Good luck to you. I miss the last days of peace. Please bring it back again.
It seems that I have overestimated you.
Wu¡K¡K my stomach is growling, I¡¦m so hungry. No more students¡K Suffering in hunger... How did it become like this?
Yes, I¡¦m talking about a key¡K. The key to which room or building? Classroom? Information Centre?
Food to eat! This is too unbelievably wonderful¡K Here, you can take this key away! You are a good student. I will give you better grades in your next paper. Hehehe¡K.
Oh.. it¡¦s the videotape¡K So¡Kwhat is it you wanted to give me? You give some and you take some, this way, the balance won¡¦t be lost.
But¡K Please bring me some things to eat, I see some people eating outside. Please bring some of those stuff in for me.

'3' points are given at each level up. Depending on how you distribute them will decide your expertise.
If you distribute into DEX then you will be the fast blade master using Dual Spear.
If you distribute into POW then you will be the powerful and unstoppable Scythe master dealing great damages.
If you distribute into INT then you will be the master of giant Shuriken using magic and toxic bombs.
Why are you not registered.. You have not been getting ready as I have told you that is why... You will find something suitable at the DB room Terminal, go get it!
We have just been created and it is hard to take care everything. The chaos in and outside of school and the pile of works... Gee... I have no time to rest...

The creatures that wander around in and outside of school used to be the innocent teachers and citizens. Well, there has been people who weren't innocent too but anyways... The point is that they have been mutated and turned into freaks so do not pity them! Survivor is our top priority until we can go back to our homes.
If it hadn't been the sudden phenomenon, I would not have become the instructor. However, since I have decided to do this, I am here to support you so don't hesitate to come to talk to me.

The phenomenon has much more effect out the school. All the people outside right now reports that they should never let their guard down for a second. Once you are out there, don't lose your tension. Remember, survivor is our top priority.
Once you submit the Exit Approval Form, you are swearing to take full responsibility of all that so be strong!

-Research about Absolute Point Like the object is composed of the nucleus and the electrons, there is a nucleus which locates the center of world. It is named as 'Absolute Point' Each unique time space has its own Absolute Point and Absolute point has responsible to protect and separate current time space from the other time space. It is not sure that Absolute Point has its own personality.

- Research on Sacred Stone It is used like the antenna around Absolute stone. And there are several Sacred Stone around Absolute stone. Each stone might have different functionality. But the stones are not cooperated with the different time space stones.
This termimal is to share information for saint. If you input document, you can check this information.
Verifying the input document... Please wait for a second.
Document has been verified successfully. You can open and read this document through Information function.
- Copy Spirit The most creatures that identified as enemy are the existences that copied from the original body and spirit. After this document, we will call this creature as Copy Spirit.

They are created with some mutagens in time space. The body and spirit has gone through serious transmutation and they just remember some repeated actions only. They are one of a malignant spirit but have a real animated body..

Some of them has either normal spirit or normal body, and sometimes they has been duplicated into many bodies. And it is possible that there will be several unstable mutant Copy spirit. There is no report no this. But there is a rumor that there is copy spirit that has monster body but has normal spirit as a original spirit.

- List of Saint There is a list that contains the person who has been affected by a spirit from Another World and has superior ability, The most of people who affected directly or indirectly by Sacred stone are also included in list.

- Guidian Plan It is a protection plan that find the guardian as the young people who affected by 'Ragia' fighter particle and prevent a post effect from Another World War. Since the real world does not understand the surrealistic thing easily, Massive meteor fall which observed in asia area is used as a key method.
In other words, the guardian plan is to create the best army using the young people who shared the power of fine warrior in Another world.

- Company History 1996. 2. Dr Choi establishes the world-wide company, Sacred Foundation Group with UN supports. 1996. 10. SFG establishes the world-wide education system for gifted people around Sacred Gate area. 1997. 10. SFG starts to build 4 main campuses. 1998. 1. Starts to build network system around Sacred Gate and 4 campuses. 1998. 11. Starts the operation of network system. 2003. 8. SFG, 4 campuses is completed.

The Force Field Optimization for the current terminal is completed! Please proceed to the next terminal to complete all the required Force Field Optimizations.

Ask about the status of Middle Hole.

When I wake up, my leg was stuck in this place. Fortunately, I could avoid from the rain and wind because of this bus... Problem is.. I couldn't remember anything before I wake up. Yes.. I think I saw 3 persons who wear the spaceship suit and run toward something. I wonder what it was.
Oh thanks.. I am so thankful for your help. Now I can survive here for a while.
I might sound weird, but I feel comfortable here. And I feel like I could remember something if I stay here for a while.
I... I don't know... I was in an accident and I don't remember much...

Sigh.. I don't even know where to begin. My situation is a bit complicated because I have to attend to the Health Advisor's request in searching for first-aid medicines. Sad to say, I lost the list of medicines. This is a serious problem.

This is the first time in my life that I've met a problem that doesn't make ant sense even one bit. I can't even go outside to know the actual situation. Where in hell did these mobs came from? Not so long ago, I nearly found myself dying in the hands of these creatures while I was rescuing a friend of mine. I barely escaped the jaws of death and I tell ya... It was horrible!
Ask about the situation on the streets.

Hmmmm... Let me see. Even though I had a tough time coming here, I don't think I have any other information to tell you. Wait! Hold on for a minute... There is this thing called the Abrasive Potion. You can utilize this item to produce better equipments.
Ask about how to use the Abrasive Potion
Open the inventory window and choose the Abrasive Potion. Drag the Potion the item you want to transform by clicking the top right position of the item, and the transformation process will begin.

Make sure you don't go straight after passing through the crossroads in front. Where in the world did all those dogs came from? It would be better if you pass by the left or right paths. Honestly, I am not familiar with the other roads because I've never actually passed by them before. It would be better if you pass by the left or right paths. Honestly, I am not familiar with the other roads because I've never actually passed by them before.

These mobs bring nothing but destruction to the environment.
Ask about the situation in the streets
You mean the mail from the Headquarters of the Finance Department? Hmmm... I actually had this kind of documents before; but I'm not sure where I kept it.
Oh my God! I almost forgot... I didn’t think about it at the start. I was thinking of asking you to do something.
Well... This is the note! Thanks for finding it! Still, the chaotic situation remains even though this note has been found. Sigh...
Please be kind enough to get these medicine supplies to the Health Advisor.
Oh! You have found all of them! Thank you very much Student! Please take these medicines to the Health Advisor now.
Hmmmm?Did the Health Advisor like it? Oh! He did?

Sorry for causing you too much trouble. I really appreciate all your efforts. Thank you for doing your part in aiding the eradication of these dangers in the campus. Your performance is indeed impressive. If ever I meet your teachers again, I would not forget to mention the good things you did for me.
Oh! Its over here! It looks like it's not that very important; but it was requested personally by the Student Director himself before.
Maybe he sets limits on how he puts his trust on students. What is important is that the document is still here.
I really didn't know it was chaotic outside. I was no aware that these weird mobs are perpetrating outrages in and out of the campus. This is the main reason why I cannot go outside.
Not so long ago, the Health Advisor's written note requested by the Blood Drinker was stolen. I am sorry for bothering you; but may I know where did you find the stolen note?
The Health Advisor has ordered several times to recover that first-aid medicine as soon as possible.

Student! Please accept my request again. There are fellas known as the Blood Drinkers. They rob people who posses the medicine. It is evident that these Blood Drinkers have the medicines. Please make sure that people will not be robbed again.
Thank you very much! Please take these medicines to the Health Advisor now.
The people causing disorder in the campus prevents me from bringing these medicines to the Health Advisor personally.
Those mobs bring nothing but chaos to the streets! Especially that group of mobsters known as the Gangsters!
Even though you see everyone carrying blood-stained knives around, you necessarily don't have to be afraid of these slashers.
Student, please do me a favor. Help me acquire those knives from the Gangsters. Although it is impossible to acquire all their knives; I think getting 10 knives from them shouldn't be a problem.
I heard there appear more capital item. You can get the rumor through campus's cross junction there~
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him.
I heard that item too small, it very easy loss. Search and talk to Leonair's desentomb people. You may get useful information from him.
I believe in you, you can make it!
Hi there! I am Zia, the Manager of the Assassins.
Assassin Instructor is at the campus. If you need something then just talk to me.
Volunteer for the Leonine Campus research.

Us, assassins have known a bit more about the meteorite phenomenon that had happened 18 years ago. The director of Saint Foundation must have known about the relationship between our world and Another World. I heard that he once mentioned that the previously done acts of both sides of world will eventually effect the world of today.

The meteorite actually was something else... The creatures from the Another World could not cross over to our world in its original form and it was divided into a transmittable form to cross over. Saint List was the list that contained the list of the people like us who came over in that form. That is why we are the only ones who could withstand the phenomenon.

I guess the Foundation wanted to gather students like us and prepare before the phenomenon hit the world... It was the matter of survivor of our world and that is why they have done such things.. The adults are all the same..

I see, so you would like to help the dispatched agent researching Leonine Campus but you are not strong enough. Ok! Don't worry! I will make sure to train you to become strong enough at the Leonine Campus.

How was it fighting the Skating Boys? Since you came back in one piece, I guess they were alright to fight against. If not then you must be... Never mind! Okay, just don't get too confident over a few wins against the Skating Boys. They are the easiest targets you can face here.

Guess, it was not easy for you this time! It took longer than expected. But you are back safe so it must be worth it. Well, you should have learned to be more careful and be modest about your skills. Now you will be hard one to defeat for the mobs..

Did you get my books back from Freezing Clowns? Thank you so much! I was so mad when these were stolen. I had such a hard time collecting these data. Thank you, I wouldn't need to go through that again. If my books are helpful to resolve the sudden phenomenon then it would be all for you.

As you may already know, it is essential for us the assassins to defeat an opponent quickly and precisely. In order to do that we must reduce the unnecessary movements. The problem is that it really is hard to understand the unnecessary movements without actual field experiences. As all the people have different looks, each one has unique habit when performing a same skill and those habits create vulnerability. Therefore, field experiences are essential to find out what unnecessary movements they each have.

Oh there is a good opponent! The Skating Boys who always wander around in a group to threat the terrified people. You will be able to learn about the unnecessary movements you may have while defeating them. Go on!

You sure have improved a lot compare to when you have just came to me but you still haven't fixed bad habits that create unnecessary movements. I think you need more training so I recommend you to go defeat Bloody Mary who have gotten more violent.

You must be really curious about what happened in Leonine Campus. I am sure you have no problem going into Leonine Campus for research now but the agent stationed there won't trust your ability... Oh, there is a way! I heard there is a mutated monster called Poison Ivy at Leonine Campus. Defeat a few of them and collect their hands made of bines then the agent will trust you.

My research book had been stolen. I have recorded the data of the unnatural happenings just before the phenomenon but the Freezing Clowns have took it. I was too naive and never imagined getting it stolen to them¡¦ I would like to go by myself but there is a very important task which Ryuin the Assassin Instructor has asked me to do so would you please get my book back?
Why I've dispatched here is¡¦ to collect the technical resources.
Deliver again the directive of search
The encrypted structure of this enemy's directive on search from Student Director is different. I can't decrypt it right away, but what if you get me the code-breaking kit?
Some of enemies might have the code-breaking kit. If I get it, I can use it for deciphering the code soon!
Is this the code-breaking kit? Wait for seconds. It seems that the way to use this kit is not so different from ours. It won't take so long to decrypt it.
Hello, again! Code-breaking works is almost done. I need to deliver this to Ryuin if I'm done with it, but there are a bunch of monsters. Can you secure the entry way to him?
Appreciate your help, though, there are plenty of monsters left still. Please keep working on it more. Thank you.

I've checked on the weapons and arms of the enemies, and technically, they are much more prominent than ours. Can you get the parts of them? I'll analyze them, and it will be defintely helpful for us.
Thank you! But the parts have been broken while I'm doing a research on it. The more get the parts, the better I can do my research. Can you keep getting them for me?
Finally I'm done with decryption!! It contains the important messages for the advance party. Can you hand it over to Ryuin?
Ah, is that a new directive on search taken from the enemies? I'll start to decrypt it right away.
This terminal controls both the entry and exit to the Society Room.

The Force Field mechanism of this Terminal is running properly. To optimize the Force Field function of this Terminal, you need Spiritual Spheres. You are required to gather 12 Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field optimization for this Terminal.
Force Field optimization completed! Please move to the next terminal to optimize the remaining Force Fields.
There are several active evil spirits moving around inside the Society Room. The mobs possessed by these spirits bring unknown effects to the environment. Try your best to eliminate these mobs.
The target amount required for purification has been achieved and verified. Thank you for your efforts.
The priority targets of this area are the Elite Fencers. Please help eliminate 30 Elite Fencer targets.
What can I help you? You have anything want to tell me?
Who? How you know I am here? Lucky you are student.... What happen with the researcher?
If you are Wan Xing, you sure can help me
You are here. Thank god you are here, I am so appreciate.
Hi? Meet you again. I dont know anything it because I becayse u was very busy. You look different with other student, why?
I heard this building 1F have many information. I not sure the information name, can you help me get it? As you know, inside this building is very danger, Just becareful~
At first you need to araange all information. Seem you have manything need to do. Take Care
Aiya! I am "Amanuoyin" Don't know why i am here.
Ruoyin? Is it? You still alive? Ruoyin is my brother, we leaving each other many years ago. Recently that i met him, but......
After my body started mutate, is that what you said "spirit clone"? That was suffer, that why i leave my brother. Heard that is some problem for the process.
Heard during research process, have my name in the report. All the reserach information can be get in 30F research information room 4. Can you help me to get it?
Thank you very much for your help.
Inform "Amaruoyin" that have become tester before.
Yes, i know, but I not sure what is the experiment. Maybe the report can let me know the truth.
Heard some student said have Yin Xi research report. They saw in in 50th Floor. Can help me get it?
Then Yin xi same with me, have did experiment before. Is He know the truth? If he know the experiment did by his grandfather........
Did you meet Yin Xi? You training with Chui Yin Xi.... Zhen,Ruoyin,Yin Xi,Da Xu...you all... Safe...oh~ that is great....

They should have their way. My information is enough, I have arrange some information. All the experiment diary send to Yin Xi, I know there will be abit messy, but try to finish it early and send all the information to Lee Zhen and Chui Yin Xi.
Oh....thank you... I very happy because still survive and can sake to meet my brother. Thanks again.
Accessory needed to start the process of Human Segregator, probably can get it from underground labotarory
I still need to becareful, maybe have someone else find me and cause you damage... If next time see you again, I must tell you more about the story.
Oh, you already collect it, thank you so much. But I not sure whether can success complete the process or not~
Now I will keep survive since I know my brother still alive....Thank you so much for send the letter to me, if you need my help please let me know.
These all definitely Accessory, Thank you, but it look like not enough. Please collect more for me when you free.
Welcome to the Trading Hole Area! I am the Shaman Section Agent. How can I help you? Please feel free to look around if you like.
I am sorry the Manager is not here right now. Please come back again later.

Oh! So, you would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile to do than to teach you students! Since the manager around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.

You would like to have some lessons? There is nothing more worthwhile for me to do than to teach you students! Since the manager is not around, I can give you some lessons myself. Would that be fine with you?
If you don't know the importance physical strength, it will be very difficult for you to understand the future lessons. By the way, I need to ask you to do something.

Did you see the Police Station nearby? There is a police officer waiting for you at the Main Door. Just approach him and tell him that I instructed you to look for him. I believe he has something in store for you.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK, you may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
There is nothing special about this device! It is advisable to find the GPS first; and then input device.
This is a stolen GPS! It is great that you found it by chance. Ah! I am talking to myself. Please leave me alone. OK! You may go. I am sorry for my weird behavior.
Oh! You found it! It has been 18 years since I last saw this device by specialist named Liu Cheng You. Thank you very much!

Student! Please remember that consistent training will be part of your quest for victory. There will be times of disappointments ahead but you need not be sad and preoccupied. Just focus on your training and you will develop to be a more powerful individual.
Broaden your horizons! It is great to have a wider perspective of life! Imagine this is part of the lesson! Someday, it would benefit you and the people around you.

Oh. Ok. Even if he is not here, I could give you some information. After the meteor falls 18 years ago, the chairman realize the danger in Real World. And he expected that there will be some effects from Another World that has been destroyed by some invaders.

The meteor fall was actually the living particles of Another World, which can transmit the power to another body. And the List of Saint is the list of people who affected by that particle, And they were able to survive during that incident because of the transmitted power.

So SFG people thought that the way to prevent the disaster from this incident is to gather the people who has the transmitted power. If not, the real world will be destroyed.... That's why they should enforce them to join this campus whether the methods they used are right or wrong. That's what happened.

Do you know there is the private prison of Saint Financial Group? There are special minerals that come from only the mine near that prison. It used to be a working area for prisoners. The well-refined and mixture of that mineral can enhance the steel... especially weapons and armor with special power... But the success rate is too low and it requires the large amount of oil. Are you still willing to try it?

The easiest way to get oil is from the tuna near this area. You could easily find the tuna boat workers in wharf. But kindly check the quality of oil. Some tuna oil are useless. Please get 10 bottles of oil.
Well done. I will put that oil on this machine. But I am not sure it will create something that helps you. Anyway good luck.

Oh.. You received the information that I requested, don't you? I was so worried about my boss because I couldn't contact him a long time and couldn't gather the information around here. I'm so appreciated that you were able to deliver this information. Now I can breathed a sigh of relief a bit. Thanks you very much.

Wait.. I just remember something. A few days ago, I got another time capsule delivery from another student.. Contents are.. the pictures that the gangsters were trading something without the doubt. But the weird thing is there were the SFG Flag in the ship which might contains the gangster's trade goods. I don't know whether it is for on purposes or not. I hope this information would be worthy for the reward of your delivery.

Excuse me. I don't know all information for this state, because I instead my teacher still stay here. But, I have some story to you. Before, some people have festival for keep thiers time. After this festival, appear some problem.....
This is the Bus Terminal. Once you got your Bus Ticket readily available, you can utilize the Bus Sevice to move to another area.
Document Scan has been completed. Do you want to send?
Processing the sending... Sending has been completed.
I'm not sure why the streets have become like this. I am so lucky I was able to find a safe place to hide. Sheesh! I really don't know what will happen to me if I am not careful.
You still have no idea regarding the situation after seeing it? Things suddenly became like these as I was cleaning the streets. Please be careful around this area. It is very dangerous!
Ever since these events unfolded, we really do not have time to run away. No one is left to do the cleaning up to now.

Thank you very much! I am so sorry for bothering you students. We really have to treasure these kind of resources. I will ask for your help in the future in case you have a spare time to assist me. I will exchange any precious item/s you collect for any of my available items.
If this mess and lack of resources continue, we'll have tremendous problems in the future.
There are other matters you need not to worry about right now. For the meantime, are you willing to collect some Empty Bottles for me?
Eww.. Head is heavy.. Who are you? Helping me wake up again? I am the member of Daramaian Partisan. Anyways, I appreciate your help!
I am the member who assist the captain of our partisan. My captain and I was experimented by an old man. I don't remember anything after that. Ugh.. I cannot remember how that doctor looked like¡¦

Before I was blacked out, I remember traveling with other members including captain Veno. During the harsh journey, we met with a very nice doctor. He had made a suggestion to us and that's all I remember..
If you find captain Veno somewhere around here, don't forget to tell me about it. Even if you fail to find him please find me his traces left behind.

I see.. That's what happened.. Must had no choice.. You have a quite talented crew. My great captain Veno.. Wow! Must.. have lost his power because of the mind controlling of that evil doc. Also, it is very sad that he would not be able to recognize me and our brothers.. It is really sad!
I am looking for a person who can find all of our scattered partisan members and deliver this news. Please help me!
Betrayal of Lucian?! Umm.. I kind of expected it.. Then would you please do me a favor?

Lucian used to be a great warrior of our partisan. Enemies fell as the candle in the light in front of his sword. But he must have known that he was getting weaker as the time went by. Therefore, he was thinking about the unthinkable, taking over the absolute point for its power. He needs to wake up now. Please go teach him some sense and retrieve our pendant.
Oh.. The pedant piece of Partisan representing honor.. It is really small..
This Terminal controls the access to the Student Center 1.

The Force Field function of the terminal is operating properly. You must gather Spiritual Spheres to optimize this Terminal's Force Field function. The required quantity of Spiritual Spheres to achieve this is 24.

Force Field Optimization completed! You can complete the Force Field Optimization process if the rest of the required terminals are activated and optimized. Please move to the next Force Field Terminal.
Inside the Student Center 1, there are evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these evil spirits will bring the undesirable effects to the surroundings. Do your best to eliminate them.

Inside the Student Center 1, are evil spirits moving around. The mobs possessed by these evil spirits will bring the undesirable effects to the surroundings. Do your best to eliminate them. The primary targets in this area are the Bruisers. Please dispose 34 Bruiser targets.
Within the vicinity towards the Main Entrance are mobs known as the Renegades. These mobs are possessed by Evil Spirits. Please try your best to eliminate them.
The target amount required for purification has been achieved and authenticated. Thank you for your efforts!
The primary target for this area are the Maulers. Please eliminate 30 of them.
The primary target for this area are the Punks. Please eliminate 36 of them.
If there are nothing else, people who are not from Shaman Section please go out.
Announce the situation for new student
Announce the situation for new student
Normal students are not capable of handling the activities of the Shaman Training Section. Normally, educational institutions would not approve the establishment of such organization.
You look so weak, is it because you can't use "HP Recovery" ?
Focusing your Stat points to Strength and Dexterity makes your character an Attack Type. On the other hand, focusing your Stat points to Intelligence makes your character built for Support.
Ah, don't worry, I'm not asking you to kill people. Those enemies are just the clones of the mobs whose minds are unstable.
Your specialty is not for direct fighting. You must always stay behind your partners and help them to maximize their powers by supporting them.

Emm! You’re obviously able to feel that you had become stronger. This shows that you trained hard. With your level, it should not be a problem to go outside the campus for training. Go and have a try. You have to learn more stuff.

Skill Points are set to 0 at the start. Every time your character's level increases, you will be awarded with 1 Skill Point. You can use these Skill Points to learn new skills or upgrade existing skills.
The Main Gate of the campus building is straight ahead. The Welfare Society and the Lockers are over there. You should go and check them out.
Please voice it out you have any question.
Ask about the methods of training
Ask about the methods of combat
I’ve found out that the quests before are not that difficult. But now... it’s too hard for me to accomplish them.
Hmmm?The registration process is almost done. The next procedure is to request for an Exit Approval.

Destiny has brought students to join the Shaman Section.
The power of your skills lies on your understanding of the Universe's Spirit. Remember that your goal is not geared towards destruction.

After buying the Book of "HP Recovery", press "K' to open Skill Panel. Click "HP Recovery" Option under "Support" menu, then drag it to Shortcut Inventory, after that right click to use. Make good use of it.
It is an essential factor to learn to contemplate in peace. This is how your power strengthens. However, considering the current situation; there is no time to think about this method.
When facing your enemies you should also posses skills used to induct direct damages to your targets.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.

If you have your Stat Points primarily distributed to Strength, and secondarily with Dexterity, your character builds into a Spear Type. This allows your character to exhibit strong close-ranged abilities.
Those enemies are just the clones of the mobs whose minds are unstable. They are the opposite of people whose souls are free. There are times you need to kill someone to free their spirits.
In all kinds of skills, you are required to consume skills points when you first learn them up.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

And about the student registration, you must go to the School Administration Office which is beside the Welfare Society and find the Student Director. You can also get treatment if you go to the First-Aid Room. So, you might wanna go there and heal if you’re injured.

It is an essential factor to learn to contemplate in peace. This is how your power strengthens.

Every time your character levels up, you are awarded with 3 Stat Points. The allocation of these Stat Points to the different attributes of your character will determine the growth and build of your character.

If you have your Stat Points primarily distributed to Strength, and secondarily with Dexterity, your character builds into a Spear Type. This allows your character to exhibit strong close-ranged abilities.
You can also allocate Stat Points equally to Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence. This will allow your character to exhibit an Attack Build.
There are times you need to kill someone to free their spirits.
The starting skills won’t require that much skill points, therefore the points will be more than sufficient.
But later you might not have enough points to learn some skills, think properly, and choose the essential skills to learn.

The Information Room Terminal is unable to function properly due to error in the school's Main Terminal. Please resolve this problem.

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to browse the document.

After you finish reading and activating the Shockwave skill book, use the [K] button to open the skill window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Shockwave in the Qi option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Shockwave skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Shockwave Skill

Due to the errors in the School's Information Center System, the Information room can only process information contained in this 1 File. We will restore all necessary information in the shortest time possible. Please feel free to browse the document.
Now, there are no means to keep this Terminal to function properly.

After you finish reading and activating the Refresh skill book, use the [K] button to open the skill window. Click and hold down the left-mouse-button to select Refresh in the Support option panel (which is located on the right). While holding down the button, drag the skill to drop onto your desired shortcut key holder in the shortcut key panel. Finally, you are ready to use the Refresh skill with your assigned shortcut key.
The Effect of the Refresh Skill
The Shockwave skill is the art of using the Qi Energy to attack closer enemies. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

The Refresh skill is used to hasten health recovery against damages. However, this skill can only be used on your own character. The usage and training methods for this skill is the same with the other skills of your character.

It is too far from there~
Inform [Request help from Hong Ji Yoon]
Ask another way to go toilet
I'm sorry I didn't introduce myself.. I am Hong Ji Yeon ¡¦ who was freshman in Sacred Gate Campus.
Ah. Have you met my mom? After the incident, I was not able to see her. And I am already here.. How is my mom?..

There was a boy who I liked in upper batch. He was so perfect man so somebody said he is not a human. Although there were so many fans in school, they were gone after the incident because he became a monster. Then I still want to protect him in somehow.. But I had nothing that I can do with it.
I killed 'Joo Seong' who was the vice-representative of fighter class. There was no other choice. If I didn¡¯t kill him, he would kill more people. I have no regret.
I have a boy friend who protected me always. His name is 'Lee Dae yook'. But he went to Another World after he saw that I was hard time with this incident. Without a word..
I don¡¯t know how many floors this building have. The emergency stairs are destroyed and the elevator is malfunctioned.. Probably this building has more than 10th floors?
Only few.. Like research note ¡¦ But we already know about it, And I remember there is no details. Maybe~ if we can go the Another World
Ask how to go another world
I was with Dae Yook in front of that door and needed to go the toilet. But we couldn't reach there by normal ways.

Did you see the floating objects? As you can see, the time space here is quite unstable and stopped. So you might use this to go toilet. There is a broken window somewhere. And through that window, you could reach the toilet. Because of this weird time space , we can destroy or move objects.

Did you already find it? Oh. I forgot.. You cannot pass through that passage again. Weird? You can enter the passage several times but once you reach the end of passage, you cannot enter it again. Maybe there is certain rules in this passage.. Anyway I think there is another similar passage over there.
Lee Da Xu...Ah... Da Xu is my friend. He sick from amnesia?
He can't remember it? I believe he will recover back slowly.
Lee Da Xu? Ah...He still alive, is that true? Da Xu and me are very good friend,how he lost memory.... If need any help to recover his sickness, please let me know.
Welcome to Ground Zero. It will be harder than you think.
Thank you for responding to our call. We are in the serious situation now. So we desperately need your help! It's going to be so painful time.
The advance party is almost done for observing enemy movement now. Eliminate the enemies closest to you. Kill Scouter.
It seems as if the advance party is almost done for observing enemy movement now. Eliminate the enemies closest to you. Kill Elite Scouter.
We are to build the final defense line to make enemies stay in the Ground Zero. To do that, get me the spoils taken from the enemies. Then you deserve the rewards!
Great! Along with your own power, please save the final defense line!
It seems as if the enemies move upon a directive of their boss. Some of them definitely have instructions. Please eliminate them and bring it to me!
Oh¡¦ It was true! They've been ordered by their boss. Hm.. But it's all encrypted. Hard to get across it.
Head toward the Technical Teacher with the directive taken from the enemies. He could decipher the message!
So..Well.. The final battle is to begin. Don't look down on the boss! You should be more careful. Beating them all is important, but the safety comes first. Good luck!
Oh..It's more than I've expected! There's no doubt that we can confront and overcome any sort of threats! Every students and teachers will remember and eulogize you forever!

Waited for you! The remains of the defense line have been being collapsed while the cleanup party had already got into Chaos Island. I desperately want to clutch at any straw now! Can you help us out? Please..It will be defintely a big help for us.
Thank you!! Thank you very much! You save us all!

Oh! Its great to finally see a normal human being again!
Hmmm.... How can I help you?
Hmm... If you listened in class, you can imagine how it would be like. It occurred earlier than expected. It all started 18 years ago.
We have anticipated this incident a long time ago; however, the extent of the situation was beyond our expectations. Please help collect essential information regarding this matter.
Right now, I am the one managing the distribution of this unique costumes because the person originally assigned to this job disappeard. Personally, I don't like the idea of distributing these items.
Hmm... What do you want to know?

Ah, are you looking for the spare parts to fix the bus? There are several people who collected the same spare parts recently. They keep coming back because of recurring car accidents. It will be great if these spare parts can be put to good use. Although we are prepared with the necessary equipments for incidents like this, the supply of spare parts are dwindling.

All spare parts have been released and the ones left are not compatible with the ones you need. You can get the spare parts you need from the supervisors of the Construction Site located at the 4th Hole. However, you will need to exert extra efforts and prove your self worthy of the items.
So your here to buy more spare parts. Hmmm... Where did you get these strange currency notes? Look, I still have a lot of those things here and I really don't know where they came from.
Those currency notes are obviously strange and its good we have discovered them before the problem worsen. Just continue delivering the Order Document. It'll be a big help!

Oh so you've already reached the level that I require to qualify for this exam? Your learning speed is faster than I expected! Before passing you the exam questions, I'll remind you again on the purpose of this test that I have previously mentioned the last time. Your regular targets in this test are not human beings.That’s the reason why you need to regularly take this type of exams. You will be able to learn things that you really need to learn. You really must continue learning diligently in the future. Eventually, the enemies that you have to fight will not be at this level only. Do you understand me?
Good you have passed the exam by achieving your level eventhough it was less than what I expected. You will need to practice more in order to be ready for any kind of attack from these fellas.

Although it’s impossible to know the entirety of the situation right now; I believe there is something very odd about the stuff that the Financial Group is involved in. I would like tell you more, but my position restricts me to share more information.
